Ryan's POV

"Girls what were you just told?" Elvira said in an icy tone, oh shit, the Dean's losing her temper now. That's a rare sight, but it's not one to be viewed as pretty. Hell Light covered in blood is nicer looking, and speaking of which....

The former test subject has stood up, and so has Chon. Rose and Carla have stood up and are going up to the doors. They're yelling about how Charlie is their Brother and they don't want him married to the daughters of a dangerous rouge witch, hypocritical coming from them I may add.

Just as it looks like Chon and Light are about to weigh in on the girls and start Mr Tanaka stands up, and he's become a big presence. Something tells me that his ancestors aren't taking this lightly, more so as a church is holy ground. And suddenly he walks forth down the aisle, up to Rose and Carla.

"I WARNED YOU!!!" he yells out, nearly spitting his words out. Suddenly I see him produce two vials out from his vest, and tosses it at both of Charlie's Sisters.

They don't seem worried, at least till it hits them. For then all of a sudden a large black cloud engulfs them, and now I'm worried. I stand up, sword at the ready. Only I see Rose fall out of the cloud, with her upper body. And what I see next is enough to make me lower my blade.

"The fuck is this?!!" Rose yelled out as she saw that her lower body had somehow been altered, now it looked long and green like that of a snake. Carla wasn't doing much better, she had a skunk tail as she ran out the cloud in shock.

Then all of a sudden Charlie fell to his knees, and clutched his head with both hands. I noticed a light blue aura around him, eyes closed in concentration. And right after that he moved his hands to Viva and Vogue, who in turn had the same aura. But then it grew even more intense, their eyes turned yellow. They were even now floating just above the ground.

Chon moves forth to make sure they're okay, only to be stopped by Elvira. "EVERYONE GET TO THE SIDES!!!!" Charlie yelled out. We wasted no time, as Viva and Vogue suddenly shot their hands forth. And projected a large force of magic energy, it flew right down the middle. And plowed straight into Rose and Carla, the two had no idea of how to really move their lower halves. And thus weren't as nimble as our blind marital artist and robot girl, who speaking of which had just opened the church doors. Rose and Carla flew right into the street, making loud noises all the while.

Lunar and Chon then swiftly close the doors with a mighty creak, and the blind man leans on them looking down.
"Are you okay Chon?" Lunar says going over to inspect him.

Chon's smiling, it's an evil grin. "That felt good!" he shouted out at the top of his lungs.

"You were wanting to do that for a long time weren't you?" I find myself saying.

"If only the Mother was there as well." Chon mutters.

The V girls have stopped the whole "Aura of power" thing now. Charlie is holding his forehead and groaning slightly, and Viva and Vogue are wasting no time in fussing over him. "I'm f-fine, just didn't expect that. There was just so much magic energy about I...tapped into it I guess, need to learn how to do that properly." he says to them.

His new girlfriends smile and hold him by the hands, confetti falls from the roof. Ave Maria begins to play now.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dok4wJ4p...

Everyone is clapping at newly bonded couple, er trio I mean. With that Charlie and the V girls are already leaving, eager to go and get dinner with all of us.

"By the way sir, what was that you tossed at the Ren twins?" I mutter to Mr Tanaka.

The native American laughs and says "Do you recall when you gained cat ears?"

I frown and then nod, Mr Tanaka laughs and says "The head of the mad science community gave me them, he slipped them into my vest when no one was looking. Just in case."

I smile, it seems they are prepared for everything. Like me. "Should we go check on Rose and Carla?" Jenny asks me.

I shake my head "Fuck that, I want sushi." I reply with a mutter as all of us go to the cars waiting outside.

1351111112121211131111211111112.content:
Charlie's POV.

It's been two days since I was bonded to a pair of magnificent girls, and for what I think is the second time since I've been taken in by Ryan I have felt truly happy. Ryan, Viva, Vogue. I owe so much to them, I've been given a happier home. My Mother....no I don't consider her my Mother anymore, the same with my Sisters. They are just people I didn't really know when I grew up, they were never there when I needed them. They never cared for me.

Looking at this now it feels like a sort of karmic justice, I have a power that they would love to have had. I have sheer raw magic power within me, that I can transfer to witches and give them immense power. I'm told that it's rare, super rare even. And that bad people would want my power, like Rose and Carla.

I've woken up, holiday's over. I'm bonded now with Chon's daughters, and it's a beautiful day. I don't know how good a boyfriend I'll be to them, but I'll give it my best shot. They will too, with that I start to get changed. Before coming to starmage I was stick thin, let's just say eating was whatever I could get my hands on before meeting Ryan. Now though I'm eating healthily, and it's showing. I feel as great as I've ever felt.

I get my uniform on, comb my hair and head into the kitchen. And instantly Viva and Vogue sit with me in between. And link arms with me, pecking me on both cheeks at the same time. I feel a large blush on my cheeks.

"Morning love!" they say in unison.

I smile and give a sigh, I feel so happy. "Hi girls, we ready for school?" I ask them.

They both nod and we begin eating, Ryan and Chon join us. "So girls remember we still have martial arts after your lessons." Chon said.

I then get an idea "Chon I was wondering, can you teach me how to fight as well?" I ask.

The blind man turns to me and lifts an eyebrow in curiosity, he's not expecting me to say something like that. He turns to Ryan, who gives a shrug and a nod. Chon then says "Very well, I suppose it would help you bond with my daughters."

"Yay!" Viva says.

"That's awesome, thanks elder Brother!" Vogue exclaims.

Chon might have been curious, but I wanted it. I didn't want to be defenceless, even if I may not be able to use my power to enhance myself. With that we make plans for me to join Chon and his daughters once our classes our done, I feel better in knowing that. Chon will show me the way, plus it would be good to do something like that with my new girlfriends.

After breakfast me and my dorm mates go to our classes, Viva and Vogue are in the same class as me. The Dean made sure of that, something tells me that just because me and they are now bonded together still won't deter people. And speaking of which a guy our age walks up to Viva as we go down the hallway, with a letter with her name in elegant handwriting.

Viva paused for a second and then said "Do you take me for a fool? This has magic in it, if it's a love letter then go and get bent."

The boy opens his mouth to speak, but it's cut off when he sees me. He glares daggers at me, but I don't shrink away. He doesn't hold a candle to the woman who gave birth to me. And sure enough he leaves.

"You okay Sis?" Vogue asks.

Viva nodded and said to me "Stay watchful Charlie, witch girls are most likely going to try as well."

I give a reassuring smile and say "Well don't worry, we'll get past it all together. I remember Ryan once said that loving someone means being their ally no matter what."

That resonated with my girlfriends, who hold my hands as we walk into class. And everyone's paying attention, I try not to think about that though. As I sit at the back with Viva and Vogue sitting at my sides, we exchange happy smiles at each other. I can feel it, my new life begins.

As the teacher, Miss Rosecliff, rose from her desk, I noticed a small boy nervously standing in the front of the class with his hands clasped behind him in a neutral stance. He was a few inches shorter than me with almost doll like features, jet black hair, and ocean blue eyes. On top of his head, I noticed a pair of wolf like ears. He was a male Neko-wolf.

"Class, we have a new student today." Kindly, Miss Rosecliff said. "He is here on a summer student exchange program with the other side of the rift. Please give a warm welcome to Mr Matt Moray."

All eyes turned to Matt who blushed deeply, his pointed ears wiggling slightly. "Um... Hi."

"Oh, he's adorable!" Gushing, one girl exclaimed.

"He's so cute!" Giggling, another shouted.

"Hey, puppy boy!" Grinning, a third girl said. "You can sit next to me."

"Matt Moray is the youngest grandson of the head mad scientist, Devlin Moray." Whispering carefully, I told Viva and Vogue. "Ryan told us all about that just the other day."

"Only what is he doing here?" Curious, Viva asked. "Aren't his older brother and sister already visiting this side of the rift?"

"I'm 'an adorable distraction'." Irritable, Matt's voice replied in my head. "I'm to give the girls something else to look at until you can learn to control your gifts." I looked up at him, curious. to see him pouting slightly. He sighed, mentally adding, "Daddy owed Mr Tanaka a favor."

I sighed and nodded my head. I felt sorry for the kid, having to act as 'eye candy' to lure the lovestruck and power hungry girls away from me for a while. I decided to try to look out for him.

"Okay, class; settle down." Firmly but kindly, Miss Rosecliff said. "Matt, please take a seat in the front here so we may begin."

Matt nodded, still blushing slightly. He had no idea how cute it made him look to the girls who all cooed and giggled before Miss Rosecliff began the day's lessons.

Later that day, Viva, Vogue, and I met up with Matt....

135111111212121113111121111111223.content:
-Charlie's POV-

Later that day, Viva, Vogue, and I met up with Matt in the halls after lessons were finished for the day. There was no way we could get near him during and between classes. Many of the girls his age and older were all fussing over how cute he was. Remembering Matt mentally stating he was to be an adorable distraction, I put two and two together and realized that his father must have done something to him that attracts young girls. Upon seeing the frustrated look on his face, I knew he was not exactly thrilled with the job given to him.

"Long day?" Wincing, I asked.

"What do you think?" Sourly, Matt snapped. "I've had gross icky girls following me around all day!" He shuddered. "I'm going to catch cooties yet!"

I rolled my eyes as Viva and Vogue giggled. "Do you think we have cooties?" Amused, Viva asked.

"All girls have cooties." Pouting, Matt replied. "Fortunately, boys here are immune."

Hearing that, I chuckled. "You're afraid of changing." Smiling, I said.

"Don't tease!" Tearing up, Matt wailed. "There is more magic in me than science! Put yourself in my shoes and see how brave you feel!"

My smile vanished in an instant. "Matt, I didn't mean..."

Matt would not hear anything more. He ran off, sobbing. I turned to Viva and Vogue who seemed just as surprised then sighed seeing Jessica and Tex. They sadly shook their heads.

"It's not your fault, kid." Gently, Jessica said. "Matt is very sensitive. It doesn't take much to send him into tears. We will talk to him."

"What is his story?" Curious, I asked.

"Our mother attempted to permanently transform our dear youngest brother into the female gender when he was still in his toddler stage." Evenly, Tex said. "Regardless of the reasons, her legal attempts failed but it instilled a phobia of girls and magic into Matt." he frowned. "That was not the intention but it was the result."

"That has a familiar ring to it." Frowning, Charlie thought. "Poor kid..."

"Mom died at the hands of a rogue witch, trying to take Matt for herself." Sadly, Jessica added. "Dad thought that serving as an adorable distraction might show her that girls have their good side."

"Let us help." Offering, Vogue said. "We all kind of know what its like to have it rough."

"Your assistance is accepted." Nodding, Tex said. "Please accompany us to our dorm. That is where he has most likely retreated to."

Upon reaching Tex and Jessica's dorm, we found the door ajar and heard crying from inside. I felt a twinge of guilt, even though I really did not mean any harm. As I opened the door, I found the kid lying on his bed, crying into his pillow. I wondered what would Ryan do in this situation?

1351111112121211131111211111112232.content:
Charlie's POV

I bite my lower lip, memories of being like that wafting into my mind. Although I block them out, now's not the time to be entertaining it. He needed my help, Ryan would console me and be there for me. But he couldn't do that all the time, and taught me how to stand on my own two feet. Something my Mother never taught me, I need to remind myself not to call her that anymore. But I don't know what else to call her.

It seems that his Mother must have done something bad to him, but he just had one incident from what I know. But it left him traumatised, I guess I was just so used to it. Till Ryan opened my eyes to the truth, and I begun to change. I don't know what to do.

Viva and Vogue lightly hold my hands, I feel it and give a smile to them. I then sigh and look at the door.
"I'll go alone." I say to them.

The girls are about to talk, no doubt voicing their objections to this. But I quickly cut them off by saying "If you go in he might not listen, he seems to not like girls all that much."

They sigh, they know that I'm right. Even if they don't like it. With a deep breath I silently walk forth and open the door, moving to shut it behind me.

Matt turns to look at me. "What do you want now?" he hissed out at me.

Before I would have stood quivering like he was, but I'm different now. I'm done being the person who couldn't do a thing, I need to talk to him.

"I came to apologize for my actions towards you." I get the ball rolling.

Matt merely turned away and said "Fine, now get out of here."

I'm not having that, I know about his Mother. I need to tell him something.
"I heard...about your Mother." I mutter, walking past his bed to look out the window.

"She didn't care." he mutters bluntly to me.

I move my eyes to look at him, but I don't turn my head. "I think she did." I respond.

"What the hell do you know?" Matt snaps at me, sitting up.

Then I turn to face him, a look of determination on my features. I respond with "Because she died to protect you! My Mother would never have done that for me, she was a rouge after all. My Sisters....Rose and Carla learned from her."

"But your immune to being a girl. You don't know what it's like."

"That might be true. That didn't mean they didn't use their magic on me though." I then take off my shirt, exposing scars over my chest. There's also burn marks and other things, I was stick thin before coming to Starmage. If I wasn't being hurt I was being starved.

"So?" he says to me.

I sigh and respond with "You may have more magic than science in you, but that doesn't mean you need to resign yourself to it. Both our Mothers did cruel things to us both, I know what it's like a lot more than you do."

Matt's silent, he turns around to lie on his pillow again. But he mutters "If...Can I talk to you again sometime?"

My sisters turned to Matt and giggled before eying him meanly. "Aw, a young mad scientist." Amused, Carla gushed. She grinned. "Why don't you go back to playing with your chemistry set."

"Perhaps you can make a cute tail to go with your manufactured wolf ears." Grinning, Rose suggested.

Matt scoffed. "I already have a tail, thank you." Smugly, he said. "I was born with them."

My sisters' grins instantly vanished as they looked at Matt more closely. "You were... born with them?" Surprised, Rose asked. "Did I hear that right?"

"Yes, I was born with them." Defiant, Matt replied. "I am a true Neko wolf."

Rose and Carla turned to each other, stunned for a moment then turned back to Matt with grins I all too well recognized. They were evil, greedy smiles they would throw at me before they tortured me with spells or worse. Viva and Vogue knew those smiles as well and we began to worry.

"Tex, Jessica!" Urgently, I called. "Get your brother out of here!"

Rose and Carla pushed me aside and rushed Matt. They grinned at him, forgetting that his older brother and sister were watching them. "We know a lot of young Neko girls who would love to meet you, young man." Eagerly, Rose said. "True Neko boys are very rare in this world."

"Let us introduce you to their mothers." Grinning, Carla added. "They would just eat you up!"

"I have no interest in becoming a tool for Neko procreation." Taking a step back, Matt protested. "Your eagerness stresses the point you would gain from this."

"Of course!" Smiling, Rose replied. "Witches would pay a fortune for a boy like you!"

With that, she grabbed Matt's wrist. Her grip was like a vice, causing Matt to cry out in pain. In the next breath, Matt was inside a tight metal cage! Rose and Carla grinned as they easily lifted it and began to run off with him. I immediately panicked, seeing Matt forced to sit on all fours as I was when they had tortured me. Only, in this case, my sisters' move was a grave mistake. A powerful electrical blast threw Rose away from Matt and through a door on the far end of the hall. Carla, unable to hold the cage alone, dropped it to the floor. She turned around, annoyed, to find Tex staring her down with a large sparkling sphere hovering and rotating over his open hand.

"Release my little brother or suffer the consequences!" Enraged, he demanded.

Rose appeared a second later, looking just as furious. "You dare attack us?!"

Jessica summoned a powerful flame to her hand, a death glare in her eyes. "You have three seconds to release our brother or fight for your life." Ice in her voice, she said.

Rose and Carla both summoned flames to their hands, knowing that a fight was inevitable. I shuddered at the sight. True Neko boys were very rare and very valuable. Only I did not believe Rose and Carla would be so bold or foolish as to attempt to take him in front of his older siblings.

"This is serious." Pulling me back, Viva said. "If a duel happens here..."

"It could destroy the peace." Shuddering, I whispered.

There was only one option in our minds. "I screamed out at the top of my lugs as Viva and Vogue followed... "Ryan! Chon!"

"Have you got that fucker yet?" Tex says to me, walking right up to me. Jessica's behind him, trying to make sure he's not too confrontational. That's not gonna work on me, I fold my arms. Not showing any signs that I'm going to cave in.

"Simmer down, Dex's been dealt with and so are the Ren twins. The way I see it you've got nothing to complain about." I mutter.

Tex is about to say something, only I do a talk to the hand gesture. He's silent and I carry on with "How about you do something normal for a while? Maybe go and spend some quality time with Mat, Charlie can only do so much. Your his family, so go and be it."

It seems that's what Jessica wanted me to say, she tugs at the sleeve of Tex. Tex says nothing, but merely nods and leaves. I feel like I've made a victory here, speaking of normal I should probably try and do something like that. But if I've forgotten how then I'll need to learn that.

Ryan's POV

I had just reached the recreation room of the school, hoping to hit the gym. However, those hopes faded when I saw Rose and Carla Ren slowly entering from the other side. I shook my head, expecting another round of trouble. What surprised me was that the two girls were walking much more slowly and with far less confidence than I had ever seen them. The two seemed to have been jumping at the slightest movement. What concerned me was that they then sat down at the most isolated booth when they normally enjoyed being the center of attention.

"It would seem their visit to the other side left them rather rattled." Frowning, I muttered. "I suppose I should speak with them." I sighed. "Duty calls again."

I walked up to the table to find the Ren twins more than just shaken. They were cut, bruised, burned... they looked like Charlie did after they were done toying with him. "What happened to you two?" Softly, I asked.

Both Carla and Rose jumped with a slight scream, turning to me, looking terrified. After a few ragged breaths, they blushed slightly. "We- We are not as powerful as we first thought." Timidly, Rose said.

"Well, duh." Sighing, I thought. Then, I asked, "Care to tell me how you got so badly banged up?"

Carla sniffled, fighting tears. "We were curious about a mad scientist's laboratory so we... sneaked in."

I shook my head. "Let me guess, you encountered the automatic defense systems."

Rose and Carla sadly nodded before Rose stated, "That was not the worst of it. Their father punished us by showing us what happens to intruders to a mad scientist's laboratory."

I raised a single eyebrow. "What happened?" Morbidly curious, I asked.

Both Rose and Carla began to sob, hugging each other. Having a pen pal who was a sort of mad scientist, I realized that they must have been experimented on. Part of me felt they deserved what they got while another felt pity for them. "Report to the infirmary." Evenly, I ordered. "You look like hell. I will inform dean Elvira what you had told me."

Reluctantly, Rose and Carla left the room with a number of prefect officers while I continued to walk to the gym to try to relax.

Ryan's POV

As much as I disliked the Ren girls, part of me did feel for them. But hey, perhaps this might be the kicker that they need to change their ways. Their Mother was a powerful rouge witch, and had passed on her power to her daughters. But there's far, far worse things out there. It's funny how they believed Charlie to be of no use apart from a magical punching bag, and yet the kid was all along a walking deposit of tremendous magic power. Maybe if they had been nicer to the kid they wouldn't be in the situation they'd been in, their decisions brought them to that place. Although it would also be their decisions that could bring them to a better path.

I was then in the gym, dressed in nothing but a pair of black jogging bottoms and red sneakers. I commence some light stretching, and then moving onto pushups. Thankfully there's no one around and I'm on a mat, I begin to practise my martial arts. I'm not adept in the art of chi like Chon is, but I have figured out some things at least. He's teaching it to his kids as well, Charlie's gonna learn martial arts too. More so than usual, seeing as how it's gotten out that he's the aforementioned magic familiar.

I'm kinda miffed that there's no one about, I'd have loved to fight against Shomei. He was personally trained by the Japanese SDF back when it first was made, although why he still looks like a young man is a story for another day. But the fact is he's someone you wouldn't want to cross, the powers he has......

I continue for a bit longer, it's been too long since I neglected my fists. I usually use my blade, the fact that I'm an instant master of the sword is because of the blade I use. There's the soul of a demon slayer in it, who wielded the blade back in the Sengoku era. So his memories of swordplay have melded with my own, so that it comes near naturally to me.

Later on I'm dressed back in my uniform after a quick shower, it felt good to just cut loose and work out. Felt like good stress relief, but little did I know that I was going to need it. As I head back to the dorms I noticed a crowd of people gathered around the dorm where our guests are staying, that set off alarm bells right away for me. Had Tex picked on the Ren girls in their weak state?!

"Out the way, move it." I say as I brush past the crowd and get into the dorm. Tex is in the hallway, looking irate. Shomei is in the hall trying to make sure he stays there. Chon's there too leaning on the door so that Tex can't get in.

"The hell's going on?" I say, this whole thing doesn't look good one bit.

"Carlson! Jessica is ill! And nothing is being done on this, tell this blind idiot to move aside!" Tex yelled pointing at Chon.

I know the Chinese man won't take that lying down, Chon's eyebrows go under his blindfold. "You can't, Jessica is ill and we don't know if it can spread. The best in Starmage and Wandill's medical industry is in there, so why don't you sit down and be quiet." he says.

"Chon-san speaks the truth Gaijin, restraint is needed above all else at this moment." Shomei states with his arms folded.

Suddenly I feel a tap on my shoulder and I turn around to see John Harrison, maybe he can tell me what's going on. "Did you just get here?" I say to him.

John nods and says "Jessica complained of stomach cramps a short while ago, only she collapsed not too long ago. And she's become quite pale, the best medical witches are in there right now. Carlson I take it you can get to the bottom of this, my hands are tied along with the Dean. Tex and Jessica's Dad will go berserk if this gets out of hand, make sure all the members of your dorm get these jags. They should prevent you from catching the illness from the spell cast on her." the guy then hands me a case full of needles with green liquid. I never did like getting my flu jab, but it keeps the Doctor away.

"Will do, Chon Shomei let's go. John will remain here with Tex, God helps us all." I say. The Japanese and Chinese men follow me closely, this isn't going to be good. But I need to figure out who's done it and why.

I was nearing my dorm room when I saw both Rose and Carla Ren approaching me with urgency on their faces. It was a new look for them.

"Carlson, we sensed two disturbing magical events." Serious, Carla said. "We need to tell you what you are facing before it gets worse."

"What do you mean worse?" Concerned, I asked.

"Chon, you are aware of slow and quick acting curses." Darkly, Rose said. Chon nodded. "The visitor, Tex was hit with a fast acting curse, increasing his irritability until he snaps into a blind rage."

"That was used on Jessica." Serious, Rose replied. "This curse will cause a magical flu." She sighed. "Normally, this only effects untrained witches but this curse makes it happen to even the most seasoned witch, increasing the risks behind it."

"Chrystin had two children who were sent to the other side of the rift to ensure she would never have claim to them again." Darkly, Carla replied. "By cursing Tex and Jessica, they become quarantined."

I turned pale, hearing this. "She wants them as replacements to the children she lost."

"Not them." To my horror, Rose said. "Their youngest brother, Matt Moray. With both older siblings preoccupied, she could snatch the boy up with little fuss as use him to get her children back."

"What would taking Matt do to make any deals?" Morbidly curious, Shomei asked.

Rose and Carla's response caused even Shomei to hesitate. "We learned this from the children's father... Matt Moray is destined to become the next head mad scientist."

I continued to run to Matt's dorm room to find...

1351111112121211131111211111112232111212.content:
Ryan's POV

This is a crisis, a shit storm of biblical scale. It's right at the gates, the enemy is among us. And we don't know where they are, fuck, fuck, fuck. We know the name, that's all. And I'm kinda surprised that Rose and Carla have pitched in to help, perhaps they are considering changing. That or they're just afraid of what will happen if this bitch gets her way, but she won't. She might be good, but she is in the hornets nest. And it's been kicked.

I quickly kick the door open, earning a loud yelp inside. And there's Charlie and Chon's girls, I breathe a sigh of relief. Charlie speaks up with "What's going on Ryan? Everybody's bustling about outside."

I can't beat around the bush, I quickly enter the room and say "Listen a rogue witch has snuck into the campus, and there's a curse going about. It affects witches and makes them go into a blind rage more or less, the cure is being put to use as we speak."

Viva and Vogue go wide eyed with fear in their faces, but it goes to relief when I talked about a cure. However I continue with "That's not the reason she's here though, Matt.....your the reason."

"It's because of your family, you would be used as a bargaining chip. Listen you can't stay in this room, we will move into your Brother's. That way if she chooses to attack it will force her to reveal herself, Shomei stay here with them. I must find Elvira." I say as I proceed to move out.

Shomei salutes me and says "Understood Carlson-san, so long as I draw breath the boy will not be harmed." he's a guy I can trust. He was taught by the Japanese SDF to put the mission above his own life, and Akatsuki proceed to shepherd the children into the other room.

I'm sprinting through the school grounds, I need to find the dean and talk with her. I'm rushing past students and teachers alike, only when I get to the door of the room I hear a noise. Helicopter blades?

I burst into the room, Elvira has opened the wall to her right using her magic. A helicopter is waiting for her to enter like a carriage, I lift a hand to cover my view from the stuff in the air.

"Dean Elvira? What are you doing?!" I yell out.

Elvira responds with "Carlson! I trust you know of the disease that Chrystin Bane is planning to spread on the school?"

Elvira sighs, I don't hear it over the helicopter. "As a precaution I have to remove myself from the location, it makes magic uncontrollable. If I were to be infected there's no telling what destruction could occur, here catch!"

The Dean tosses an earpiece to me, I catch it and instantly stick it in my ear. But I don't switch it on, not yet anyway.
"Chrystin Bane will be hiding amongst you, search the records in my desk. I believe she will attempt contact with her children. They are in the school, find them! I will advise you as best I can from an undisclosed location, Godspeed Carlson!"

With that Elvira gets into the chopper, and it flies away once the door shuts. I make my way over to her desk, finding that she must have used magic so that it didn't go flying. I see a drawer that's slightly open, almost as if it's a hint.

I open it, there's a folder there. And just that, knowing that it must be important I pick it up and find two names.

Yin and Yang Granger

Adopted, of course. Both have long blond hair and blue eyes with doll like features and lithe bodies. A girl and a guy. That's all I need.

I mutter something under my breath as I head out.

I stood guard in the center of the room listening to the crickets. The one, Matt Moray was sitting silently in a chair to my left. To my right was Charlie and his bonded girlfriends, Viva and Vogue. They were all good children at heart though they all suffered plight in their innocent years.

I had placed them where they would not be immediately seen but still heard. It was an ancient early warning device; when the crickets were silent it meant someone was approaching.

Shomei's POV

I saw Tex standing in the doorway with a desperate look on his face. He stood in an offensive stance with one hand holding a glowing, spinning orb of energy. The other was tugging on a collar like device around his neck which I immediately recognized as a control collar!

The spinning globe was a mad scientist's 'spark' or energy signature showing their strength to an opponent. Tex was clearly very powerful for his age. The control collar was a witch's device used to basically force others to do their bidding against their will.

"Tex, what are you doing!?" Annoyed, Matt blurted out. "You scared us...." He then saw the control collar and gasped. "You paradoxical, obstinate, irksome, tempestuous, adolescent nincompoop! You let a witch get the best of you!"

I frowned, focusing my thoughts. For a witch to get the best of a mad scientist was a source of great embarrassment. That said, I knew that this boy would be hellbent upon revenge once released from the control collar. I would have to move quickly and decisively to stop the boy from being a puppet of death and a fool marching into it.

Thanks to the strange technology I was sent to obtain during my last mission in Japan's SDF the tech merged with my flesh when I activated my lineage's powers. The technology was to create limitless electricity; it served as a force shield to keep me alive while also frozen solid. With this technology now fused with my flesh, I can generate limitless electricity with my own body.

Talk was not an option as the control collar, or rather, the one controlling it, was making all the decisions for Tex. I sheathed my Hinoken and waited for him to make the first move. Fortunately, Tex attacked me physically, which made the task all too easy. I dodged his blow and took hold of the control collar. With a simple twist and a powerful jolt, the collar shorted out and shut down. Now it was just a matter of ripping the metal ring off Tex's neck.

Upon doing so, Tex was back to his old self. However, as I feared, he was blindly furious. This was a rage I had rarely seen in any human. However, I also saw a hint of betrayal in his eyes. He knew the one who had forced the collar onto him.

He eyes softened slightly as he turned towards me. "thanks." Through gritted teeth, he said. "Now stand witness as Chrystin Bane, the murderer of my mother, faces my full wrath!"

I stood silent as Tex turned away from me. The moment he did, however, I spoke. "Your anger is strong but it is wild, unfocused." Calmly, I said. "Allow one who can focus his anger to exact your revenge."

With that, I sent Tex unconscious to the floor with a quick but powerful chop to the neck. He fell in a heap, breathing heavily but evenly. I pulled him to a chair and unceremoniously plopped him into it. Matt looked at me, stunned to which I gave him a kind smile.

"Your brother has much to learn." Calmly, I said.

Matt gave a half smirk. "I could have told you that."

The V twins giggled and waved their hands, instantly repairing the door. "What now?"

I sighed. "We wait."

I answered the door to find Matt Moray standing in the hall, looking rather uncomfortable. "I realize that this is an inconvenient time but I am in need of your advice." Softly, he said. "I request permission to enter your dormitory for a brief conversation on a personal matter."

I sighed, rolling my eyes and stepped aside to allow Matt to enter. Viva and Vogue both gave Matt and I questioning looks to which I merely shrugged. "He's here seeking advice." Shrugging, I said.

"What kind of advice?" Curious, Viva asked.

Matt cringed slightly. "I need advice concerning Chon." Worry in his voice, he said. "I am not certain how to approach this individual."

Unknown to Matt, Chon was in the other room, listening in. He had stopped by to check up on his two daughters, Viva and Vogue.

"BB doesn't bite." Amused, Viva added.

"Then just ask me directly." Stepping into the room, Chon said.

Matt gasped then bowed awkwardly. It was not the perfect greeting bow but at least he was making an attempt. "I apologize, master Chon." Tearing up, he said. "I did not sense your presence."

"That was because I did not want you to sense me." Grinning, Chon said. "At least not right away."

"Matt has been suffering from a nightmare curse for five years?" Disturbed, Vogue asked. "That- That's unforgivable!"

Chon nodded. "It is one of the reasons nightmare curses are forbidden in this world." Darkly, he said. "However, it is not forbidden in his."

I motioned to the candle that was burning in the center of the table. "Please look into the flame of the candle." Calmly, I said. "Notice how it dances upon the wick."

"Good morning, Mattie." Gleefully, mom said. "I see you already noticed my morning surprise."

"They.....spoke of a couple of people." Jane states, some fear in her voice. She swallows it though and says "They mentioned the names Elena Kurse and someone called Zed. I think there was the mention of someone called Samantha too."

That alerts me. Samantha Forrester?! She's related to the Harrisons isn't she? She's supposed to be a borderline rogue witch, and a prime target for Chon's anger. Has she gone turncoat? No probably not, she's got nothing to gain from it. Elena Kurse and Zed we already know, but Elena has been declared dead for over a year and Zed is nowhere near England as far as we're aware. Still we've got leads now.

"Okay, we know those people. It's worth checking at least." I mutter with a nod to Jane. I get an idea, Lunar might have been created by that pair. Perhaps she can do some internal search or something like that, or perhaps we should adopt a wait and see approach. See if those who made Jane come for their prize, either way Jane will probably end up staying in our dorm for protection.
1351111112121211131111211111112232112133.title: She says she is hungry.

1351111112121211131111211111112232112133.content:
Ryan's POV

I decided it best to tell Elvira what I learned. She was not in a good mood by any stretch of the imagination. Her son's self appointed mission, though noble in its intent, broke just about every rule in the Starmage handbook for students. As for Tex, he committed acts that would make him a quasi psychotic; it was the equivalent of my world's quasi rogue. The only thing that bothered me was why.

I decided to ask Juan a few questions before talking to the dean and found him in the main floor restroom, reading the morning paper while a number of machines cleaned the toilets and urinals. Seeing this caused me to frown only Juan shrugged it off. "Mom told me to wash every last rest room in Starmage." Calmly, he said. "She did not limit my resources as to how to accomplish this." He sighed. "Besides, I must keep an eye on Tessie."

I raised a single eyebrow. "Who is Tessie?"

"Tex's female persona." Frowning, Juan replied. "Tex is becoming alarmingly unstable. His actions at the facility proves that without any doubt. His female persona is far more stable." He sighed. "However..."

"His grandfather?" Guessing correctly, I asked.

Juan nodded. "He has forbidden anyone to permanently change his gender until he can look into the matter himself." Frustrated, Juan said. "I fear that the gender war within him has begun. If neither gender wins, he will fall into complete insanity..."

I nodded, knowing that Juan and Tex were like brothers. "I'll see if I can learn anything from dean Elvira." Serious, I said. "Perhaps former dean Tanaka knows something as well."

With that, I left Juan to his duties and reported to the dean's office. Once inside, I saw that she was not alone; she was having a meeting with former dean Tanaka and...
1351111112121211131111211111112232112133.title: Speaking over what to do next with Elvira.

She asks why Tex is now a girl.
1351111112121211131111211111112232112133.content:
Ryan's POV

I was not surprised to find Tex now a twelve year old girl. I was surprised that she was not sulking or worse fuming at her new situation. In fact, she seemed rather pleased. I turned to Elvira with a raised eyebrow to which she sighed while Mr Tanaka merely nodded respectfully.

"Master Carlson, this is Tex Moray's true form." Calmly, Elvira explained. "Her father wanted more sons than he had daughters so she was made a he."

"However, the transformation was unstable." Serious, Tanaka said. "This is what led to his violent psychotic episode at the facility. Had we not intervened, Tex would have gone rogue."

This confused me. "They why was her mother trying to change Matt's gender?"

"Matt is going to change the instant puberty strikes, nothing will prevent that." Sadly, Elvira replied. "With that said, they tried to return Tex to his original form but, as it was unstable..."

"They needed an other world power to do the job." Frowning, Tanaka finished. He shook his head, sighing. "Even mad scientist must live and learn..."

Elvira motioned to the short and slender raven haired girl standing next to her. "Tex is no more." Softly, she said. "Please say hello to Tessie Moray; Tess for short."

"It is a pleasure to meet you, sir." Politely, Tess said. "I do apologize for my male form's ill-behavior."

Tessie's voice was soft and sweet, like that of a small child. However, I could feel power behind it, she was a formidable witch like her twin sister. I merely nodded at her in response then conveyed the information I managed to get out of Jane Doe to Elvira.

"This is not good." Frowning, Elvira said. "Elaina Kruse and Zed Brawl are notorious criminals on both sides of the spectrum."

"We suspected they were the master minds behind the Light Killer project." Darkly, Tanaka said. "Now we have confirmation they are the leaders of both projects."

"I will inform Elvira Strange." Grabbing the telephone, Elvira said.

"I will contact Devlin Moray." retrieving a strange cellphone from his jacket, Tanaka stated.

As Elvira waited for the head witch to answer, she motioned me to take Tessie out of the room. I complied and led Tessie back to her dorm to meet her sister, Jessica. On the way, I met up with Jenny who smiled upon seeing me. Upon seeing Tessie, she threw me a questioning look.

1351111112121211131111211111112232112133.content:
Ryan's POV

I entered the Dean's office, and I waste no time in frowning at the third person in the room. Samantha Forester, the bitch is here of all places! Mr Tanaka is there, with his trademark native American facepaint and stern expression. The guy's in his 50's, but he's knotted with muscle and carries himself with authority. Rumours state that he has power from his ancestors, and can speak with them to gain advice and insight into situations. Hopefully that might come in handy.

Elvira's there, no surprise. She looks at me and states "Ah Carlson, we were expecting you. Please come in." I only nod and close the door behind me, all the while staring at Samantha. I know about this woman, and I do not trust her. Not for a single second, the shit's she's done. Doesn't bare thinking about, Chon would kill her if he could get the chance. In fact he spoke about one time where he nearly managed to actually do that. And I'm pretty sure that the feeling is mutual there, I make my displeasure known.

"Samantha Forester, Jane spoke of you." I muttered with my arms folded.

She simply smirks at me. "Why hello there Carlson, Elvira speaks highly of you. And Chon too, how is that angry little fool?" she states, damn Carla and Rose would really get along with this broad. The fact that she's here in the Dean's office is the only reason I'm not trying to pick a fight with her.

"Peace both of you. Samantha is here to assist us in our investigation into the creators of Jane and John Doe." Elvira says, pff yeah right. She's just here to cover her ass, something like this could finally put this bitch behind bars. And maybe get with her old pals again in the shower too.....

"Her blood was taken from her by force, Samantha claims that she was attacked and pinned down in the middle of the night." Tanaka states while looking at her. Is his ancestors giving him any chance of checking to see if the woman's lying or not?

"It's true Carlson, the only way they could have invaded my house like that is they knew me well enough. Case in point Elena Kurse, she's the only one that we know is in charge of the magic side of things. And she knows me the most out of all the noteworthy rogues, if I had to bet anything I'd wager she's behind constructing Light." Samantha says, she doesn't look like she's lying. But I know her and so does Chon, she's only in this to save her own neck.

"Zed is probably the one who bred Light with the resources from Elena and vice versa when it comes to Jane, he's probably gone into hiding since that botch though. He might turn on Elena for fear she'll do the same. Samantha your blood was probably used to augment Light's power." Elvira says.

"So what now?" I ask. I'm getting tired of debating, we need action. Or at least a plan to put things into action.

"No doubt Elena and Zed are feeling desperate, they may just attempt a direct attack on this school. Playing to the fact that there are children present. The school is going to be on lockdown, and the majority of students will be evacuated to another school. Once we get word of this event of course." Elvira says as she makes her way to the desk.

"I will consult my ancestors, their sprits can patrol the grounds and alert me to attacks. Carlson once Jane is medically cleared she will be moving into your dorm, that's the safest place for her at this moment in time." Tanaka says as he promptly begins applying paint to his face and wrists.

I nod and merely glare at Samantha, I still don't trust her. If she is a turncoat I'll kill her in a heartbeat if Chon doesn't get there first. But for now I have bigger concerns, namely making sure Jane got enough room in our dorm. She was a big girl after all, she'd tower over Jenny and the others. Hell she's taller than me!

1351111112121211131111211111112232112133.content:
Ryan's POV

"Carlson Jane's wounds should be cleared now, please take this uniform to her and tomorrow she will be formally enrolled." Elvira said as she gave me the female Starmage uniform. This was at least the size of Light, she was going to need it.

I nod and stick it under my arm and said "Anything else that we need to discuss?"

Elvira shakes her head and replies with "Not at present, I doubt the enemy will attack so soon after losing. They'll probably wait and gather their forces."

Again I simply nod, and I walk towards the infirmary. Jane's still there thank God, I was kinda worried she'd make a runner after all of that. She tilts her head at my approach and notices the clothing under my arm and responds with "I've never seen an outfit like that before, I take it that's the required clothing for women in this school?"

"You catch on quick, stick this on and join me outside. Your going to be staying at your Brother's dorm, we're uni gender you see." I say as I put the clothing on the bed, Jane proceeds to stand up. I make sure to look away, she's got a really really good figure. Not to mention the only things covering her body is some bandages, with those bouncing breasts barely restrained by them.......

Jane wordlessly starts to change, and I wait outside. Light's Sister then steps out in her uniform, she's wearing brown shoes with black socks that go up to the ankle. With a red and yellow tartan skirt, she's wearing the black with red stripes uniform coat. A white shirt and red tie, she looks pretty messy though. Something tells me that Jane's not had the chance to dress well in her experimentations.

"I'm ready to go......." Jane mutters. I say nothing, merely nod and motion for her to follow me. After a short walk we reach our dorm and open the door, I let her in first. Chon sees her and then raises an eyebrow at me.

"Get everyone ready. We need to have a talk." I say.

The blind man nods and does so, we're all in the main room. Taking seats, once the silence is present I take a deep breath and then motion to Jane next to me.

"Everyone this is Jane, she'll be moving in with us. She's a Sister of Light so to say, the same people who made him made her later." I say, everyone knows what happened to Light anyway. Best to get this over and done with.

Jane nods and then politely bows, I realise that Jane's not wearing a bra there. Elvira didn't include one with those clothes, we're going to need to sort that later. "Hello, I hope to not be a burden with all of you. Though that may end up happening, no doubt those that made me will come. Intent on trying to reclaim their property."

"If that happens we'll be fine, your forgetting that this academy is home to several powerful people. They won't have it easy at the very least." Chon says, he's rather calming about this too. Usually he can be rather abrasive with people before he warms up to them, maybe it's because of Jane's relation to Light.

Lunar is oddly silent though, she's looking at Jane. And then suddenly says "If it's any consolation everyone I have detailed records of our creators, so I will be able to tell you their weaknesses when battle is upon us."

We all smile and laugh at that, Jane smiles a little before saying "Shall I retire for the evening?"

"If you want, tomorrow we'll make sure you get some proper clothes. Your going to need them." I say as I lean on the door.

The next day.........

1351111112121211131111211111112232112133.content:
Chon's POV

The next day I'm sitting outside, my girls are away with Charlie. To help uncover more about his origins I believe, a magical familiar is something I would abhor. But I will admit having something that powerful in my team is a wise thing, moreso considering he could buff my daughters in terms of magical power. They are already very proficient, they would be even better and their safety is all secured thanks to that magical bonding ceremony.

I am about to partake in some noodles, one of those add hot water and stir sort of things. When Jane walks towards me, I have to crane my neck up high to look at her. How did this woman get so damn tall? Must have been the genetics or something, she does look a lot better though. Her uniform is neatly done now, Jenny fussed over it this morning and Jane just stood there and let her do it. Although I'm a bit concerned that she's walking alone though, given what's happened recently.

"Chon?" Jane asks, titling her head to the side like a child.

"Yes?" I respond.

"Those who made me had spoken of you, the blind vengeance. They feared you and what you do, I feel assured that I'm in the same dorm as you. I feel safer." She says and then gives a small bow to me.

I lift an eyebrow and smile a little "Oh? Well thanks, as long as you sleep soundly." I say in reassurance. Girl's been through a lot, least I can do is make her feel better mentally.

Though this quiet little conversation is cut short by a group of people arriving, it's some chi signatures that I know quite well. The Ren twins and their new little group, I can tell how people look based on their chi. And those outfits and the hair, oh god I have never seen anything so gaudy in my life!

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/fand...

Rose has the pink hair fittingly, Carla is the blue one. They really went overboard with this. The other girls I know of, I keep it a matter of principle to keep track of every borderline rogue witch in Starmage just in case. Eliza is the blonde one, she's a cheerleader of some controversy. I once heard she sleeps with jocks and then dresses them in girl clothing while they sleep.

Erin is the orange one, the pair of us have come to scrapes in the past. She talks a big game but that's about it, I gave her a good few hits and she crumpled. I don't like her, that's the nicest thing I can say about her.

And the last one is Lisa with the green hair, she's supposed to be some sort of artist. But all she's done is try to stick lewd pictures that are animated with magic on the backs of boys and girls.

"Oh great....." I mutter. Quickly eating my noodles and wiping my mouth after it. Jane stays where she is, an eyebrow lifted in confusion. It seems that the girls were interested in Jane in particular.

"Hello there Chon!" Rose says in a very chipper tone, I say nothing but merely nod with my arms folded.

"You must be the new student! Jane right?" Carla says with her hands under her chin.

Jane looks at me perplexed then to Carla, and looks all the colourful girls up and down. Before saying "Um yes that's me...."

Rose smiles at Jane and then says "Let us introduce ourselves, we're the princesses of justice! Dedicated to setting things right where they went wrong!"

I bite my lower lip lightly, to avoid breaking into laughter.

"We heard about what happened with you, your John's Sister right?" Carla says, fuck did they find out already? Word really, really travels fast. Jane's makers might already know where she is right now.....

Jane's eyes go wide, but she nods. Rose walks close, and the height difference is apparent. Rose is about 5'5 odd I think, Jane's well over 6 foot. "Well we'd like to say welcome to Starmage! My name's Rose and the blue girl is Carla, and our friends here are Lisa, Eliza and Lisa." she says pointing to the others.

I'm silent here, I don't like this. But I wait. Jane pauses and then says "Didn't you treat Charlie like my makers did? He warned me about you......." she then leans forward, making Rose seem even smaller than before.

Rose then sighs and has a sad look on her face "Yes we did, but after suffering like he did we learned what it felt like. So me and my Sis found these other girls and we swore to make up for our misdeeds!"

The other girls then form up behind her and assume what can only be described as a power rangers pose, complete with magic that is being used to make them look more dramatic on purpose. I can sense it. Carla then says "Don't worry Jane. We! The princesses of justice vow to aid in making sure you are safe and secure, we can draw on our knowledge of rogue witches to take them down if need be."

Yeah right, those girls can't magic themselves out of a paper bag. Rose and Carla are self taught by their Mother, whereas Hayley and Mel at least went to a magic school. I'm neutral through this, Jane tilts her head in thought. Before cheerfully smiling and saying "Okay! Well if you want to help that's great!"

Rose then smiles and says "You can count on us! Let's give a huh girls." and the five of them crowd around Jane and hug her. But given her impressive height she's still showing, it's like the santa elves hugging Mrs Claus!

After this Lisa then walks up to me with her hands behind her back, I size her up and down as she bites her lower lip. "Well?" I ask her simply.

Lisa then stammers out with "I-I made a drawing of you Mr Chon, I w-was wondering if you'd accept it please. I was thinking of you...." she then shows what she was holding. I can tell what it is, a drawing of me. She's done it while taking into account my enhanced senses, I can feel the attention to detail she's done.

My fingers also detect the two little x's she's put at the edge of the picture. I give a small smile and say "Thank you, this is very well done." Lisa simply bows, and I can swear there's a blush on her cheeks. But I don't comment on it.

Later......
1351111112121211131111211111112232112133.title: The Ren twins and their new friends here of Jan...

135111111212121113111121111112.content:
-Ryan's POV-

Rose and Carla tackled a dark figure who was standing behind Elvira. The dean turned, surprised while everyone jumped to their feet to see the two girls drag out Helena Young! The vile rogue witch was Viva and Vogue's biological mother! How the hell did she escape witch prison?! She was armed with two black magic control collars which she had used to control her daughters in the past. Viva and Vogue turned pale, seeing them only to relax as Rose and Carla expertly pried them from Helena's grasp, tossing them into a garbage can.

"Unhand me, you ungrateful turncoats!" Furious, Eva screamed. "They are my daughters! I will not allow them to abandon their family name!"

"It is you who abandoned them!" Face planting Helena to the floor, Rose countered. "You lost them forever a long time ago!"

"Once they are bonded, you will lose all of your ill gotten wealth as well!" Producing a glowing rope, Carla hissed. "They are not your daughters, you have no right to be here!"

Helena fought ferociously with everything she had. Being stripped of her magic power, she turned to a set of daggers of which she used to badly cut both girls before finally being subdued. The two battered girls firmly held the rogue witch between them, forcing her to see her former daughters standing at the alter. "Kiss him already!" Annoyed, Rose demanded.

"That way you will be protected by both our families!" Gruffly, Carla chimed in.

Viva and Vogue, although stunned, kissed Charlie on each cheek. It had been done, the three were magically bonded. Helena screamed in outrage as Rose and Carla dragged her to the front doors of the church where Chon and Light opened the doors. There, the rogue hunters took Helena from their hands before the church doors were closed again, silencing Helena's cursing screams.

"This was a twist." Stunned, I muttered.

"Predators are known to defend their hunting ground." Darkly, Tanaka pointed out. "Rose and Carla know that once bonded to Viva and Vogue, Charlie will possess vast wealth as well as great power."

I frowned deeply at that as it was a valid point. With his power and his girlfriends' wealth, he has become an even greater prize for his two sisters. However, as much as it pained me, I could not jump to conclusions. For now, Rose and Carla actually did the right thing.

Chon turned to the two quasi rogue students and bowed respectively towards them. "You have just taken your first small step towards regaining your honor." Solemnly, he stated. He rose, giving thew girls a look of warning. "It is a long road... do try not to stumble."

"It is a longer road to regain Charlie's trust." With a dramatic bow, Rose replied.

"A road that is all up hill." Mirroring the bow, Carla added. "Still, it is a journey worth taking."

The two girls then left quietly. Once the doors were closed again, Charlie shook his head. "Give them the academy award for worst acting."

Everyone snickered; the ceremony ended on a good note.

1351111112121211131111211111122.content:
Rose's POV

Its nightfall by the time we get back to our dorm. My body is dripping with sweat from walking, plus not to mention me and my Sis arrested a godamn rogue witch. Mean that is punching above your weight even if she was depowered. Plus we earned some brownie points with the bigwigs, I never thought we'd do that. Me and my Sis walk into our dorm, its quiet. There's others who live here but we never interact with them really. I fling my coat off and into my room I go. Carla follows me in and leans on the doorframe.

"Wasn't that woman one of mom's friends?" she says.

I shrug and respond with "Probably, we didn't really get to speak to anyone remember? Mom always had us on the move. We never got to hang out with anyone besides....." I trail off. We both know the answer.

Carla bites her lower lip. "Charlie, we were certainly not ideal towards him....." she mutters.

Putting it lightly. I suddenly feel an ill thing in the pit of my stomach. Rubbing it with my hand I say "Sis, we really messed up didn't we?"

In response Carla looks down at the floor and pauses before replying with "I've been feeling that for a while. Since Dex told us about that info."

"Oh yeah, that guy was a shit head. I think meeting him was a wakeup call. If even we didn't like him." I say, grabbing some water from our mini fridge and take a sip.

Giving a nod to me Carla says "I also saw how that Ryan guy treats Charlie, way better than we ever did. I don't know why but he just seems so happy now, like happier than he ever was."

"You know why, it was because of us. We could just blame Mom for it all. But we could have done something different, not be like her." I say, rubbing my forehead.

Carla gives me a hug, I accept it. I always do, I can count on her to lean on if I need it. But then it hits me like a stack of bricks. Charlie, we never hugged him. I can't recall it even once. I shiver as the realisation goes through me. I mutter this to Carla. She tightens her hold.

"We didn't. He didn't deserve a thing we did and found comfort from those he knew far less than us, they did a far better job we ever did." she mutters.

That's so true, Carla lets go and says "But today. We did the right thing, I know they probably just think we did it for the sake of being closer to a power source. But I've felt this for a while. Maybe we can get a second chance Sis, we're able to take it and be our own people."

She's right. We can. "But how?" I ask.

Putting our hands to our chins we think, can we do it? "We need to make amends, sit down with them. Do things to prove our words." Carla says.

I get an idea, we saw Chon give the V girls a DVD of Sailor Moon one time. I'm familiar with it, magical girls that fight evil. I thought it was stupid, we use magic but we don't go around in those outfits......

But......

"Let's become heroes." I say. Carla looks at me and I say "Use our powers for good, look the part. Prove we're willing to change not just our actions but our attires."

Its an idea. Carla snaps her fingers and states "We could probably do with some help on this. There's other problem students in this school, maybe we can reach out to them too....."

I smile, properly. "It sounds like we've got a plan, its late now. We should probably go to bed, tomorrow we'll start to make amends for real."

Carla nods and goes to leave, but she pauses and says "What if Charlie doesn't accept us? Even after all we do?"

I'm silent. But I say "All we can do is try. I'll be fine with just that if it means we no longer upset him."

The next day.....

1351111112121211131111211111123.content:
Charlie's POV

The next morning I find myself woken up by my two girlfriends, that and the smell of bacon wafts into my nose. I wake up and there's Viva and Vogue, with beaming smiles. Viva is holding a tray with plates of food, they are already dressed for the day.

"Morning love!" Viva said.

"We made you breakfast! You just lay right there, and enjoy." Vogue said. Wow, I didn't expect them to do something like that. There's no school on today, weekend. And I don't recall any work needs to be done, but if there is then it can wait. Right now I'm in bed, with my two new girlfriends having just made food for me.

I smile and look at what they made, it's mostly Chinese stuff. Noodles and all that, no doubt stuff Chon taught them. You might not think that a blind guy can be so good at cooking, but Chon says that it's because of stuff like that he is so adept at cooking. I guess that kinda makes sense.

I take the tray of food off of Viva's hands, and set it on my lap. "Thanks a lot girls, this means a lot to me." I say with a warm smile. I mean it too. Never had anything like this happen to me before, a blush is on my cheeks. I can tell from their reactions, they both slightly giggle. Waking up, and knowing that they will be one of the first things that I shall see makes me feel so at ease. I feel blessed. Both of our Mothers were rouge witches who didn't care for us, and we found comfort and solace in Chon and Ryan. Two people that I owe my life too, and Viva and Vogue. Two girls that care for me deeply.

Only as I move to start eating Viva says "Charlie wait!"

I look up, did I do something wrong? Just as I'm about to speak Viva grabs some chopstick and wraps some noodles around it, and brings it close to my mouth. "Say ah." Viva said.

Is she serious?! I blink a few times and start blushing even more. "Sister I want to feed him! Give me those chopsticks!" Vogue said as she went in to move and intercept Viva.

"No Sis I'm first! Say ah Charlie, you might want to blow on it first though cause we just made it." Viva said.

"Viva!" Vogue said, the pair are looking at each and glaring daggers at one another. Oh this is not good, I can see a thunderbolt go from one eye to the next. I better do something to calm them down.

I quickly take the chopsticks and eat the food on it, and yep it's hot. I quickly swallow it and say "It's great! I'm so happy that the pair of you made this, just for me!" if I praise both of them then they'll redirect their focus onto me. And hopefully my room won't be torn apart by Chon's daughters.

"Oh why thank you dear." Viva said putting cupping her head with both hands and tilting her head to the side.

"Love was an ingredient!" Vogue said as she leaned on the bedframe.

That worked, and sure enough they are both focusing on me. That's good, and I need to start talking.
"So we doing anything for today?" I ask before I start eating.

"Well we could start looking into your power Charlie, there should be some books that we could take out the library." Viva said.

Vogue chimed in by saying "You could also join us later for when we do training with Chon, I hear Ryan's got a couple of gifts for you."

I smile, everything is on the up. Who knows my Sisters might even be trying to really turn over a new leaf. I still remember the big party we had, where Viva kissed me with cake on her lips. Followed right after with Vogue wiping it off of me with a napkin, ah the best times are still ahead though!

13511111121212111311112111111232.content:
Charlie's POV

A short while later, once I'm washed and dressed I'm now going to train in fighting with my new girlfriends. I'm done being useless, the tagalong kid that was only there because he had been taken in. Now I was going to be useful, I wanted to help and I could at last do something.

I should learn more about my new powers as a familiar, but I want to be something else other than just supporting my girlfriends. I want to fight too, I don't want to be a spineless little kid anymore. My Sisters....I'm still not sure, just because they did one good thing doesn't mean I can just up and forgive them for all the abuse I had over the years at their hands.

I think in the future I might become a spokesperson for witch boys, some might have even had it worse than me. The thought makes a chill go down my spine, Chon had a point when he lambasted magic in general. Although he made exceptions to that, like his daughters and Jenny for example.

And I'm wearing a blindfold now, with Viva and Vouge guiding me by my hands. I trust them though, they wouldn't lead me astray. I hear birds chirping nearby, that must mean we are outside. And then we stop and my blindfold comes off, and we are at a place I've never seen before.

http://images.travelpod.com/users/tcellu...

Ryan's POV

I woke up early, too early to my phone ringing. Moaning, I answered on the third ring. "Yes?"

All classes have been canceled for today, Ryan Carlson." Serious, Dean Elvira said. "I need you and your fellow prefects up and ready within the half hour."

"Why?" Concerned, I asked. "What happened?"

There was a pause before Elvira replied, "The current head witch from Tex and Jessica's world has passed away, Ryan." Solemnly, she said. "Jessica is the next in line. She will be crowned here at Starmage and be taken back to her world to fill out her new role in life."

I frowned at that. Sure Jessica was very mature for her age and very patient, having to deal with a brother like Tex. However, she was only thirteen years old! "With all due respect, dean, isn't Jessica is a bit young to take on such a great responsibility?"

"I agree with you but it is not our place to judge them, Ryan." Serious, Elvira said. "Jessica is the new head witch of her world and I expect her to be given the proper send off. Am I clear?"

"Very clear, dean Elvira." Politely, I said.

Elvira ended the call and I sighed placing my phone down. "Damn!"

Jessica, who had slept with me that night was awake, looking at me with concern. "What's wrong?"

"It would seem that Jessica is now the head witch in her world." Startling her, I replied. "We need to get everyone together and summon the other prefects. We are expected to see her off."

Half an hour later, Jessica slowly walked down a hall on a red carpet towards a stable rift. She was wearing an elaborate but elegant dress straight out of a fantasy story with a number of powerfully built women in police uniforms surrounding her. Walking in front was her brother Tex in a strange suit of armor bearing a strange weapon. My group and I were in dress prefect uniforms standing in a line along the red carpet while Jessica and her brother walked through the rift.

"Tex is carrying what is called a motion control rifle." Whispering carefully, Ozpin said. "It literally stops anything in its tracks and holds it there until a positive motion blast hits it. Perfectly nonlethal."

I nodded but kept silent with my eyes forward. Jessica stopped in front of me and gave a sad smile; there were tears forming in her eyes. I knew she was frightened of what awaits her back in her own world. "Ryan Carlson, would it be okay... I mean may I rely on you for advice if I so feel the need to request it?"

I nodded. "I would be honored to assist you any way I can, madam head witch." Politely, I said.

Jessica smiled. "Remember, you are under the protection of my family." Loudly, she said. She then touched my forehead, leaving me slightly dizzy for a second. "If you ever need us, just call our name to any mirror and we will appear."

"Madam head with, we must be off." Politely, one of the guards whispered.

Jessica sighed. "Very well."

She then walked down the red carpet and entered the rip. It immediately closed behind her with a hollow boom; Jessica and Tex had returned to their home world. Jenny looked into my eyes once everyone began to leave the hall and giggled slightly. "Jessica left you with a magic marker." Smiling, she said. "Normally, I would be dangerously jealous but I think her intention was to allow you to talk to her in her own world."

"She said to call her name to any mirror." Curious, I said.

"Witches use mirrors as a form of video phone." Amused, Jenny said. "Mad scientists jumped it up a notch to use them as teleportation devices."

"Their world is as dangerous as your own, Jenny." Appearing before them, Elvira said. "I have no doubt many witches will challenge Jessica's position due to her age. She is in for a rough transition."

"Well, since classes are dismissed, how about that tour?" Smiling, Ruby asked.

I sighed as Jenny giggled slightly. "This way..."
1351111112121211131111211111123211122312.title: Jessica Moaray, the Head Witch!

1351111112121211131111211111123211122312.content:
Ryan's POV

"Okay, well follow me. I'll take you through the places you'll need to know." I state, motioning for team RWBY to follow me. Light had guided Lunar and Jane around the school in the past, speaking of which we've not had the chance to introduce everyone. I introduced Jenny to the girls before, I'm next door to the girls and Jenny sleeps with me so it was easy. They've not seen everyone in the gang though. Will need to do that later.

"So there's another world apart from your own? And ours?" Blake asked as we walked away from the ceremony, it was a good thing that the whole incident was forgotten. I wouldn't want to be remembered for it to say the least, I remind myself that RWBY has to take in the fact that there's lands beyond their own. I kinda knew that already, but the world they come from seems different from my own.

"Pretty much, it's the same in terms of how they look. Same history, same lands etc. But there's different powers. Here it's magic that is the dominant power, over there it's science. If you look at a map of this world it's the same over there." I say.

"Ah, like a coin I take it?" Weiss said.

"Yeah, but we keep things secret. The general public of both worlds do not know that magic and advanced science is real, unlike in your world where I take it you operate openly?" I say.

"Yep, Beacon Academy is pretty much like the best school ever to be a hunter. The monsters are present, and so are the heroes!" Ruby says, interesting.

"Great, but just remember that in future if you ever come back to this world. Remember that most people here are sheep, ignorant ones at that. We can't afford spooking them. But enough of that, let's go." I say.

I lead the girls past the dorm, well our one. We also walk past the others. "So these are the dorms, where the students live. We have uni-gender rules, but it's up to the students to how they live." I motion with a thumb as we go past them.

"Oh! So that's why no one bothered about stopping you and that girl from having some smexy fumbles in the dark eh?" Yang says with a snicker. I say nothing to it, and make sure I'm not looking at them. How did they find out?! Maybe the walls weren't reinforced from their room? Oh bollocks.

Moving on we arrive to a large circular building, with several windows. "This here is the library, you can find books related on a wide array of topics." I say.

"Such as?" Blake asked, she sounded a bit interested here. Maybe she had some things in common with Jenny, she loved books. When we went there Jenny would take a stack of books, read through them. And then put them back and take another stack.

"All sorts, history both non magical and magical, biology, current events you name it's probably there. I don't think you'll find anything related to your world, but still you'd do well to go there and read up. For the future you know, just make sure you bring the books back on time. The librarian has been known to hex and curse those who don't return books." I add that last part in, I'm not sure if it's true or not. But Chon certainly stated it, and given how much he hates magic that's proof enough for me.

"Scary." Ruby remarks, without a hint of fear in her voice I think. With that I press on.

The main school is a massive complex, I don't actually know the length of it. But it's quite large, me and RWBY walk up a worn cobble path that leads from the dorms and past the library. I gesture up at the building and say "Well here's where most of the magic happens for lack of a better term."

"Right the part to the left there? That's non supernatural studies, English, Maths, all the basic shit. Stuff that's boring I'm afraid, but hey need to do it." I'm not gonna lie I find it a pain, Light couldn't even read or write before he showed up. To say helping him through that was a nightmare was an understatement.

"Boo! Is there any cool stuff?" Ruby says.

"The right deals with the supernatural. Alchemy, summoning, magical studies and various other things. Timetables are catered to the individual, there's not a lot of students here if you didn't know already." I state.

"Beacon's like that too, only the best of the best are welcomed there." Weiss says with a hint of pride in her voice.

"Yeah! My Sis here got welcomed in because she's a pro! In fact they welcomed her early!" Yang says leaning into Ruby for a small hug. Ruby simply giggles and smiles at me. Early huh? Made sense, I thought she looked a bit younger than the rest of the group.

"Don't worry, your going to have pretty much the same timetable as me and my friends. Just follow us when the classes start and you'll be fine, we can't really go in the building when classes aren't on though. Magical enchantment, but the Dean's at the very top floor. And the field over there is the PE place. We do sparring there, hopefully we can sometime. I'm curious to see how you lot fight." That last part I add with a smile as I turn around.

"Oh we're some of the best, not gonna lie! But you look like someone who knows what they're doing." Yang says with a wry smirk.

In response I fold my arms and grin. "Well I do what I can, we'll all see. Oh I've not been able to let you meet all of my dorm, let's head back and get to know them. Race you."

With that I quickly sprint past the girls, only there's a flash of red and black zipping past me. And before I know it Ruby is already at the door, she sticks her tongue out at me and goes "Never lost a race yet."

I'm actually surprised, but quickly regain my composure. It's not magic or science, must be something from her world. I can't wait to know more actually.

Skip a week, enroute to Beacon Academy.
1351111112121211131111211111123211122312.content:
Ryan's POV

"You've never really won until you have lost." Startling Ruby, Chon said from the door. He cracked a small grin before adding, "What took you so long?"

Two small girls in school uniforms peeked out behind him grinning. "No one beats big brother at anything, lady!" Beaming Viva boasted.

"Yeah, BB is the best at everything!" Smiling, Vogue cheered.

"B- But you were just over there!" Stunned, Ruby stammered. "How did you..."

"This is the one known as the Blind Vengeance, Ruby." Calmly, Ozpin said. "He is faster than all of you combined and has moves you have not even dreamed of in his arsenal of hand to hand combat."

"The Blind Vengeance is it?" Walking up to Chon, Blake inquired. "I had read horror stories about you; the darkness and its monsters took your brother's life." her eyes narrowed with anger. "I hope you gave the guilty everything they deserved."

Chon raised a single eyebrow. "That was a lifetime ago." Serious, he said. "I am completely different now; my anger is focused as well as my resolve."

"Oh great!" Snapping, Weiss stated. "More kids!"

I turned to find a short boy walking towards us wearing a black cloak and hooded cowl. He completely ignored Weiss, which infuriated her, and walked straight to Ozpin. "Matt Moray, present and prepared for transfer to Beacon Academy, dean Ozpin, sir." politely, he stated. "My luggage is being shipped to the RWBY dorm rooms.

"Another Moray?" Curious, I asked.

"Actually, I requested his presence, Mr. Carlson." Serious, Ozpin stated. "Matt Moray has the ability to control both magic and mad science without switching genders. Beacon Academy has the means to train such people so I offered to take him under my wing."

The boy, Matt Moray lowered his hood revealing he had doll like features and wolf like ears on the top of his head. Upon removing the cloak, everyone saw that he also had a wolf like tail. "Yes, I am a Neko boy which is a rarity in both worlds." Calmly, he said. "However, my power is derived from pure spice."

"Spice?" Raising an eyebrow, Light asked.

"I am sure you know that witches add rare herbs into their potions to give them more power." Turning to Light, Matt said. Light nodded. "Well, these herbs have high amounts of natural magic." He turned to Ozpin, serious. "What your world calls dust, or a sort of equivalent to it if you will."

Weiss' curiosity seemed to have peeked. "Interesting. Tell us more."

"The spice in this world effects girls more than boys." Ignoring Weiss, Matt said. "In my world, it is the opposite; added to serums, but the principal is the same." He turned to me. "According to head witch Jessica, your dorm mate, Charlie ate these herbs when his family attempted to starve him into submission when he was growing up. You know the result."

Weiss turned to Ozpin, confused. "He gave a sly grin. "Classified."

"You seem very knowledgeable for your age." Changing the subject, I said.

Matt sighed. "Knowledge is power but it will only take one so far." Darkly, he said. "Passion, gut instinct, sacrifice, and raw courage is also required."

"Welcome to Starmage and welcome to RWBY, Matt Moray." Serious, Ozpin said. "You will be expected to follow all rules established here during our visit. Is that clear, young man?"

"I have memorized the rules and regulations of Starmage Academy." politely, Matt replied. "I shall not act outside of their boundaries. However, I have yet to acquire any material relating to Beacon Academy."

Ozpin smiled slightly. "You will get them in due time. For now, let us meet the rest of Mr Carlson's team."

I motioned to the dorms. "This way..."
