1351111112121211131111211111123211122312.content:
Jane's POV

Before I came to Starmage and during it, just didn't seem like there was a point to it when I should be as Jenny said "Getting my beauty sleep." I went to bed almost as soon as I got in, key word almost. See with regards to my physic powers I can't really turn it off, like if I don't do something specific I can't block people's thoughts out. So I can hear Light dreaming about Yang for example, those were ummmmm.....naughty I guess is the best way to speak about it.

Elvira made me a special sleepwear, laced with tinfoil believe it or not. It really does help nullify my mental powers, so that way I can get a peaceful good night's rest.

The alarm goes off, that stupid beeping noise. I quick move to shut it off, 8 in the morning. I needed one more hour, groaning I heave my 6+ ft frame out of bed. Letting out a yawn I get myself dressed, with my mind I'm thinking on how to control my ESP powers more. It's rare, so there's not actually that much information I can use. Even Elvira confessed not to having an in-depth knowledge of it, but I need to learn to control it. So I can be useful and be a good person.

A quick shower later I comb my long blonde hair that goes down to my navel, I really should get it cut. Yang's really possessive of her hair, but she trusts Light to comb it and the only person to do that is Ruby. I look down at my form, I'm nude. I really have to bend my head down so I can see past my breasts, these things always get in the way. And sometimes they itch, and then I swear they actually grow bigger at times! Ugh.

I go braless, from my time being used as a test subject I was never given one. So I'm just not used to it, Jenny pesters me to wear one. But I feel just fine without it, they just get in the way these things. I peer down to my breasts, they grow on their own sometimes I swear.

Once I've brushed my hair I get out the room, I get out the dorm and come face to face with someone.

"Oof!" he says.

Oh no, I bumped into someone. That happens quite a bit with me, I'm taller than most women around me and I'm so clumsy too!

"I'm so sorry!" I instantly shout, more out of a kneejerk reaction that anything else.

Suddenly I realise it's that guy from last night, Scarlet. Him with the red hair that saved me from falling in the water.

"Uh it's okay uh Jane, I was kinda spaced out myself. You okay?" he says in that voice, it's got a melodic sort of tone to it.

We stand there for a second or two, looking at each other. His eyes drift down to my body, and I'm looking at Scarlet with my head tilted. I don't have anything messy on my outfit, I just got into it.

Though I remember he said something to me, I quickly said "Oh I'm fine Scarlet! I umm...kinda tend to bump into things a lot."

Scarlet smiles a little and twirls some of his hair, it's quiet. He then says "Well that's good, yesterday was pretty fun wasn't it?"

"Yeah it was, I never really had a chance to wear yukatas before. But I wonder why they let us wear them when we could fall into water like I nearly did." I say, I really like those fancy clothes though. I felt so cute.

"Say Jane, tell me a bit about yourself. I mean if that's okay with you." Scarlet says, motioning for me to follow him.

I do so, we walk outside to a bench and sit down. People are still waking up so we get to see the grounds of Beacon in a very peaceful sort of setting.

"Okay, well........" I begin, I wonder what to say. "I-I.....didn't have a good childhood."

"Oh?" Scarlet says. Suddenly my ESP powers kick in and I hear his voice echo in my head.

"Damn, that's a bit of a strange start there."

I sigh, I might as well tell him the truth. "I was raised by bad people, they wanted to experiment on me because I had special powers. Like powers that others didn't." I mutter, my long blond hair drooping over my eyes.

"What sort of powers was it Jane?" Scarlet mutters softly.

"I can do things with my mind, lift objects and people. Those are things I know I can do, I don't know if I can do other stuff though. If I use it too much it gives me a headache and nosebleeds." when saying I know Scarlet is probably looking at me like a freak, I make to go.

But Scarlet says to me "That sounds really useful Jane, mean you can do it just with thinking. That's gamechanging, you could hold an opponent in place for your friends to attack. And save them from harm by moving them out the way."

Wait? Scarlet's.....complimenting me?!

I turn to look at him, feeling my cheeks tint red. Oh wow.....Someone outside of my family likes me!

Before I can respond though my phone rings, it's a text from my Brother Light.

"We're making breakfast, get over here."

Blunt as usual. I quickly stand up and dust myself off.

"I-I need to go Scarlet, I'll see you l-later though! Bye!" I quickly move to get to breakfast, but I've got a really happy smile on my face though. He likes me! He likes me!
1351111112121211131111211111123211122312.title: Jane's developing crush.

1351111112121211131111211111123211122312.content:
Amy's POV

Whew! Glad I was able to get out of that situation, I doubt Chon was able to read the book anyway. He's blind after all, sure he can see just fine. But he can only really read something if it's in a style similar to braille. But at the same time......nah no point in thinking on it. Chon can be very surprising at times, and creep up on you when you least expect it. They say that you can't hear him if he wishes it, load of bull if you ask me. There's no way that's possible, he doesn't use magic! He hates it!

Sure enough, the evening comes around. Beacon is bathed in a delightful orange glow, it's really quite something this place, it's overrun with monsters aside from the rare places. But it's got a natural beauty to it, were it not for the grimm this might actually be a really sweet place to live in. But nothing's perfect I suppose, even my barrier magic. Since that Weiss bitch kicked my ass I've thought that maybe I should take a more offensive approach with combat, though I'm not sure how to go about that. I don't really work out, but I have been practising using a telekinesis spell to control things. Maybe I could ask Chon for weapons that I could use, and I could have the weapon move back into my hand.

Well it's good to know that I've got a sort of rough guide of what I want to do, though I should probably speak to Chon and request access to his oriental weapons. Damn, I ran off from him earlier. But I doubt he'll care about that, probably just thought "Meh whatever." though where could he be?

Probably outside, Chon prefers to spend time surrounded by nature if he can. He says it helps him centre his chi, or whatever that is. Seriously sometimes he can be more cryptic than the head witch Elvira, if you can believe that. I'm walking down a park path outside Beacon, when suddenly I hear a voice. It's sounds like.....someone weeping?

Curious, I creep towards the source of it. Sounds male. I slowly move around the tree, only to find out who it is. Chon. I.......didn't know that he could cry, I can see bloody droplets trickling down his cheeks. My mouth is slightly agape at this sight, Chon. You just look so.....vulnerable, I've never seen that to you.

Chon seems to realise that I'm there, his head jerks a little and then he turns away from me. "Go away." he mutters, I can hear his voice quiver ever so slightly. His right arm moving to cover himself.

I ought to have left him, I mean we've not exactly gotten along in the past. But I've never seen him like this before, and it's making me concerned. I bite my lower lip and kneel down, and mutter in reply "I'm not, Chon. Please tell me what's wrong?"

He pauses, he gives a sigh. It's haggard, weighed. Eventually though he does move his arm away, and wipes his tears off. It's more water than blood it seems. "Nightmare....." Chon whispers.

So that's it? Must have been something to give him this reaction, I've always seen Chon as a stoic man. He rarely smiles unless he's trolling me or with his girls, I tilt my head and say "Would it help if I heard about it?"

Chon pauses, considering my words. He sighs and says "I suppose, no doubt you'd remain until I tell you."

The Chinese man is silent for a few seconds, before taking a deep breath and saying "You know I've killed in the past right? All those rogue witches, before I came to Starmage."

Wordlessly I nod, before muttering "They say you first killed at the age of 15, you faked yourself as a hostage to a rogue witch. And then...."

"Impaled her through the chest with my left arm, she fell 40 feet off the roof onto a car. She's there, and the other rogue witches I killed as payback for what they did to my Brother. But there's others, Triad assassins and various others that tried to kill me. I justified it, it was either revenge or that I had to defend myself. But.....the nightmare I have......I'm on a battlefield, flames all around it. On one side is me, and the other side has all those I killed. They do nothing though, merely just stand single file. And don't offer any resistance as I slaughter them one by one." Chon says, he's looking straight ahead. In a very calm tone in spite of the panic that he displayed earlier.

I'm quiet, it all makes sense. The witch community despise Chon, seeing him as nothing more than some ruthless vigilante. But.....I know the truth now, he's a hurt person. Who performed what was done to him onto others, because he knew no other way. But after changing, Chon knows what he's done. It's haunting him, I can see that.

Strangely, I go close to him. And embrace him quickly, placing his head close to my chest and resting my head on top of his. Chon flinches and freezes up, but after a few seconds he accepts me. I sigh, pausing to think of what to say. Chon cuts me off by saying "Don't talk, please. Just stay."

I can oblige with that, Chon.....maybe I've been wrong about you.........
1351111112121211131111211111123211122312.title: Amy's sees another side to Chon.....

1351111112121211131111211111123211122312.content:
Amy's POV

This situation just feels sorta surreal, when I first met Chon I just thought he was a total jerk. He hated me just because I can use magic, like he was really bad. We came to blows more than once, and he wasn't pulling any punches whatsoever. I heard one time he actually gave John Harrison's Sister, I forget her name anyway Chon near gave her a black eye. Said that if the Harrisons were in charge it's just a sign that magic is a blight on the world. Kinda hard to believe he's so different now, but Chon's really hurt. And he dealt with it in the worst way.

Suddenly I don't know why but I'm feeling myself well up, why? Is it because of what I think of him now? Maybe, I've drawn him when he's doing things. We've even had conversations where we laugh together. And I don't argue with Chon really anymore, the times that did were my fault. I realise that now, he had changed but I didn't think he had. It led to conflict because of how I acted, and I refused to see how he had improved. But Chon you......

"I'm sorry." I mutter.

Chon freezes up again, we sit in silence for a few very tense seconds before he responds with "For what?"

I shuffle around so that I'm facing him, for some reason I find myself cupping his head with my hands. Chon's tears drip over my fingers, I then sigh and say "You changed for the better, but I ignored it. When you did I stayed where I was, and I caused you more unneeded pain when I should have supported you."

He smiles, it's a slight one but it's good that he does. I have been wrong about him, not at the start. But I was as time went on. "Amy....." Chon mutters to me. His hands move to my own, they feel a bit rough. A side effect from his martial arts background, but it's nice to have gentle feelings with them rather than him trying to punch me. My eyes dart down to the rest of his arms, those nice, very nice biceps.

"I....." I trail off wondering what to do from here. Man, I'm a ball of yarn here myself. I take a deep breath, Chon's relying on me for support. It's not gonna do either of us any good if I break down now.

I take a deep breath, and feel a sense of resolution in my mind as I proceed to speak with "Chon, I want to help you now. To make up for how I didn't back then."

"How do you....intend to do that?" he responds, confusion in his voice.

Am I going to say what I'm going to? Fuck it might as well.

"I'd be there for you, to help shield you from when witches try to decry you as a monster. And I could.....hold you when you wanted it. No matter the time or day." I say, this is the time. I need to be there for him, I....want to.

Chon's mouth opens slightly as he processes what I've said, but he eventually says "Thank you Amy. But.....are you saying what I think you are?"

Wordlessly I nod, I know he'll see that. Chon is quiet, but he smiles to me. Though he says "Amy I need to say something though, you know I'm asexual right?"

Yeah he did say that, one time way back when we were arguing constantly he said that he didn't care about the gender of those he fought. I think it was all the things that happened to him that made him that way though, Chon's only focus was getting revenge. He didn't a normal teenaged life as far as I'm aware.

"I know. But even so Chon......." I trail off as my hands drift down to his impressive arms, Chon simply stays still as I examine them. This is so odd from how we were back then, to now. And I like it.

135111111212121113111121111112322.content:
Charlie's POV

The training was pretty hard, Ryan's not beating around the bush with it. By the end of the day every muscle in my body was more or less screaming, but I know I'm going to need all of this. I'm no stranger to pain though, had it with me since as far as I can remember. If I wasn't getting hit with magic I was usually feeling the pain of having my stomach walls clang into each other, the only solace I could get from this was that at least I knew I was alive. It wasn't a very good way though I know that, and through it all. From the burns to the starving I could only think of one thing, something I never asked my so called Mother and my so called Sisters.

Why?

Why put me through all that? Did they even have a reason? Oddly enough I never bothered to ask, most likely out of fear. Fear that it would only bring worse things onto me, I still remember the look of shock that Ryan had when he found me. I wasn't wearing proper clothes that day, I had a fucking potato sack on with duct tape and dirt. Though when I went to Starmage at least Mom had the decency to teach me how to read and write. But when I started learning, something just.....clicked.

It was probably to make up for the fact I hadn't learned much then, so I just got everything right first time. I even amazed myself sometimes. Then this happened.

I'm looking at this letter, given to me by my so called Sisters. I have my two girlfriends with me, sitting on either side as they usually do. I always feel safe with Viva and Vogue with me, they actually did beat up Rose and Carla one point. Ryan said "It's recorded on CCTV? Great, I'll get a copy. That's never getting old." I don't get it though.

The letter is addressed by my Mother, currently serving a sentence in witch prison. Not just for abusing me, but it turns out she's done all sorts of bad stuff. I understand it now, we were in hiding. And I was used as a test target for Rose and Carla. It's funny that I get this letter now after my power as a human familiar has awoken, like she's actually making an effort.

With the contents of the letter it's basically my Mom stating that she's proud that my true potential has been tapped into. And proceeds to talk about all the time I was abused.

"It was to try and prepare you for the pain that might ensue in your future, my son I was aware of your power this whole time. But I lacked the ability to bring it forth, so I with great reluctance put you through all that torment. To toughen you up for when it was ready to appear, as no doubt many witches would seek you. Ones that would do far, far worse than what already happened to you. I took no joy in it I assure you Charlie."

Really? I don't know if I can really trust these words. My Mother wasn't a Mother at all, why couldn't she have just told me? I'm not sure what to think, and I frown at the contents before setting it down. Rose and Carla are offering me beaming smiles, though I don't make eye contact. My girlfriends put their hands on my legs in reassurance though, no doubt sensing my concern.

"Have a think on it okay?" Rose says.

"You want me to visit my Mot.....Eliza?" I say, Rose bites her lower lip. I'm not calling her a Mother to them.

"Well yeah, a face to face conversation. Charlie she's not coming out of witch prison for at least 20 years, can you at least grant her this?" Carla asks.

I pause, moving the letter forward before saying ".......I'll think on it."

With that Rose and Carla depart, though they leave some chocolate bars on the desk. Sickly sweet indeed, these aren't even my favourites.
135111111212121113111121111112322.title: Charlie's Sisters meet him, and have a lett...

1351111112121211131111211111123221.content:
Ryan's POV

I was resting in my dorm with the rest of my crew when Viva and Vogue came out of Charlie's bed chambers with Charlie in tow. I noticed a worried look on all three of their faces and turned to Chon who seemed to have sensed their concern as well. "What happened?" Approaching them, I asked.

"Rose and Carla appeared in my bedroom with a letter from... Eliza." Frowning, Charlie said. "She wants to talk to me; face to face at witch prison."

"Let's see it." Sighing, I said.

Charlie handed the letter over to me and I carefully looked it over. Having magic used against me again and again, I could easily sense if the paper or ink was magically enhanced by just looking at it. Fortunately, it was not but the wording of the letter left much to be desired.

"It's a trap!" Hugging Charlie's left arm, Viva blurted out. "I can just feel it!"

"There is no trusting that woman!" Hugging Charlie's right arm, Vogue added. "Poor Charlie doesn't know what to do about this."

"The decision to visit or not visit her is up to you, Charlie." Serious, Chon said. "You owe that woman nothing after what she put you through; regardless of what reasons she may have cooked up."

"That and I find it highly suspicious that she sends this letter after the fact your new found powers as a human familiar came to the surface." Frowning, I said. "If she knew of your power from the beginning, why did she not state this at her trial?"

"If she was trying to bring that power to the surface, why did she use hateful, hurtful methods?" Unimpressed, Amy noted. "Anyone who knows anything about magic will tell you that the power only comes for those close to a familiar's heart."

"I smell a set up." Serious, Chon said. "If you do go, I strongly suggest you do not go alone."

Charlie gulped, not knowing what to say but paused, looking up as a thump was heard. "What was that?"

"It might be Jenny." Lightly, I said. "She mentioned she was looking for something she had lost earlier."

The thump was heard again and Amy sighed. "I'll check it out." Heading towards the stairs, she said.

"Do you need me to come with you?" Offering, Chon asked.

Amy smiled, a slight giggle escaping her lips. "I'm sure its nothing." Lightly, she said. "I'll be back."

As she vanished up the stairs to the second level of our dorm, we turned hearing the door opened and were surprised to see Jenny walk in with a notebook in her hand. "I left it in the library." Smiling, she said. She paused, seeing concerned faces. "What? What did I miss?"

Upstairs, Amy checked jenny's bed chambers to find it empty then heard the thump again. It was coming from a spare bed chamber they did not use. Gulping, she slowly walked to the room and threw open the door to see a tall, dark shadow standing before her! She let out a short scream before summoning a hand held taser and hit the shadow with it in the chest! A masculine yell was heard before the figure fell and Amy hit the light to see Tex lying on the floor with a goofy grin on his face. "Sh... Shocking!" Between coughs, he chuckled.

"Tex!" Annoyed, Amy blurted out. "What the devil are you doing here?!"

"My pet lab rat got lose and I saw it scurry into this window." Pouting, he explained. "I was just trying to retrieve it before one of you claimed it for yourself."

Amy huffed but gave a low coo as she saw a white toothless mouse the size of a pug. Normally, Amy would have cringed at such a sight but the mouse had no teeth. "You are just too cute!" Gushing, she said. "Come here, you..."

She was about to pet the rodent when someone crashed through the window, causing her to scream. On the first floor, a small platoon of security guards with the Moray family seal on their sleeves stormed in with rifles at the ready!

"Secure the dorm!" Forcefully, the man in charge barked. "Find the threat to our allies!"

"What is going on?!" Alarmed, I demanded.

Chon was immediately on guard as well and had already moved her daughters and charlie behind her with Jenny standing behind me. I did not know where Light was but I cracked a smile when I heard his annoyed yell before a security guard literally flew off the second floor landing onto a couch.

"This ain't a forest get outta here!" Angrily, he yelled. Walking back to the bathroom, he shouted out, "You pervert!"

Jenny held a hand to her mouth, trying not to laugh. I could not help smile a little, imagining the scene as a security guard no doubt walked in on Light trying to take a shower. The guard was lucky he did not tear him to pieces. Only I still did not know what happened to Amy until she came down, holding a white toothless rat the size of a pug in her arms with Tex following with a pout on his face. The rest of the guards followed them down.

"We found the source of the disturbance." Somewhat proudly, the guard in charge reported. "I fear Mr Moray had brought his pet Flores cave rat with him without proper clearance from either realm. He will receive a lecture for this, I assure you."


"We had the situation under control you... maniacs!" Annoyed, Amy scolded. She turned to me, smiling. "Tex lost his pet and was just trying to retrieve it, fearing it would cause a panic." Cooing, she added, "Only who would panic over a sweet little thing like this?"

Viva and Vogue ran over to the rat, dragging Charlie along and cooed at the rat as well. I could only shake my head, wondering how things could have escalated so quickly. "Tex, you should have called us in advance." Lightly scolding, I said. "We have dealt with worse threats than a giant toothless rat." I then turned to the guards, my face hardening. "We have hundreds of students in this school!" Annoyed, I yelled. "Your move may have already caused a complete panic on campus!"
1351111112121211131111211111123221.title: A 'Mad' situation.

Ryan's POV

"If a panic had ensued, we would be receiving calls by now." Calmly, Chon stated.

"We were just about to discuss how I were to visit... Eliza in witch prison without depleting the prefect forces here at school."

135111111212121113111121111112322132.content:
Chon's POV

"Me Ryan?" I say in response to his statement with a raised eyebrow.

"Yeah, Chon some of the worst witches ever known are there. I'd want you there looking out for Charlie. To them your their worst nightmare." he says.

I can see that, out of the whole group save for Light I know the darkness that can lurk in the hearts of witches. They have a tremendous power, and when it's abused the damage it can do is severe indeed. I know it first hand, and that was what led to me killing a rogue witch at the age of 15. I got out by being able to manipulate the situation so that I could plead self defence. I walked and escaped punishment.

Each and every time I got off on self defence I knew the witch community knew otherwise, but without proof I couldn't be convicted. It was fine I thought to myself, after all each and everyone of them had a power to abuse. I saw every magic user as a walking time bomb.

But over time I have realised how hypocritical I became, I abused my power of chi and the law. I welcomed Huanle when she herself was a witch, guess the hardest thing is to accept that you have problems. But it's the first step.

"Right then. Charlie, girls prepare yourselves. We leave shortly." I state, going towards my room. I shut the door behind me. The room is simple due to my blindness, but I have placed weapons securely in this place. Blind people can know their homes better than those who aren't after all.

For example my keen senses allow me to detect the hollow floorboard under my feet next to the futon bed that I have. I debate on pulling the Jian that I have there out and hiding it under my clothes, but I decide against it. The place where Charlie's Mother is confined is the most extreme witch prison, I doubt I could bring any weapons in. No matter, me on my own is more than enough. I grab a long black trenchcoat from my cupboard and sling it over myself.

Charlie's ready to go, the kid simply put a jumper on. Viva and Vogue have the same on, I recall they got them after their bonding ceremony. Because it came straight out my wallet.

Nodding to them we proceed to make our way to the helicopter, but before we do we're patted down. Likely so that we don't make these people look bad, Viva quickly becomes flustered and takes a pair of rubber nunchuks out of her jumper.

"Really Sis?" Vogue says.

Quietly I sigh before saying "Remember this isn't like those prisons you see in fiction girls, no chances are taken and every measure of security is."

Charlie then chimes in with "Besides girls, each of you is good as five of those guards. Remember the time you both kicked my Sister's asses? That's never going to be forgotten."

My girls giggle at that, then we all step in the copter. After shutting the door and buckling up I put my headset on, the kids follow my motions. "Can you hear us?" the pilot says.

"Yes, how long will the trip take?" I ask.

"1 hour, this prison's got nothing but sea for miles. So we'll be a while." came the voice in the cockpit.

Wordless I nod, Viva is making various whooshing noises as the helicopter takes off. I smirk. Though I lean in towards everyone.

"Listen kids. When we land you will stay within arms reach of me, this place is home to some of the most ruthless witches known. They won't hesitate to cause harm to you." I say with a grave tone, they need to know.

Vogue nods and says "We know it first hand Chon, but we know what you mean. Charlie let's just speak with your Mother and go, is there anything your wanting to ask her?"

Charlie nods, only he says "I got one thing, I'll save it for later though." he's actually smiling. I return it and lean back and crack my neck lightly. We've got a while to wait.

1351111112121211131111211111123221321.content:
Chon's POV

The pilot informs me that we're now arriving near the witch prison, he is then contacted by someone from the place. I can't hear that part of the conversation, I could with my enhanced senses if I focused enough. But I know it's just the witch prison requesting to know who is coming. Charlie looks out the window as well my girls. I know what the establishment looks like already, I've been there before.

It's a very large series of buildings all connected together, around it is a giant forest which I'm told house mythical creatures that were created via alchemy. Plus the grass is sharp as needles and all prisoners are barefooted just like with most real life normal prisons, there's also giant stalagmites that are as tall as the buildings themselves. There's other witch prisons of course, but this is where the worst of the worst are placed. Those that committed murder for example. Charlie's Mother just happens to be one of the witches that killed me and Huanle's older Brother.

"Remember to stay close to me, do not respond to anything any prisoners say to you. They belong where they are." I say, these witches are staying for life most of them. "There's no need. Your back is a weapon in its own right."

The helicopter touches down, the door opens as me and the others unbuckle from our seats. I make sure that Viva and Vogue are both holding onto me as we exit, no doubt dragging Charlie along with them.

I simply lift my arms into the T position so that I can be frisked, I didn't bring anything so I know I'm good. After all these formalities we are escorted inside. This place reeks of evil chi, it's all I can do to avoid focusing on it. I must be ever vigilant, more so than I am at home. I doubt word has been leaked of our arrival, but the prisoners likely know that Charlie is a male magic familiar. How would they act in response to this?

I care not, again my focus is the children. We go to the main desk and speak to the receptionist, sure enough we're processed through. A whole squad of armed rogue witch hunters with the warden in tow, we're walking down a series of corridors. I hear screams in the distance, likely an evil witch losing her mind. I think we're taking the most discreet route to avoid rogues being aware that such a great catch like Charlie is in.

We reach a visitor room. Zarvesta says to me "I assume your going in as a group?"

Zarvesta peeks into the room, before saying "Very well, Eliza is in the room with two guards. I'll be outside. If I hear any sounds of a scuffle I will be in there, so keep your hands un balled Chon. It goes for you as well."

I merely nod, we step in. Eliza stands on the other side of a glass wall, she looks very, very ragged. Like she aged at least ten years than the last time I saw her, hair knotted, eyes baggy and so on. Her red chi is very present, though its subdued. Witch prison is scaring her.

"Hello Charlie." she says calmly, ignoring myself and the V girls.

Viva and Vogue stand on either side of Charlie as he takes the chair.

"How have you been?" Eliza asks.

That's what she starts off with? Hah. Trying to be a Mother won't help you now Eliza, not after what you did to him.

"Better, much better Eliza. I can actually eat and have my skin heal." Charlie says.

Eliza makes her move to speak but suddenly Charlie leans forward and says "I'm going to cut to the chase Eliza, I have questions and I want answers."

".......Very well." she says.

The boy leans back and says...........

It looked bad until a fist powered passed me and made contact with the rogue's face. The woman screamed in surprise as the blow sent her tumbling away from me. I looked and found John Doe, A.K.A. The Light Killer standing at my side. His chest was heaving with an anger I had never seen in him before.

"Olivia Omega!" Naming the rogue, he screamed. "I thought I killed you when I escaped!"

The woman, Olivia cackled. "I thought you would have committed suicide by now." Clearly amused, she said. "You were such a disappointment."

I gulped literally hearing John's teeth grinding. "This ends here and now!"

A gasp escaped my lips as Light gave out an unnatural roar. His rage was over the top...
1352221.title: Dueling a powerful rogue.

13522213.content:
Ryan's POV

I had been called a lot of things by rogue witches but an amateur was not one of them. I was about to show this woman I was far from that. Only John leaped at her with an angry roar, bearing his razor like teeth. Jenny ran out of harms way, knowing this would be a battle to the death. Chon jumped in behind John, knowing the dean would want her questioned later. Then, a child's scream caught my attention and I turned to find Mat running from another rogue. This one I recognized and immediately jumped in her path. "You have a lot of nerve coming here, Elena Kruse!"

Elena Kruse was the leader of the dark government, an organized crime syndicate of the witching world. Both she and I were on the others number one hit list due to earlier run ins. Mat hid behind Jenny like any other terrified boy as I held Asura in an offensive stance. Elena, however, seemed unfazed. "I am not here to play, boy." Flatly, she said. "Just give me the boy and we will be gone!"

"It's not happening!" Angry, you raged. "You are not using him for your sick experiments!"

"John Doe was the experiment." Grinning, Elena remarked. "This boy will be the end result."

"What did you do to mommy!?" Daring to speak, Mat demanded.

Elena smirked. "She has embraced oblivion." Simply, she replied. "You will get over it."

Tears streamed down Mat's face as he screamed in childish anger. I knew that type of scream all too well; the boy was going to charge Elena. If he did, he would only play right into her hands. "Easy, kid." Firmly but kindly, I said. "I have defeated this scum more than once."

"You will come with me, boy!" Sharply, Elena demanded. "Don't make me kill the rest of your family!"

Mat gasped before clenching his fists. "Not before I kill you first!"

I could not fight this rogue and protect the kid at the same time, I had to think fast.
13522213.title: Matt screams, the rogue was not alone!

I knew that world war three was about to explode in the hall with John and Chon fighting Olivia Omega and Ryan fighting Elena Kruse. I scooped Mat into my arms and ran to the prefects. "Take him to the infirmary and I mean now!" Forcefully, I ordered. "These witches are trying to make another John Doe!"

The prefects turned pale and quickly ran off with the boy while I turned to see John literally ripping Olivia's hands off at the wrists! Only instead of throwing them aside, he used the knife like fingers to slice at her arms and chest while Chon used his martial arts skills to knock her to the floor. In an instant, Olivia had regrown her hands but she remained still as John stood over her.

Chon then turned to find Ryan making short work of Elena Kruse despite her powerful magic. Ryan knew all of her tricks and how to combat them as they had fought several times in the past. She saw me running off with Mat and tried to intercept only Chon stepped in her path. He pulled off his blindfold, revealing the glowing sockets of his eyes. "Going somewhere?"

Elena scowled, looking into the 'eyes' of Chon. "You are only delaying the inevitable, boy! Mat will be ours, he has already been given his first mark!"

She then vanished from sight, leaving Olivia on the floor, staring into the hungry eyes of John. He turned to Chon, hearing Elena's boast. "The first mark..." Whispering, he muttered.

His face turned red before turning to Chon. "Keep an eye on her!" Furious, he snapped. "Ryan, we need to get the infirmary!"

I never knew John to panic over anything so this had to be serious. "What is this first mark?"

135222131.title: Jenny grabs Mat and runs.

Another thing to deal with, rogue witches just can't seem to stay away from me. Then again I've killed a few of them, and they all what a piece of me. Only this time it's not me they wanted, it's some little kid. I don't know what the hell's going on this time....

But I bet this bitch knows, I bend down and grasp Olivia by the neck. And then I hoist her over my shoulder, it's just like rogue witches to ditch others who are weak in their eyes. It made it easier for me to pick them off back when I used to kill, but I bet she knows something. I'll just need to get her to spill what she knows about all of this.

This is going to be a long sit-in, or at least I hope. The fact that I, a man wanted dead by all rogue witch kind will interrogate her is sure to anger her. But at the same time she will fear me.

"Ah, Shomei-san. A pleasure to meet you." I say to him. Shomei Akatsuki, the ageless solider. Don't be fooled, he's sure not in his early 20's. In fact he was around back in the 1950's. "Have you done interrogations before Shomei-san?"

The man gives me a small smirk, it's tiny but it's rare considering his stoic nature. "When I was in the SDF, Yakuza hitmen would quail in horror once I was finished with them." he says to me. Perfect.

"I will play to Olivia's needs, convince her that we'll slit her neck if she doesn't speak. Play to your reputation of terror." Shomei advises in Japanese, and then the woman's starting to wake up. Time to get it underway.
1352221311.title: Follow Chon and Olivia Omega.

I saw two figures jump out of the rift just before it closed with a hollow boom, shaking the halls. The first was a young teenage girl, about Jenny's height with long jet black hair and green eyes. "I am Jessica Moray and this is my twin brother, Tex." Firmly but kindly, she said. "We are here on a mission to reclaim a stolen dangerous artifact we have traced down to this very school."

"This corrupted technological device is highly forbidden." Serious, Tex added. "It is a wishing orb created by a psychotic scientist that can and will ruin lives with each wish made upon it. It is imperative that we secure this device before any wish is made."

135312.title: The next step in securing the wishing orb...

The moment Jenny and I entered the garden we both froze. Something did not feel right. There was no one around, but I could not shake the feeling that I was being watched. This is not a sense you are born with, you develop it over time while in situations where you are being watched and, oftentimes, attacked. I turned to Jenny who had the same trapped look on her face.

Fortunately, I did not need to verbally yell for Asura when I needed him. A mental shout out was all that was required Asura was in my hand in the next breath. Jenny had summoned a harmless flame to her left hand as a universal sign of magical power. It was a magic wielder's warning to anyone to think twice before attacking. She and I both jumped as an oddly pleasant male voice rang out from near the center of the garden.

"Your defensive posture suggests you see me as a potential threat." Calmly, the voice stated. "However, I come bearing gifts to all who merely have the courage to ask for them."

"There is a thin line between courage and foolishness." Serious, Jenny retorted. "Show yourself."

"Is that your wish?" Calmly, the voice demanded.

I now had an idea why the other world visitors stated that this wishing orb was psychotic. It was taking every demand, everything said for that matter as a potential wish. Jenny opened her mouth to respond but I held up my hand, silencing her. I then quietly ushered her and myself out of the garden and closed the door.

"It is in the garden." Whispering, I radioed.

"Was anything said to it?" Firmly, the voice of Jessica demanded.

I relayed what little was said then sighed as Jessica responded. "You got off lucky." Relief in her voice, she said. "That corrupted orb only grants something when it is confirmed what the person says is what he or she wants done."

"Do not allow anyone into the garden until we can arrive." Serious, the male voice of Tex ordered. "It only takes one demand to cause chaos for everyone."

"Whatever you do, don't speak to it!" Urgently, Jessica pleaded. "It will say anything to get anyone to demand something of it!"

I sighed and turned to Jenny who gave me an apologetic look. I shrugged it off and motioned her to guard the other entrance to the garden while we wait for the two other world visitors and the prefects to get rid of the device.

Jessica and Tex made short work of the corrupted wishing orb and it was sealed inside a metal box which was then sealed into another and another. When all was said and done, it was a five by five foot crate that was carried through a rift portal by four heavily armed men in police uniforms.

14.content:
"It's open!" I yelled out as I got myself ready for the day ahead, in stepped a man I knew in my dorm.

He was about 6,9 or maybe 6,10. He had long blonde hair that looked greasy and untamed, with bright blue eyes that seemed to look into your very soul. He bent a little as he went through the door to avoid hitting his head and he said "Good morning Ryan."

His name to the public was John Doe, but in secret his name was Light Killer. Several years ago evil witches gathered in secret and abducted an infant from it's crib, that child was him. The witches wanted to conduct a test, to see if they could instil magic power into the veins of a male.

Light grew up with needles being jabbed into him, tests that pushed his mind and body to their very limits. It left him powerful, his blood could be shed to enable the use of different powers. Yet he was teetering at the edge of sanity and one dark night he broke free from his testing area, killing the guards and escaping into the night. The project was covered up and the facility abandoned, no one knew of where he was.

For the next few years he lived as a vagnabond, preying upon anyone he found. It wasn't out of being evil, it was merely the only thing he knew. But then one day he was in the forest of Starmage and found me, we duelled with my blade clashing against his iron arms. Although he was powerful he was...Lacking in intelligence, quite often he just resorted to brute force with no planning.

Thus I was able to defeat him, he layed there. Begging me to finish him, I did no such thing and put my blade away.
We parleyed afterwards, he acted shocked that this was the first time someone actually engaged him in conversation.

I then learned of his past and volunteered to help him, he asked how and I replied that we'd locate his old testing facility and burn it to the ground. And so we did, I could sense how relived he was that his past was now going in flames. He then said to me that from here on out he would stay and act as my bodyguard. While I'm no slouch in battle I had to admit, having a huge guy that can spew his own blood to use his powers his quite handy.

And so fast forward a few months later, he has taken on the name of John Doe. The excuse is being that he has amnesia, me and my team have vowed never to bring up his real name. And there he stood now, dressed in the starmage summer uniform. He opened his mouth and said....

143.content:
I groaned aloud, my girlfriend was at it again. It wasn't really her fault, rather it was just how she was born. You see Jenny is not like most witches, she is a neko. A half human and half cat witch, their origins go back to the middle ages. Witches who attempted to gain the form of their cat familiars botched the spell, resulting in them and their future offspring becoming half and half.

Neko's are quite rare, about 1 in 100 witches are one. Thankfully there is no real stigma against them, although they do have one major problem. On the upside their magic is usually amplified, Jenny was certainly powerful than most witches her age.

"I did, however she kicked me in the nuts. She then threw a plate at me and I decided to retreat here and get you." John stated in a matter of fact tone, I then noticed he'd been holding his legs close together. As if to numb the pain to his balls.

"Alright, tell Chon to make sure everyone stays away from Jenny's room. I'm gonna go in and take care of the beast. Wish me luck." I muttered as I stepped out into the hallway.

I hear a female voice near me, its faint but....

"My God, Doctor he's waking up. He's rousing." it shouts.

That only makes me wake up more, was I out? My eyes bolt open, I quickly shut them however as the lights above blind me. I shake my head from side to side to wake up faster. Before long I'm able to adjust my eyes to where I can wake up properly. A man who I presume to be a Doctor walks up to me.

"Mr Carlson? Glad to see that you are back amongst us. You were almost across the brink sir." he says to me, checking me over.

"W-Wha?" I can only babble out, I feel like I've not spoken in so long.....I need to get used to it.

"Please do not try to exert yourself. We shall bring you up to speed." the Doctor says.

Its at this point I hear another voice from outside the room, its familiar.....

"Carlson? Let me in, I need to see him." Chon.....He's there.

The blind man rushed in, probably shoving a nurse out the way to see me. His mouth drops seeing me, I must look like shit after what happened.....

Wait......

"What happened?" I mutter out.

The Doctor sighs. "You will need to prepare yourself sir. I'm afraid you've been in a coma, the opening of your world to our sent debris out. You were hit by some and it put you out."

A coma? Was I really out? "H-how long ago was it?" I'm afraid, I'm not to normally be scared. But I can't help but show my fear in my voice.

"About one year sir." The Doctor says softly. I start to shake, my body and its feelings are coming back. But my left arm feels odd.....

I look down, its a stump. Half the length it used to be.....

I start panting rapidly, my pulse machine beeping erratically. At this the Doctor quickly says "Nurse sedate the patient at once, Mr Chon you must depart." I keep shaking about, gazing at the stump. How? Why? What? The needle goes in, a second later my breathing soothes. I roll my eyes up in my head and let sleep overtake me........
143132.title: Waking up in a parallel world.

choices: Ryan and Chon make their way to the sewers
1431323.content:
Ryan's POV

The days sped past me, just as quickly as it had done while I was in my coma. I still couldn't believe my arm was gone, it was as if it'd never been there. But I could still feel it, the Doctor called it "Phantom Pain." where your nerves still think your arm is there and act like it. Chon explains to me I'm getting a cybernetic one to replace it, but considering I've only woken up quite recently they fear my body would reject it due to it. I just want to get out of here and pick up the pieces.

I asked Chon what became of our friends. Jenny is still alive, but is in hiding for fear of those who attacked us. Light and Lunar are travelling taking the fight to the enemy, Charlie and the kids are still at Starmage being protected by the staff. Amy is there too, Sho is leading a resistance movement. The rift was opened by a large army of rogue witches and scientists, who simply wished to cause chaos for the sake of it all. And I was the first causality. But they've made one major problem, they didn't finish the job.

Then suddenly I hear a loud rumbling noise, the lights in the hospital flicker on and off. Fuck. Chon bursts into the room, panting quietly. I stick my head up to see him, a cut on his cheek and he's holding a knife stained with blood. "We need to get you out of here Ryan, they're here. You've been found out, c'mon."

He walks towards me briskly, taking out a syringe he jabs it into my body and injects me with something. Chon says "This is gonna get you up on your feet, it was supposed to be given gradually but we've got no time."

"I've not gotten out this bed since I woke up Chon." I say, I've remembered stories about your body and its performance decreasing while they were out.

"Don't worry, the docs said they kept you in shape via massages and electro stimulation. You'll just need to get the feeling in them." Chon flings the covers off, I'm covered in scars and wearing only a pair of white trousers. I shift as best I can to a sitting position, only to fall to the floor.

"Shit, we gotta hurry Ryan they're killing everyone here." Chon props me up as best he can, my feet slide across the tiled floor like a wraith gliding across the land. I try to find solid footing but its not having much luck. Getting me to the door Chon turns around and a solider with a hi tech rifle enters the hallway.

"Oh no you don't." Chon mutters before the man can report out location to the enemy Chon flicks his wrist, the blade is sent flying and lodges right into the neck. He falls to the floor and gurgles twice before breathing his last. I quietly whimper.

"Chon, you just killed that guy......" I mutter out.

He carries me over to him, keeling down to pluck out the knife from the body. Chon states to me "You are more important Ryan, if we lose you then its all over. You need to be willing to do the same Ryan, times have changed. Witches and scientists aren't leaving it at brainwashing or gender swapping. No, now people fight to kill. I've had to kill Cassie Bane two months ago, she gave me no choice to end her."

Things must really be serious, Cassie Bane was a rogue witch daughter. Chon killed her Mother and many privately hoped that it would allow Cassie to go down a better path without the toxic influence. Instead with the destruction being caused she took the path of a rogue and Chon killed her for it.

I stagger down, grabbing the rifle. It looks really high tech, but it had a trigger so I assume I can fire it. I've....never killed before. I've literally disarmed people in the past with Azura but.....

"Where's my blade?" I ask.

"Sho has it, remember he's related to him so we left it with him." Chon says we start down a set of steps, I make sure to keep pace. Once we reach the second floor I lean against a wall, I find my legs are actually getting feeling back into them. I sigh quietly, keeping myself as balanced as possible.

"Your catching on quick, let's take a pause and figure out where we're gonna go. I got a motorbike parked in the sewers of this place. We just need to find our way into it." he mutters. I hear gunfire and screams all around us. Are these people here for me and they're just killing everyone to be sure? Dammit, who would do such a thing? I try not to think on it, we just need to escape.
1431323.title: The hospital is attacked.

choices: Turns out to be more difficult that we thought....
14313231.content:
Ryan's POV

I feel ill at the pit of my stomach, the world has gone to hell while I was out. Chon had to kill Cassie Bane and probably other people to protect me while I was out, I can't say I approve of his decisions but I respect the man. He could have simply hid with the rest of the team, but Chon has probably been watching for when I'd wake. Knowing I'm the key to the side of good. I don't want to be though, I've just woke up from a coma and lost part of an arm. Least I have a new one, but still......

Its still so surreal, but I know we need to get out of here before its too late. I feel my legs getting back into, I've got feeling in them again. I move off the wall. Chon noticed and said "Great, looks like your getting feeling back into you. We need to keep heading down."

"But won't....the enemy be there? If they're entering the building from down there then....." I mutter, hefting the rifle in my hands as we prepare to move.

Chon thumbs his nose and says "I've got a plan, just keep following me. We're going to take alternative routes. While you were out I scoured every inch of this building, I know it as well as if I worked here. I stayed here as a patient in the meantime. C'mon."

We keep hearing screams and gunfire, but Chon seems to be able to move us out the way of ambushes from the enemy. We step into a hallway, the air is thick with blood and charred bodies. They just killed a bunch of doctors and patients without a care in the world.....

I feel ill in the pit of my stomach, but I fight the urge to vomit. I don't have much in me anyway. Me and Chon gingerly step past all the bodies, I feel myself stepping into the blood. But I don't focus on it, instead keeping my hand on Chon's back and looking at him.

Eventually we come to a door after a trek down more stairs, he opens it slowly. The smell of sewage in my nostrils. Yeah this is the sewers. "We're here, it doesn't seem like they've checked this location. My bike is stashed close by."

We walk for a bit, the place is actually really large it turns out. Perfect for a bike escape, we find a red Harley Davidson bike in there. Chon says to me "Your better off driving it, my senses aren't as sharp when I drive. I'll guide you though."

Letting a recently awakened coma patient drive a bike? I'd laugh it our situation wasn't so terrible. But I can't argue, I know about his senses better than anyone.....
14313231.title: Ryan and Chon make their way to the sewers

choices: Meanwhile with the rest of Team Starmage
143132311.content:
Ryan's POV

I can drive a motorbike, I got my license back in Starmage. It still feels so long ago. Driving with Jenny at my back with her arms round my waist. But I store all these thoughts at the back of my mind, now is not the time. I'm half naked, escaping a hospital that is being gunned down by essentially terrorists and I'm in another world. Fuck, my concentration is wavering. I start breathing rapidly. Chon was able to detect this, I feel his palm on the middle of my shoulders. He can use his chi energy to soothe people, used to use that to calm down the V girls when they had bad dreams.

"I can't drive as well as you can Ryan, just keep driving straight until I say otherwise." he says.

I nod and settle into the seat, its coming back to me. Revving up the motorbike we bolt down the lane, ignoring the smell of sewage the best I can. Like I said I've got nothing to throw up with, so the point is moot. I focus on the road, remembering the words of my instructor. Don't let my mind wander again, I'm not at that hospital anymore. They will pay, killing innocent people like that. This is no game anymore, witches and scientists using their powers to kill. Chon adapted a lot easier, he had.....done that before even if it wasn't well intended. But still.

He tells me to turn left, a bit straight, then to the right. Its like he practised this route already, he was undercover as a patient of course. Eventually we fly out the sewers and into what looks like a small forest I turn right and into what looks like a man made forest path, Chon tells me to drive slowly. In case we make too much of a ruckus. I agree on that one. I can hear the roaring of the fire that is now the hospital, cars driving past and all that. But we've slinked out more or less to safety.

Eventually we come to a clearing, Chon tells me to park the bike. We get off and I sit down, the blind man gives me a light kick. "No time to sit around Carlson, our ride is coming. Hold on." he then starts to hack and cough. Producing what looks like some kind of beacon device, he opens the lid and presses a button before dropping it down.

A few minutes later I hear the sounds of a helicopter, Chon must have arranged for a pickup here. I slowly stand up, he gives me a hand. The adrenaline has passed now, I'm so tired.....The helicopter doors open, revealing Sho to me.

"Carlson-sama! Chon-san! Let's get you out of here!" he barks, I'm hefted into the helicopter. Where I lay on a nearby set of chairs. Shortly thereafter we take flight. I'm really feeling out of it. Sho senses this and says "Rest sir. We'll need to catch up on what's happened while you've been out of it."

I nod, but I feel a tingling sensation in my arm that I used to have. My cybernetic fingers twitch lightly in response. The doctor called that "Phantom Pain" where your nerves are still adjusting to the loss......I black out after contemplating this. Though any sleep I get likely won't last......
143132311.title: A great escape

1431323113.content:
John Harrison's POV.

Unknown to the other team until much later, ten years in that alien world was a mere ten hours in the world they had left. I worked frantically with dozens of stations and consoles while keeping a direct line with another mad scientist on the other side of the rift, Juan Smith, the son of the current dean of Starmage. He was working just as frantically to find the world half of the Starmage team had fallen into.

"It is just as I had feared and likely what you had feared." Frowning, Juan said. "The team had been plunged into Nero Earth."

I sighed, having come to the same conclusions. Nero Earth was in a pocket universe where witches and mad scientists fell into a terrible war with normal people fighting both sides to regain control over their world. Both Juan and I had been studying this version of Earth with the use of probes to hopefully serve as an example to our world so war never breaks out.

"If my calculations are correct, they should all be in that worl'd version of Scotland." Serious, I said. "We can send in one man to help pull them out but the timing has to be perfect."

"Do you have anyone in mind for this mission/" Curious, Juan inquired.

I smiled. "I know just the man for the job."

With that, I contacted...
1431323113.title: Meanwhile with the rest of Team Starmage

14313231134.content:
John Harrison's POV

It did not take long for Mr Tanaka to respond to my call, especially when it came to Ryan Carlson. The young man had become like a son to him. Mr. Tanaka was tall and muscular with longish black hair tied back in a single braid with white eyes that screamed power. He came to my laboratory wearing traditional Native American clothing, sporting a blue glowing tomahawk on each side of his hips on a belt along with a long dagger in a sheath.

"I have read your report on Nero Earth." In surprising calm, he said. "The powers that control that world have placed their entire planet into a pocket universe to avoid their war from spilling into other realities." He sighed. "Only it seems as if a tear had formed and some of our people have been pulled in."

I nodded. "We only have fours hour to pull them out before the rip seals itself." Gravely, I said. "That's four years, their time." I paused then asked. "Do you have a plan as to how to find them?"

"My powers allow me to communicate with other realities." Serious, Tanaka replied. "Since your call, I have been in contact with the leader of one of the kingdoms, Alpha Zeus. He has offered me resources in order to find our lost comrades and return them home."

I frowned. "I am sensing there is a catch to this."

Tanaka nodded. "Alpha Zeus will not give any guarantees towards our safety or success." Darkly, he said. "The rip is to remain a secret and, if found, he will seal it himself to protect other worlds from falling into the war."

"What I do not understand is what caused their war." Worried, I said.

"It was a madness plague." Gravely, Tanaka said. "Fortunately, our immunity to such magics will protect us but we still must move quickly or I and the others will be forever trapped."

"You should allow Juan Smith or myself to accompany you." Serious, I said.

"You will both be more useful watching the rip and keeping it open long enough for us to retrieve our lost friends." Softly, Tanaka replied. "Besides, the agreement was for me to enter alone. Alpha Zeus will provide me with anything I require so long as I do not take anyone other than our friends back through the rip."

I nodded then opened the portal I used to send the drones. It was not large, about the size of an open window but Tanaka was able to jump through without much effort...
14313231134.title: Mr Tanaka.

143132311341.content:
Tanaka's POV

I reappeared inside a massive chamber filled with station after station of computers, machines, robots and more. Waiting for me there was Professor Alpha Zeus. He was a tall and insanely muscular man in a black business suit wielding a staff that oddly looked like a lightning bolt. He was clean shaven with longish greying black hair and glowing white eyes that seemed to pierce into anyone he gazed at.

"Welcome, Mr Tanaka to the kingdom of Olympus." In a booming voice he calmly said. "The agreement stands firm; you have four years to track down your friends and be gone. You may question anyone you like but I ask you not to recruit anyone to your task. They may wish to leave this realm and, if he or she meets his or her equivalent, it may cause a paradox."

"Have you acquired all that I require for my task?" Calmly, Tanaka asked.

Zeus nodded before raising his staff and tapping it onto the stone floor. There was a flash followed by a thunder like boom before I found myself in an empty hangar facing a military helicopter loaded with supplies... That was two months ago, Nero Earth time...

Returning my mind to the present, I reached down and helped Sho pull Ryan and Jenny onboard with Chon following on his own. "We do not have much time." Serious, I said. "You were all pulled into a pocket universe onto a parallel world where witches and mad scientists fell into an all out war on a global scale."

"How much time do we have before we are trapped?" Wincing, Jenny asked.

"Less than a year." Serious, Sho replied. "We still need to find Light, Amy, and Luna."

"Isn't there a way to end this war?" Worried, Ryan asked. "We've been trapped here for ten years, haven't we?"

"It's only been about ten hours in our reality." Serious, I countered. "Hence why none of you are not ten years older." He then turned to to the pilot. "We are ready, Professor, Ry Carlton!"

The side door slid closed on its own and we could all feel the helicopter swiftly flying upward and away from the field. "Where are we going?" Curious, Ryan asked.

"To New Starmage." Serious, Professor Ry replied. "There we can safely plan our next move."

Curious, Ryan moved to the front of the helicopter and was stunned to see an older version of himself who merely nodded upon catching his eye but did not say a word.
143132311341.title: continue Tanaka's POV

choices: A lead on Light and Lunar
1431323113412.content:
Ryan's POV

I lean on the side of the helicopter wall as I look at this guy, he's me. Sorta, kinda, maybe me. His hair is longer, but he has a much more haggard demeanour. He's about 10 years older than me, but that look in his eye tells me he feels older mentally. He has only one eye, His left covered with a black eyepatch. He's got stubble as well.

"Hello." I say to him.

He nods and says "So......Your safe. That's good."

I look down at my shoes, wishing I could just fly through the clouds instead of being on this helicopter. But I shut that line of thought up. I say "I have questions......"

"......Go ahead....." he mutters.

"What happened to your team?" I ask, I dread the result. But I must ask, maybe one of them knew where Amy and co were.

Ry looks away and grimaces, I knew I shouldn't have. However if he's anything like me then surely he'd tell someone about it.

"Jen is gone, died five years ago. The witch that did is still out there, that's the only thing that's kept me going. I've not drawn my sword since, I'm saving it for them when I slice their throat......" he muttered. I look down again and feel vomit in my neck, but I hold it down. I won't let that happen to her. No.......

"My version of Chon is.......He's a vigilante. Killing anyone who gets in his way, he shows up to help from time to time but that's about it......" he says, his tone is a bit lighter. I'm thankful I at least have a good friend in this version......

I open my mouth to say he doesn't have to continue if he doesn't wish to. But he continues, perhaps this meeting was what he needed......

"Amy's version is wheelchair bound for the rest of her life, mad scientist removed her spine. If it wasn't for her magic she'd be dead. Light's is in some god forsaken cave, the buildup of all this meant he could kill us all if he's not careful. Sho's is MIA as far as we can tell. Lunar became one with New Starmage's mainframe in order to protect it from mad science attacks. Charlie and the V girls.......we failed them......" he says as he leans back in his chair.

Ry bites his lip and then mutters "I'm sorry, its not a great world to come to. It's one that I've let down and can't even help improve......"

I move towards him and place a hand on his shoulder. He looks at me in shock, a tear coming down from his eye.

"You don't need to be sorry, the fact you still fight is all that I need to say I believe in you. I'm grateful for the help." I say, god I never thought I'd be talking to myself. Sorta, kinda

He pauses for a moment, but then nods. "Thanks, if I can help you then maybe......it'll be worth it....." he pats my hand in response......
1431323113412.title: Ryan and Ry talk.

14313231134123.content:
Ryan's POV

Suddenly, an alarm went off on the control board of the helicopter. Ry grunted, a scowl forming upon his face. "It's a mad science ambush!" angry, he shouted. "They are drawn to anything with technology to help them fight the war!"

"We cannot take sides." Serious, Tanaka said. "We need to make a run for it."

Ry gave an angry grunt. It was clear to me that he wanted to fight only I sensed something familiar and gripped Ry's shoulder. "Stay on course." Firmly, I commanded. "We are not alone out here."

Ry paused then gasped as he seemed to sense it as well. "Impossible..." Tearing up, he whispered. "Charlie..."

As if on cue, a young man with longish brown hair and brown eyes appeared floating in the air with two attractive young women hovering on either side of him. It was Nero Earth's version of Charlie and the V twins! We all watched in awe and amazement as Charlie fired a number of fireballs at the mad scientists before the V twins fired lines of ice connecting them. Portals opened and all of the mad scientists were pulled through before they could react!

Ry placed the helicopter into hover as the portals closed and looked out at Charlie with the V twins. "It's good to see you again, master Ry." bowing respectfully, Charlie said. "Our training was intense but we are now ready to fight for an end to this war."

"Jen was not killed, master Ry." Calmly, Viva said. "She was trapped in a mirror by the rogue witch."

"We managed to free her yesterday." Serious, Vogue added. "She is recovering, waiting for you at New Starmage."

"We must leave now." Serious, Charlie said. "We will meet you at New Starmage after we tie up one last loose end."

With that said, Charlie and the V twins vanished. For a moment, Ry was left silent stunned. "We didn't fail them..." softly, he said. "Jen is alive..."

"The witch who did this to her still need to answer for her crime." Serious, Sho said.

"Indeed." Tanaka agreed.

Ry knotted his jaws in decision and made all effort to reach new Starmage with all speed. "I'm coming, Jen!" With renewed energy, he shouted. "I will not fail you twice!"

Upon landing, we were all quickly escorted to the infirmary where Ry was in for another surprise. His version of Sho was there with a smile on his face. Amy standing strong on her own two feet at his side and Charlie and the V twins entering behind us!

"How was all this possible...?!" Stunned, Ry demanded.

"This world did not have a pseudo witch until recently." Serious, a voice replied.

We all turned around to find...
14313231134123.title: Epic Reunion!

143132311341232.content:
Ryan's POV

We all turned to find Light, or at least Nero Earth's version of him. He looked nothing like the Light I knew. His hair was long, wild, and pure white as were his eyes which seemed to glow like Chon's. He had muscle upon muscle and his tattoos steamed as if they were on fire. He wore light robes with a hood which was down for the moment. Upon his feet were fur boots that looked like he had made them himself.

"I had developed a power I could not control." Serious, Light explained. "For years, I searched and prayed for someone to teach me control." he smiled before adding. "I would have never suspected that help would come from the sky in the form of my twin."

Ry raised a single eyebrow. "Twin..."

As if on cue, the Light I knew entered with a smirk on his face. "Who knew the science that had made me would save another version of us." Calmly, he said. "I spent ten years teaching him how to control his powers while trying to find you guys." He sighed. "I came up empty each time... where were you boss?!"

"In a coma inside a witch hospital with a missing arm." Serious, I replied. "We got four months to find the rest of our squad and return to our own world."

"Ry..." Timidly, a voice spoke.

Ry looked passed us then sprinted for the door where his Jennifer Forth was unsteadily standing. The two shared a tearful embrace, crying on each other's shoulders, lovers reunited at long last. I held back a few tears of my own, making note to tell my Jen how much she means to me.

"It was the other Earth Tanaka who discovered I was trapped in the mirror realm." Softly, Jen said. "We owe it to him to help find the rest of his team so they can return home before they are trapped here."

Ry nodded. "I am never letting you out of my sight again." Serious, he said. he then turned to me. "We will do all we can to help find your missing team members."

"In the meantime, we will bring an end to this war." Serious, Light said. "Neo Light and I have devised a plan of action."

"What did you two come up with?" Curious, Jen asked.

Light held up a large vial of a clear liquid. "Simple, we make everyone in this part of the world permanently immune to magic and mad science." Smiling, he explained. "This alone will bring about the fear of it happening globally and the war will end."

"The more magic is used against the one, the more resistant he or she becomes to its effects." Thoughtful, Ry mused. "It's only logical that one would eventually become immune..." he smiled. "I am impressed, Light."

"We just need to get it into the water supply of this region." Serious, Tanaka said. "Only it is heavily guarded, we will need a small raiding party to make it happen."

"While that is being done, we will contact prince Devlin Moray." Smiling, Neo Light said. "He is heir to the throne to the new mad science collective and a supporter of the end of the war."

I nodded but said nothing as the Devlin moray I knew was a grandfather and the most powerful mad scientist of his realm. I turned to Tanaka as he began to give orders. "Ry, Ryan, Neo Jen and i will be team one who will hit the water distribution center." Serious, he said. "Light and Neo Light, Neo Amy, and Neo Sho will be team two who will meet with Prince Devlin Moray. Charlie and the V twins will be team three who will use their powers to help search for all of our missing team members."

Again, I nodded as Ry and I said in unison. "Let's get to work.."
143132311341232.title: Light from Nero Earth.

choices: Ryan searches Jenny's room for clues.
1433.content:
Ryan's POV

The door was opened, and then I heard several voices. One was Jenny's, but it sounded like....she was being attacked.
My gut reaction kicked in, I swiftly kicked the door down.

The room was an utter mess, but something else was catching my eye. Jenny was being grabbed, by three people in black hoods and wearing plain white masks with two slots for eyes.

"Arag! RYAN!!! HELP!!!" Jenny yelled at me, she was being grabbed from behind round the neck by one. She was kicking at the one facing her front. Then I quickly realised the third one was rushing towards me, before the figure could do anything I quickly delivered a head butt. The person was knocked down, my head stinging from the contact against the mask.

But I couldn't slow down, gritting my teeth I swiftly brought my leg into the figure in front of Jenny. The sounds was bringing people in, my fellow dorm mates.

"Ryan! Shit!" the familiar voice of Chon was heard behind me, thank God for that. He was most likely weighing in on the person I just headbutted.

"Enough! We have the girl, we must leave!" the one grabbing Jenny yelled, the tone was female yet dark.

In that instant time slowed down, and I was looking straight at Jenny. I couldn't hear a thing, but the rest of my team were bursting into the room. Jenny's face was one I dreaded, one of sadness and despair. The figures who were accosting my dear kitten began to vanish, pink sparkles flowing up them.

"no...." I muttered out, I found myself moving forward. Lunging at the figure and Jenny but as I moved forth they were vanishing by very eyes. Jenny only had a look of shock on her face, but before her body vanished completely there was a look of panic and scare. No doubt dreading what would come as I had failed to save her.

My body landed on the floor with a thud, but then I quickly stood back up. Standing right about where Jenny and her grabber were. I turned to see the rest of my team standing there, there was an awkward silence. I then shouted "Quick! Lunar fly around the grounds! We might find them, Amy get the Dean! Everyone else split up and look!"

I dashed out the room, out the dorm. Panic setting into me, I could see a few students from another dorm look at me. Half thinking I was crazy and the other was concerned. But I didn't care, I ran forward into the forests. I could hear Lunar taking flight behind me, Chon barking orders for his daughters to come with him and help look.

We scoured everywhere, turned all our surroundings upside down.

Nothing.....

Jenny was gone......

What happened next was a blur, I recall being next to a tree. Most likely at the entrance to the forest, my lungs needed air badly. I'd must have been sprinting all over the place, sweat going down my forehead in a deluge. It was then being mixed with tears.

"HUAGGHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!" I screamed out, pounding my balled fists into the tree. Tearing out the bark as my knuckles began to bleed, eventually the pain caught up with me. I bit my lower lip, turned to the tree and slid down into a sitting position.

Why? Why did this happen? I lost her a year ago, that day I lost a part of myself. Now I had it back, and then ripped out of me before my very eyes. My bloody right hand moves into my dark blonde hair, my fingers running through the strands. The left one then did the same as I clenched my head in anger.

"I'm going to find the bastards that did this.....AND I WILL KILL THEM!!!!!!!" with that in mind I stood back up and made my way back to the academy. I must have looked like a crazy motherfucker, but losing one that you love in such a way in front of you would do that.

Right now I had a mission, and the fucking essay that was due this week is going to have to wait. It was a far, far distant second place to finding the woman I loved....
1433.title: Losing one's most precious piece....

14331.content:
Ryan's POV

I moved back to my dorm, a crowd had started gathering and the people in the back were noticing me. They gasped loudly, well the ones who saw me at any rate. I didn't care about the peanut gallery, and so with that in mind....

"Move it. Fuck off, out the way...." I muttered as I shoved past the crowd, I might have done it harshly but I wasn't in much of a caring mood. After getting up to the door of my dorm I turned to look at them all, I chose to say not a word and rushed back into the hallway.

Chon was there as well, leaning on the wall. He must have sensed my injuries, the bleeding knuckles.
"Ryan. Wait." he said standing in front of me.

I went to move to the side but Chon did the same and blocked me off, I grinded my teeth and muttered "Chon, move now...."

The blind man shook his head "Not until you get that bandaged up, I know what your thinking. You want to search through Jenny's room for clues, we're going to do that. But I don't think she'd want her bed bloodied up by your hands if you take my meaning....." he said gesturing to my injured digits.

I looked down at them, a couple of drops of the red copper fluid that was in my body trickled down my hand. I sighed and said "Fine, get the bandages."

Chon nodded and produced a roll from his pocket, he kept them on hand during his daughters training. Handy to have, even more so in my case. I stood still and held out my open hands, without a word my friend wrapped two layers of bandage around my hands.

I clenched them, they felt secure. "Now let's check the room, but there's something I should tell you. The chick you first attacked, what you did took a bit of her mask off. She had black hair, not much to go on but you know."

I nodded, we knew we were dealing with women. Most likely rouge witches, the thoughts ran into my mind. What if they tried to study Jenny, and do horrible things to her? I blocked that out the best I could, me and Chon walked into the room. It looked bad, like a fight had broken out here of course. The window was open and fluttering in the wind, but the escape was done by teleportation.

Just then something got my eye, in the corner near the foot of Jenny's bed. It was a sheet of paper, I made my way across the room and picked it up. It was written in neat pink handwriting.....

"Dear reader of this letter, if you are reading this then guess what? We kidnapped the princess! Hah hah!"

My hands were about to tear the paper up in anger, but there was more to read.....

"So here's the thing, now that we have the princess. We are going to do what we want with her, and that thing is.....Give her to someone who will be the best person for her, we don't think you are the right one. No offense, and also your not invited to the wedding. Too bad, so sad. But we like playing games, and we want to play with you."

I looked down the page....

"You have one week, one week to find out where the wedding is. If you can find us and stop us, and free the princess. Then you win, and she is yours. If you don't, she forgets all about you and marries the proper love for her. Ask yourself, What's a prince who doesn't even know he's a prince? Think on that one, Prince Carlson. xxx."

My blood boiled, these fuckers were playing a game? A GAME?!!!! Oh we'll play a game, it's called "I'm going to find out where you've taken my girlfriend, get her away from you. And then have my friend Light eat you alive."

But still it was something, a clue and a chance. But what the hell were they talking about at the end? Prince Carlson? Was it just referring to me as the lover of Jenny? And what about marriage?

I scanned the archives of my memories, searching for something that might help. Then it hit me. I had an old penpal back in the US, his name was John Harrison. His family were all witches apart from him and a cousin of his, I forget the name. He might be able to tell me something useful.

"Everyone else report back yet?" I asked Chon.

"My girls looked with me, Charlie's crying into their arms last time I saw the poor kid. Don't know where Light and Lunar are, Amy's still with the Dean." Chon said as we walked into the hallway.

"Go and find Light and Lunar, show this paper to Lunar. She can maybe use her robot stuff, check handwriting or something." I muttered, without a word my friend took the paper.

"What about you?"

"I need to make a phone call....." I said as I moved to the phone in the hallway.
14331.title: A lead, and a possible fate.....

choices: Ryan and co come up with a plan.
Using another phone Ryan contacts another friend of his.
143311.content:
Ryan's POV

I yanked the phone into my hand, and scanned the depths of my memory for the number I was searching for. It came up and I dialled it into the phone.

I pressed the communication device close to my ear, the ringing in my ear like that of a death chime. Eventually the ringing stops and I hear a male voice.

"Hello who is this?" he asks, I can hear female voices talking in the background.

"John? This is Ryan." I state.

"Ah Ryan, what's up?" he replies in an upbeat voice.

I briefly stop, how he's acting is in such utter contrast to my current situation. It almost made me briefly forget about it, almost....

I then take a deep breath in my lungs and say "Jenny's been kidnapped."

John then quickly says "Okay Ryan, slow down and tell me what happened. Wait one sec, Mom I'm going to need to talk with you soon!"

I waited till he was ready, and then told him what had happened. Including the details where I tore up my knuckles punching a tree, just felt like I should keep details like that in.
