Once I was done John said "Right then, give me a sec to think....."

The ensuing silence was near unbearable, thoughts were swirling about in my head. Things like why Jenny? What was John going to say? That last question was quickly answered.

"Have you ever heard of the wedding test Ryan?" John asked in a somewhat quiet tone.

"Nope." I replied bluntly.

John sighed, as if what he was telling me was hard. But he did talk with "Think an arranged marriage, but with magic forcing the people into it. The usual one is a guy turned girl is forced to get hitched to someone, usually someone they know. The victim must either resist the magic controlling them and escape, or at the very least not say "I do." trust me I've been on the short end of this test more than once. Isn't that right Mel?" no doubt shouting that down to his sibling.

I then bit my upper lip, harder till it drew blood. My tongue went onto it, lapping at the copper smelling liquid.
"......Do you know anything about this John? I heard your council does tests on each other, tell me now....." I half muttered and half growled into the phone.

John could sense my anger, my wrath was coming to the people involved. He then sighed and said "I overheard the witch council talk about a wedding test, two or three days ago. They were talking about a bride to a prince, I don't know anything else Ryan. That's the truth, take that as you will."

After a few seconds of waiting I believed him, but I was still fuming. I had no time to waste, a week was not much time. I needed a lead and fast, if I was to have any chance to save her. But there was one thing lingering on my mind....

I bit my lower lip, digesting this information. I spoke up with "Hang on, Jenny is already a girl. So there's no gender changing. But what will happen if I fail, and Jenny is forced to go through with the wedding?"

I dreaded the response, and John's heavy sigh told me it wasn't good.
"She would be stuck with a person she'd be bound to. Those who fail normally end up married to a person they must learn to love, even if they are horrible partners."

I felt a wave of nausea wash over me, like I'd just been dunked in a thick sheet of snow with no clothes on. The words ringed in my ear, my right eye twitched. My teeth were grinding against each other, and then before I knew it I had crushed the phone in my hands. I let the trashed metal go and stormed into my room, and there perched against the wall was my katana.

I grabbed it, the sprit inside the blade spoke to me "My Lord, you seem distressed. What is the matter?" his voice ringing into my mind.

"My love has been taken from me Azura, and if I don't find her then she will be lost forever to me."

"Oh dear! My Lord, upon my honour as a samurai I swear to you. I shall do my upmost to aid you in this quest, and if I should fail then cast me into the abyss and leave."

"Thanks, but we need to come up with a plan. I'm getting everyone together." with that I went back out to find the rest of my team. It was time for action.....

End Ryan's POV

Meanwhile....

John moved his head away from the phone, the sound of static was the output. He then frowned and turned the phone off.
"Who was that?" Ms Harrison asked her son.

John sighed and said "Ryan Carlson, my old penpal. His girlfriend has been kidnapped, for a wedding test it looks like. He's not taken it very well."

Ms Harrison sighed, knowing the damage that sort of test could do to people. "You know I had no other option for you John, I just hope that boy doesn't do anything rash."

John scoffed upon hearing that "Ryan's out for blood it seems, I just hope no one gets killed. Magic can't do that, but a katana can. I was about to tell him about that other bonding ceremony, the one you used for me and Megan."

Ms Harrison nodded "The boyfriend and girlfriend one, John I know what your thinking. You have my permission if you wish to help Ryan, I think he'd need it to avoid any bad fates if you know what I mean."

John gave a small nod, stood up and got his shoes on. It was going to be rough, and could all end in tears. But John spent the better part of his life so far helping others with their problems, and this would be no different.
143311.title: Talking with John.....

choices: The mission begins: Sneak into the building.
1433111.content:
Ryan's POV

I had assembled my friends in our living room, it was now nearing sunset on this day. We needed to act fast if we were to have any hope of saving Jenny.

"Amy what has the dean said?" I asked, I was standing up at this point.

"He said that we should remain here and focus on our studies, but what he really meant was try not to be reckless." Amy said with a nod of the head. Our Dean Mr Tanaka was a wise man, he knew what I would do. And he trusted me to do it, but having a huge pile of unfinished work would be the least of my worries.

"Let's gather what we've got, John mentioned the witch council had been planning an wedding test for a princess. I'd say our best bet is to find the local branch of the council, sneak in and locate the records. Lunar any idea where that is?" I said turning to our pink haired android.

She nodded and put her hands on the sides of her head and closed her eyes, a few seconds later she said "There are two local branches actually, one is located in Edinburgh and the other in London. As the United Kingdom is made of both Scotland and England."

Well no shit, however Lunar went on with "My belief is that either will do, they share the same country so no doubt they will share information."

Now that's what I wanted to hear, now the next part was to get in there. "We need a plan, it's going to be highly guarded and I bet they might even try to destroy the records if they so much as think we're there." Chon said.

Lunar then took out a bunch of building plans and photos. "I procured these upon locating the building in Edinburgh, I recommend an insertion via rooftop. Ryan I suggest that I drop you off there, I will then monitor the building from the air. Meanwhile Chon can infiltrate on the second floor, there is a window that will allow you to easily slip in under a camera's blindspot."

I could agree with that, me and Chon could take up the building half and half, I then asked "What about Light and Amy?"

"And us." Viva piped up, with Charlie and Vogue nodding.

Lunar snapped her fingers and said "Viva and Vogue can infiltrate alongside Chon, from the opposite end of the building. Once that floor has been cleared and Ryan has scouted the 4th floor we can check the 3rd one, I do apologize but I have been unable to locate the exact place where witch test records are located."

"So what am I doing?" Light asked, leaning back with his arms folded.

"Light you will be on the first floor with Amy and Charlie, you three will act as a family. You can divert attention if things are getting bad up on the higher floors." Lunar said, I smirked as I saw Amy roll her eyes up in annoyance.

"Okay people, get something to eat. We leave soon, and one other thing. No killing in this mission, we can get away with knocking some guards out. But if we kill one then the whole place will be turned upside down, and that makes things more complicated." I said, walking into my room after it. I needed to meditate with Asura, have a clear mind for this task.
1433111.title: Ryan and co come up with a plan.

choices: I take the stairs into the floor.
I go from above via the window.
14331111.content:
Ryan's POV

A short while later my crew had arrived at the building, the drive there was long and quiet. My hands were flicking my katana up and down in it's scabbard, Chon folded his arms. Lunar was driving etc etc....

Soon enough I knew we were in Edinburgh, the place where I was born. The city holds many memories for me, of normal times. Times when I thought the situation I was in would be like something in a spy flick, but now I was the real deal. And I had to save the woman I loved, and this was the start.

Outside it was the dead of winter, the cold air stinging my cheeks. I looked at my crew mates, I smirked as the V girls were clearly not used to the Scottish weather yet. Charlie wasn't either, but that didn't deter the look of focus he had. The kid wanted to help us, and he would.

We looked upon the witch headquarters, based in Edinburgh's Castle. Wonderful, not only would we have to deal with whatever the witches have planned in their base we may have to worry about bystanders.

But the thought didn't deter me, and it didn't deter my friends either. We all had our plans. In each ear was a communication ear piece, mentally linked to each other. You see I had some....friends who knew high tech stuff, and a while back I did a secret mission to prevent world disaster. So I kinda kept the gear without telling them I still had it.

I was wearing a tan longcoat, with Chon donning a black one. It concealed our outfits, the V girls were wearing black leather coats and tracksuit bottoms.

"Okay guys you all know the plan, move out." I muttered to everyone, we all nodded and then went to our designated positions. I slinked into an alleyway, thankfully it was deserted. I had only one thing on my mind, and that was finding a clue as to where Jenny was. Chon made his way past me, taking his coat off as he did.

http://www.fightersgeneration.com/np8/ch...

Without a word he gathered his chi energy around him and lept to the second floor, perching himself on a ledge near a window. I then took something out of my coat, a grapple gun for getting to the 4th floor.
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Vonlk1y-nUE/T1...

I fire it at the roof and fling myself upwards, my coat coming off as I did so. My katana was strapped to my back, the scabbard blending in with my attire.
http://data3.whicdn.com/images/1814755/o...

As I reach the roof I allow the helmet to close on my head, the suit was a nifty little thing I used to stop a space station from firing at Earth. It allowed me to breath in dangerous environments, kept track of my vitals. And allowed me to communicate with my crew, the greatest suit of armour for a modern day ninja like myself.

The rooftop was empty, except for two witches. Dressed in black dresses, they didn't see me. I was coming up from the cold alleyway after all, they were admiring the view and having a smoke. This was my perfect chance to strike.

I might as well have been a ghost, they didn't suspect a thing. And then I was right behind them, one took a final puff from her cig. And then....BAM! I smashed both of their heads together in a meeting of the minds, the result was them falling down like potato sacks.

After doing this I put my hand to my ear and said "Asura reporting, does everyone copy?"

"Revenge reporting in." I heard Chon's voice.

"Mini ninjas reporting in." Viva and Vouge chimed in.

"Eyes in the sky reporting in." Lunar said.

"Magic family reporting in." Amy said.

I then took a deep breath and said "Okay people this is our chance, I'm not going to bother with any motivational speeches. The more time we waist the less chance we have of saving Jenny, you all know what's at stake here. Let's get this done and be onto finding Jenny, good luck."

With that the mission had begun, I looked about on the roof. There were two routes I could take, either the stairs at which the witches came from. Or use the ceiling window, the stairs could be an easier option but more closely guarded. Whereas with the window I could have the chance of surprise.
14331111.title: The mission begins: Sneak into the building.

choices: Shake down the guard and find out what she knows.
Take a closer look at the books.
143311112.content:
Ryan's POV

I decided that taking the stairs probably wasn't a good idea, and besides there could be security measures that we don't know about. With that in mind I made certain to drag the knocked out bodies in a corner that was obscured, granted it wasn't the best but at least they wouldn't be seen right off the bat.

After moving them, I looked at the large ceiling window. Taking a chance I peaked in through it, all I could see was a large wooden floor. With several books on display, I also caught a glimpse of a witch security guard. Dressed in the same black dress as the two on the roof, obviously it wasn't a place to be seen in. But my intention was to get in there, and I needed to do it.

"Asura to Eyes in sky, are there any cams on the 4th floor?" I asked using my ear piece.

"None in the room your looking at Asura, it's chalked up to faulty wiring. There's cameras in all the other rooms on the floor, but none in your room. I recommend a swift and silent entry, Eyes out." Lunar's calm and monotone voice went off my ear after hearing that, seeing that the guard had just left I figured now was my chance.

I slid my katana blade near the window, and slotted it in. I then gently began moving the sword up and down, until I managed to force it to open ever so slightly. I then opened it fully with my hands, and sure enough there was no alarm. Thank God for that.

I then gripped the window's frame and stuck my legs in, I then hung my body so that I was dangling inside the room. Dropping down I landed so that my weight was spread out, and the drop was light. I allowed only a minor thumping noise to give away my position.

"This is Asura, I'm in the building. Revenge what's your status?" I muttered.

"In the building, mini ninjas 1 and 2 are en route to my location. How's the floor looking Asura, we got any records yet?" Chon asked me.

"Just got in, will look now. Asura out." I responded.

Looking around I decided my best bet was to try and find a lead, a hint as to where the possible records may be kept.
"That guard might know something, better shake someone down." I thought to myself. These books looked more like relics and artefacts to be looked upon by tourists, but they might be useful. At the same time though they could be trapped and I could end up compromising the mission.

I then decided to.....
143311112.title: Sneaking in from above.

1433111121.content:
Ryan's POV

I figured my best bet was a shakedown, the guard might have been at this place for a long time. So she might know something, only catch was now I had to catch her. It was risky following her out this room, needed to lure her in somehow without being detected.

I had an idea, I pounded my sword's scabbard on the ground. Like a book dropping or something, and I did that a couple of times. I then heard footsteps approaching from right in front of me, using my speed I silently moved so that the door would open with the wood covering me.

The witch guard went forward, and in a second I had kicked the door behind me and grabbed her neck with my arms. My katana's blade at her neck, her face appearing in the gleaming reflection of the steel.

"Tell me what I want to know, or I stuff your body in the girl's bathroom." I grimly muttered, moving the blade closer to her neck.

"What...do you want to know?" she said, I could smell the fear in her. I didn't blame her, I took her by surprise in the blink of an eye. Pressing an blade close to the neck, I was like the silent reaper. Here to collect.

"You witches do tests on people, I want to know where you keep these records. If I don't like your answer then you lose a pint of blood, clear?" I muttered.

"You....need to be specific, what sort of tests? Is this one?" she responded back.

I got an idea, I nodded and said "Damm, you catch on quick. Boss she's found out, what do I do? Really? Ok I'll tell her." this was a bluff. But she had no way of knowing that with my ninja mask on.

"You've passed Ms, this was a test to see if you can handle pressure and remain calm against an intruder. Well done. I'll go and store the report myself. Where do I put the security test reports?" I asked.

"Uh it's on the third floor, in the east wing. They're below the royalty records and wedding tests, can you let go now?" she asked, her tone hopeful.

I grinned under my mask and said "Of course." quickly brining up my katana to bash her over the head. She slumped down like a bunch of potatoes, fucking naïve. But her loss was my gain, for I had the knowledge I was seeking. And sooner than I thought.

"Revenge this is Asura, I've got the location of the records over."

"Copy Asura, Revenge has met with the mini ninjas. Where's it at over?"

"Third floor, east wing. Will meet there, over and out." I cut off the communications, I had a body to hide. Those girls on the roof still wouldn't be up, I hit them pretty hard. So they could use some extra company, but I knew we'd be on a time limit. That guard wouldn't be on the cameras anymore, so they might come checking.

But after sticking her near the glass window I figured I was safe for now, and with that it was time for me to meet with Chon.
1433111121.title: Shake down the guard and find out what she knows.

14331111211.content:
Ryan's POV

I look around the room before going any further, I know the layout of the building by heart. But still there was the off chance that Lunar's info could be out of date, I thought about using the vent. But I decided it'd be too much hassle and noise, no better to sneak around the cameras to meet with Chon.

I open the nearest door, recalling that it was the quickest way to the stairs. But I do not peak my head out, instead using the reflection of my katana at the foot of the door. Less likely to be noticed that way, I can see no cameras. I then slowly push the door forward, trying my best to block out the noise of my rising heartbeat. It turns out the camera is above me, I shake my head.

Knowing how easy it is I slide into the room, closing the door behind me while remaining in the camera's blindspot. I then time my movements, staying close and under it's field of view thanks to the various items on display. As I'm hiding under a small bookcase my earpiece pops up with "Magic family to Azura, come in."

I stop moving, remaining in my hiding place as I mutter "What is it over?"

"They're closing down for the night, we're outside the building in an alleyway." Amy muttered to me.

There goes our distraction, but we'll be alright. Just need to find the records and we'll be out of here.
"Roger magic family, go back to the meeting spot. Over and out." I muttered, cutting off contact.

With that it meant that security might get ramped up, the more time we wasted the more chance of being caught. My thoughts turned to Jenny, was she okay? I hated not knowing my love was okay, hated the fact that I might lose her.
But sometimes you find things in life, things that are worth fighting for. Jenny Forth was to me, one of those things.

I made my way to the stairwell, it was bathed in darkness besides a window. Said window was brining in yellow light from the lamppost nearby, I heard footsteps. Someone was coming.

I hug the wall and crouch down, making my way quietly under the window. The witch guard was walking up the floor, past me without even knowing I was there. I was a true ninja, she was right there and yet had no idea.

Wasting no time I moved to the third floor, whereupon entering I heard a "Pisst." noise.

Looking up it was Chon, with his daughters hiding in the rafters above. I spotted a large wooden beam, that would enable me to join them up there. And so I did, the room was large. With a main floor and a pair of mini stairs that led up to where I was, the guards hadn't come over here yet.

And without a hitch I joined them there, whereupon we could examine the entire area.
"You spotted the vault?" I muttered.

Viva nodded and pointed at a golden door, complete with bars and chains.
"Any ideas?" Vouge muttered.

"There's a vent that's above the door, not too far from our location. BB you and Ryan can enter through it. We'll watch the situation from here." Viva said. I was kinda taken aback by what the girl was saying. More in the tone, how it was to the point.

Chon saw the logic however and nodded, patting me on the shoulder. With that we crawled around on the rafter beams, till we were above the vent. Gently landing on the carpet below. This was it, Jenny's location could be in this room. I hoped to God it was.
14331111211.title: Continue with Ryan

choices: The next day the team puts together what they learned.
143311112111.content:
Ryan's POV

The room looked ancient, like a dusty old place of records should in my mind. The soft carpet below padded me and Chon's footsteps, we went low and checked the area out.

"Two guards, let's sneak past. I'll reckon that some of these records are written in braille. Some witches are going to be blind of course." Chon muttered as he sensed the chi energy of two guards patrolling this area.

There wasn't any cameras though, strange. My guess.....

"Be careful, there might be hidden magic here. You stay and keep an eye on things, I'll go alone and look for the records."
I muttered as I began sneaking forth.

Chon nodded, he then put his hands to his blindfold. And began muttering in Mandarin, no doubt focusing on detecting as many things as he could. With that I began to move, slinking between bookcases, tables, and other things. Those guards didn't stand a chance at spotting me, I was like a sliver of glass. My footsteps light as a feather.

I looked at the various signs for guidance, stopping at one that read "Witch tests"
This had to be what I was looking for, my hunch was that Jenny had been kidnapped by this council. And what John said to me earlier fit the contents of the letter left when Jenny was kidnapped.

"Asura to crew, located the goods. Will move in for closer look. Over and out." I mutter into my earpiece, cutting off before anyone can answer.

With that I take a look around, checking for any hidden things to attack me. There are none and I'm good to go, I gently and gingerly creep into the large room.

There are rows upon rows of scrolls, under them are letters of the alphabet. My eyes scan them, I decide to look for J first. And then F if they are going by second names.

"Let's see....John, not Harrison.....Got it! Jenny Forth." I mutter to myself, I suspect the knotted rope is enchanted by magic. But I think the suit I'm wearing is nullifying it, I don't care so long as I'm not caught and find out what's happening.

I unfold the scroll, reading the contents from left to right.

Subject name: Jenny Forth
Age: 16
Nationality: British
Test: Wedding test
Role in test: Subject has been kidnapped from her school known as Starmage Academy, target is to be placed into an arranged marriage with "The Groom" in one week's time following this writing. Ryan Carlson must locate the subject within that time and prevent her from saying "I do." to the groom. If he cannot then the subject will be forced into marriage with the groom and her memories of Ryan Carlson erased and replaced with the groom in his place.

My face went pale, my blood turned cold. This was my biggest fear, that I would become just a stranger to her. No, I wouldn't allow it. I loved Jenny Forth with all my heart, no matter what. I read on.

Wedding will take place in New York City, at one chapel within the city.
Other notes: This is a high security test, maximum priority. Lethal force authorised to remove test interference from Ryan Carlson, his friends and any other threats are to be dealt with swiftly.

They were going to try and kill me if I tried to stop them? Fine, I knew people were going to leave in body bags anyway. Sure as shit won't be me, they have taken one of the most precious things away from me. And I will travel through hell, and fall through a dark abyss just to find her once again.

I look further into it.

Also if Ryan Carlson should succeed in this test, then he shall be placed in the position of "British ruler." within our society. He is most likely unaware of his lineage, no doubt his Mother hasn't told him of this.

With that I fold it up and stick in my coat, thoughts swirling about in my mind. I couldn't make sense of it, but I had what I came for.

"Asura here, let's pull out and meet at extraction." I mutter in my earpiece. As I walk past I accidently brush up against a scroll that falls down, I turn to pick it up when I see the name on it.

"Chon Kay."

I frown, is Chon being tested as well? I don't entertain the thought as I want to head out of here, I fold up his scroll and silently leave the room.
143311112111.title: The plan goes smoothly.

choices: A short while later Ryan goes to his Mom's house.
Their breaking and entering hasn't gone unoticed by the witch council.
1433111121111.content:
Ryan's POV

The trip back to Starmage was quiet, no one wanted to say a thing. We had lost one of our own, I had a lost a part of myself. No one liked that when it happened to them, I had it happen once and I'll be dammed if I let it happen a second time.

As soon as we all arrived in our dorm we all went to our beds without a word, I didn't even bother getting my outfit off. I just chucked the covers over myself and shut my eyes, even then I couldn't really sleep. Not with everything that had happened today, we had six days left.

My room was pitch black, and I couldn't tell if my eyes were shut or not. I just let the darkness swallow me as I tried to rest, but I doubted I would.

Eventually though I must have fallen asleep, for I could hear the sounds of birds chirping outside. And the moving chairs outside my door, it must be time for breakfast. I remove my armour, stick on a pair of blue jeans and enter the kitchen. And in an instant everyone stops what they are doing and look right at me, with concern on their faces.

They know that out of all of us I'm the one most affected by Jenny's kidnapping, I love her. Still do after all this time, and yet fate conspires to stop us. Well I'm not going to let that happen so long as I still breathe, I'm not showing how I'm hurt though. The last thing my friends need is to see their leader distraught.

Light offers me a piece of toast, I take it and wolf it down. And then wipe my mouth and say "Okay people, we did great last night. And we know where we are going, it's New York. As soon as we're done here I want you all to pack your bags, preferably for a week. Chon I need to have a word with you alone."

With that the blind man frowns under his blindfold, but walks into my room with me. He sits on the bed while I stand up.
"What's this about?" he says to me.

I take a deep breath and say to him "Do you recall when I snuck into the testing documents room?"

He nods, and I open up the scroll in front of him. "I found one scroll with your name on it. I'll read it aloud to you."

Chon's eyebrows lift up above his blindfold, but he remains quiet and nods.

I look through the contents, and what I see makes me gasp.
"What is it?" he asks me.

I read it through once again, there's no denying this. If the witch council wrote it then it must be true.
"Chon....It says here you have a younger Sister...." I mutter to him.

Upon hearing this the blind man lifts his head and opens his mouth in shock. "W-What?!"

"It says she's studying at witchbloom academy in the US, she's two years younger than you. Qi Kay, that's what her name is." I respond back.

Chon shakes his head in denial "I-Impossible! I only had my Brother, my parents walked out on me!"

"It says here that neither you or her were meant to find out the other existed. It says that you were not to be trusted considering that you have killed rouge witches in the past and hold an immense anger for magic in general."

Chon took a deep breath "Well they're right about the fact that I have killed in the past, what should I do?"

"You want to know what I think? Go for it man, find her." I say to him.

The blind man is about to open his mouth to speak but I cut him off with "Don't feed me any of that "I'm a monster and she wouldn't want to know me." crap. You have changed, you don't kill anymore. You've adopted witch girls under your care, you are a good person Chon. Prove that and they will show her to you."

Chon is silent, leaning his body towards me as he puts a hand on his chin. He then nods and says "Your right, I need to do this. But we can find her later, right now our priority is saving Jenny. Once she's safe with you we'll find her."

I respond with a nod and we leave the room, Chon then mutters to me "Thank you Ryan."

I smile and say "No worries dude."

Everyone begins packing bags, I've done mine. But there's something on my mind, what did that document mean by British ruler? My Mother hasn't told me everything, I assume it was to protect me. But the truth is going to be coming out, and before I leave I need answers from her.

"Listen guys I need to go back to Edinburgh, I need to speak to my Mom about something. It's very important." I say while getting everyone's attention.

"What is it Ryan?" Light asks.

I sigh, I still don't know enough pieces of the puzzle yet. But I say "I'm not sure yet, but I need to ask her a question and get something cleared up. Once I do I'll tell you guys, it's just I want to make sure before we make any rash assumptions."

Everyone shows their trust in me, we're a united front. Someone has taken my girlfriend, and I won't rest until I save her. Even if I die trying.....
1433111121111.title: The next day the team puts together what they l...

choices: On the flight to New York.
Ryan is attacked and knocked out upon arriving back.
14331111211111.content:
Ryan's POV

While everyone unpacks I make my way over to the academy, moving past the students. They've probably heard the rumours about Jenny being kidnapped, but no one bothers to say anything about it to me. That's fine, I prefer it that way. I've got things to deal with anyway, I'm heading to the school's teleportation room.

I go up to the man at the desk and say "I'd like to request transport from here to Edinburgh please."

The receptionist looks at me with his owl like eyes through large glasses "State your purpose for doing it please."

"My Mother has been keeping a secret from me, and I need to confront her about this in person." I state cleanly and upfront.

What I said appeared to resonate with the man, for he nodded slightly and said "Very well, your address?"

I write it down for him on a piece of paper, he takes and nods saying "I shall teleport you to the front door, don't worry about other people seeing you. As far as they'll know you just walked up to it, is this a one way trip or back?"

"I'd like to come back after it please." I state.

In response the receptionist hands me a wristband with the school's logo of a shield, and a sword and wand crossing over it. "Press the symbol to arrive back here, take your time though." he says to me.

I give my thanks to him and near one of the teleporters, it had a sliver floor and upon entering it I was covered by a glass capsule. "Location?" it says to me. I state Edinburgh and the address of where my Mother lived. Shortly after my vision gets covered by a bright flash of light.

By the time it clears I'm standing in a flat, with the door of my Mother's apartment in front of me. I take a moment to compose myself, looking out the nearby window to see the hustle and bustle of traffic down below. After doing that I take a deep breath and raise my right hand to the door, giving a few gentle raps on the wood.

"Who is it?" I hear a female voice inside.

"It's me Ryan." I respond. There's a pause, and then I hear footsteps coming to the door. They stop and then the door is opened. My Mother is standing there. She looks about the same as the last time I saw her, she's pushing her 40's now. With a slim body and blonde hair in a ponytail, clear blue eyes and thin eyebrows on her face go wide as she sees me.

"Ryan! Please come in!" she says, giving me a hug. I sigh happily and hug her back. It's been quite a while since I last saw my Mother, I've been too busy with schoolwork and the like. Not to mention that Starmage is basically on the other side of Scotland.

"Thanks." I say to her as I take a seat in the living room, it's all familiar. Even the dark blue couch I'd spend everyday watching TV with her.

"Can I get you anything?" she asks me, I respond by saying I'd like a glass of water. She gets me one from the nearby kitchen.

After accepting it and taking a sip she sits next to me and says "So is there anything wrong? How's Jenny?"

Upon hearing that I wince, and bite my lower lip. My Mother picks this up right away and says "Dearie did something happen?"

I take a sigh and set my glass of water down on the floor, this is going to require a lot of talking. But I waste no time in bringing her up to speed, I tell her everything that's happened to me yesterday. From Jenny being kidnapped to the letter that was left. Then the fact she seems to be forced into an arranged wedding to me breaking and entering the witch council's building for records.

After saying this my Mom's in shock, putting a hand to her mouth. I'm trying my best not to start freaking out, although I'm most likely failing at that. But I managed to say "Mom I have to ask, what the hell does Prince Carlson mean? And British ruler?"

My Mom sighs heavily, trying not to make eye contact with me. She then stands up and walks over to the window, sighing after it. Then she turns to me as I say "Mom please answer me. This is important to Jenny's wellbeing!"

She then says to me "Do you remember the things I told you? About the great war that raged between scientists, witches and evils that man shudders to think of?"

I nod, how could I not? Hell Starmage was built as a sign of peace following that. "Yeah, let me guess this has something to do with you?"

My Mother sadly nods and replies with "I was to become the next in line for Britain's royal leader in the supernatural world."

I stay silent, I can tell she has more to say. She goes on with "But in that final battle, I lost your Father. He died holding off enemy forces by himself, I was pregnant with you. I knew that it would be chaos, and I didn't want you to have that my son. I fled as a single Mother, I wanted to raise you to be safe."

She's close to tears at this point, I bite my lower lip and get off the couch. I embrace her in my arms and she quietly weeps. I wait for about a minute and I then say "You did what you thought was best. I don't fault you for it Mom. But it's time for me to embrace my destiny, I think someone wants me to take up my position."

"What?" My Mother mutters to me.

"The letter said I was a prince right? Then this test must be linked to Jenny, that or kidnapping her was just bait. Either way I'm going to get to the bottom of this rest assured Mom." I say to her.

She calms down a bit, and then looks at me with a smile. "I'm so proud of you Ryan, you go and you save her. You hear me? You fight them and show them the power of your royal blood." she says to me.

I take those words to heart, and I hug her once again. "My team's getting ready to go to New York, I need to get back to Starmage and join them." I mutter.

"I understand son, take care. Remember that no matter what happens I love you no matter what."

With that we say our goodbyes, I feel a lot better mentally now. A weight off my shoulders, and I'm even more focused to save Jenny now. With that I teleport back to school after leaving my Mother's apartment.
14331111211111.title: A short while later Ryan goes to his Mom's ...

143311112111111.content:
-Ryan's POV-

I was sitting alone in first class, even though I had only bought a coach seat. I was told that my seat was inadvertently given to someone else so they gave me first class to make up for the mistake. It was not that I minded; there was certainly more leg room. I simply found it odd that I was the only one in first class... or so I thought.

"Greetings, grandson." Startling me, a raspy voice said.

My head darted up to face a tall elderly woman in an elegant black dress sitting across from me. She had long auburn hair, emerald green eyes, and a strong physique for someone in their seventies. "Grandma?"

The woman nodded. "Your mother phoned me, stating that you had discovered part of the truth." Softly, she said. "I was hoping it would not be revealed in such a unscrupulous way." She sighed. "I am here to tell you the rest of the story."

"I'm listening..." Frowning, I said.

The woman drew in a breath. "First, I am the head witch of Europe. You must call me Rhianna." Calmly, she said. "Second, there are six powerful witches ruling the witching world. The regions they control are The Americas, Europe, Asia, Africa, and Australia which includes the minor island nations."

"That would be five regions, grand... err Rhianna." Raising an eyebrow, I stated.

"Yes, five leaders and one who trumps them all." Serious, Rhianna said. "Elvira Strange."

"Where do I fit in all of this?" Politely, I demanded. "I thought only girls could be witches."

"You have magic within you, Ryan, it merely lies dormant as a boy." Firmly but kindly, Rhianna said. "For one to be head witch, the female heir must be married." She sighed, a rueful smile forming upon her face. "Before the war, a male heir was transformed into a female to take the position. The resulting transformation immunity forced us to change the rules slightly."

"Are you telling me that males could become head witch?" Surprised, I asked.

Rhianna suppressed a low giggle before nodding. "Ironic, is it not? A boy ruling a world where only the girls have power." She then turned serious. "We had not had a male ruler in over a thousand years."

My eyes widened. "So that's what this is about!" Becoming angry, I shouted. "They kidnapped Jenny so I would not assume the throne!"

"The rules are the same, minus gender." Darkly, Rhianna said. "Your mother was to be the next in line but she refused to marry another man after her husband was killed. You are now the next in line only you must be at least magically bonded, if not married before your eighteenth birthday."

I frowned. That was only a few days away. "What happens if I do not meet this deadline?" Morbidly curious, I asked. "Who does the throne go to?"

Rhianna frowned deeply. "It would become up for grabs." Darkly, she replied. "Anyone with enough magical power who is married could assume the throne."

"So whoever kidnapped Jenny is after the throne." Fuming, I said. "I will not allow that to happen!"

"You have more magical power than you might realize." Serious, Rhianna said. "It enhances your attributes, senses, reactions... let your magic guide you."

With that, she was gone as if she were never there. You drew in a breath, trying to formulate a plan.
143311112111111.title: On the flight to New York.

1433111121111112.content:
The character Canti is from Juniper's list of character's known as the savage, taken with her permission.
http://www.writing.com/main/view_item/it...

Ryan's POV

The thoughts are swirling in my head, each time I find out something new it raises more questions then answers. I hadn't seen my Granny in ages, she was at a care home the last time I heard of her which was a few years ago. But I guess that was just a ruse to try and help me live the normal life, but that was shattered once the truth of the supernatural came out to me. My luggage back is near me, just above me. I'm alone.

I grab the bag and open it up, looking below at my sword. It contains the soul of a powerful demon hunter sworn to aid me to the best he can. I decide to take him out, and instantly I hear his voice in my head as soon as I grab the hilt. "What do you require my lord?" it speaks to me. It's voice sounds English with a Japanese tone to it.

"It turns out that I could be royalty Azura, guess that would make me an actual lord wouldn't it?" I think with a chuckle.

I expect the sprit inside the sword to reply back, but instead he glows brightly and says "Master! A dangerous foe approaches!"

My eyes go wide, and sure enough the door in front of me is slashed open. I just manage to get out of my seat and draw my sword to face my intruder. And in walks a nightmarish figure indeed.

The first thing I noted was the head of what I assumed was a male, it was wrapped in thick bandages. Not showing any hair or anything like that, the only feature his head shows is the large golden yellow eye that I see on the right side of his face.

His chest is covered with several straps, which hold the scabbards of several swords. He has two out, one in each hand. But I also note that all the scabbards hold blades in them already, I'd assume two would be empty. A wide array of scars cover his upper body, like he'd been cut in several places and then stiched back up again.

His lower body donned a pair of ripped black hakama's, which through holes in it I could see scars there as well. Finally he was wearing a pair of black sneakers, he then pointed one blade at me.

"Carlsonnnnnn....." the man hissed out.

"Who are you?!" I shouted, entering my stance. It was then that I noted the plane was quiet, aside from the plane's engines of course. Suddenly the scent of blood wafted into my nose. I peaked past him to see several dead people, blood dripping past him.

"I am Canti of the savage, my client has asked me to ensure that you do not survive." the man muttered as he took two steps towards me. I got myself ready.

"So please do me a favour and die!!!!" Canti screamed out as he charged forth, making for a double thrust attack aimed right at my chest.

Time slowed down for me, I focused my willpower into my blade. Azura eagerly accepted and in an instant I had teleported behind the man, I then aimed my blade downwards in the hopes of stabbing him through the leg. Only Canti quickly turned around and blocked the attack, locking his swords as an X with my sword in the middle of it.

In response I quickly fired a left handed fist to his head, he clearly wasn't expecting that. For as soon as I hit him he staggered back, one of the things about me is that I don't hesitate to fight dirty. This guy was calling for it.

"Master we must escape, this is neither the time nor the place!" Azura speaks to me.

On that I can agree, but how? I'm on a plane. But a quick glance at a nearby window tells me we are over New York. Perhaps there is a parachute on board? If there is then I could make my escape, it would be risky. But it's better than staying cooped up in a flying plane with this nutjob.

Wasting no time Canti has recovered and he's back on the attack, trying to bring his dual swords down onto me for and X slash attack. Doesn't he know how impractical that is? I quickly step back, the swords harmlessly go down at where I was. And I rush forth, trying to swing my blade into his neck and head. Only he grabbed the scabbard close to his head and drew the blade in time to block my attack, having dropped his previous one.

I quickly jump back, trying to block out the fact that I'm now around a heap of dead people. Canti then calmly drew his new blade, and I noticed a brand new one just appeared. Were they magic? Could this guy actually create an infinite number of swords?

With grim purpose he advances towards me yet again, I begin doing several backflips. Missing the fallen arms of dead passengers, I make my way to near the cockpit. And sure enough near the door is a parachute.

But Canti is still advancing towards me. I need to get him back before I can mount any escape attempts. With that in mind I decide to take the fight to him, I spin forward while having my sword sheathed. Canti slashes to the left with both blades, only I clash against them perfectly with Azura.

"Why are you doing this? You've been hired by the people who took Jenny aren't you?!" I spit out at him.

Canti gives no response, he merely tries to break the lock. But Azura stands strong, and begins charging a subtle blue aura about it. I proceed to draw the rest of the blade, and in an instant I have leaped back while spinning. The slash with my katana creates a blue coloured shockwave of pure energy, and it hits Canti square in the chest. The impact and the turbulence of the plane sends the whacked out assassin down the plane.

Wasting no time I quickly grab the parachute and sling it over my shoulders, and yell at him "Fucker!" as I proceed to open the entrance door. The noise of the door is almost enough to make me deaf, several corpses go flying out. I noticed that Canti's eye had narrowed to a slit, he's embedded both blades into the plane floor to keep himself there.

But that's fine with me, because the next thing I see is clear blue sky. I jump out the plane, and it's rough. Azura's slipping in my grasp, I can tell if I don't act soon....

I grab the scabbard with my mouth, keeping it there as I commence skydiving. I've done this a couple of times before, but not like this. Still though, I can see the hotel where Chon and the others are staying at. I set a course for it, right now I need to get there.

I activate my parachute, and sure enough I'm slowly descending through the big apple. I can already smell the evil here, Jenny is somewhere amongst this lot. And I'll tear up every alleyway to get to her, that I can promise.

As I near the hotel's roof I look down and see if there's anyone there, and I see that it's.....
1433111121111112.title: The plane is hijacked.

14331111211111122.content:
-Ryan's POV-

Relief fell over me as I found my pen pal, John Harrison waiting for me on the roof of the hotel. He threw a bast passed me, knocking away a sword thrown by Canti. "You accepted the wrong contract, Canti!" Strongly, he called out. "You are risking the wrath of the pseudo witch!"

"Miserable abomination!" Cursing, Cani called back. "You will rue the day you interfered with the Savage!"

John waved his hand, causing the entire plane to explode into a ball of fire before vanishing from sight taking Cani with it. What surprised me was that no one below seemed to notice. "That was not the plane you boarded in England." Darkly, he said. "That was what mad scientists call a demon flight."

"A what?" Unnerved, I asked. "Are you telling me all of those passengers were already dead?"

It was a disturbing thought but John shook his head, a deep serious look on his face. "No, they were all robots built to look like humans." Softly, he replied. "They were your body guards but Canti is the best in the business when it comes to assassination." He frowned. "Forgive me for saying this but you are damn lucky to have escaped with your life."

"This is serious." Sweating a little, I said. "I only have a few days to find Jenny before..."

"My family and I have been briefed on the situation." Politely, John interrupted. "This is serious because these people are challenging the world's royal families." He gave me a firm nod. "Your fight is our fight now."

"I appreciate that." Smiling slightly, I said. "Do you have any idea where we should start?"

"Elvira Strange has ordered every rogue hunter graduate to search for her." Calmly, John replied. "That said, we already have a small army scouring New York City. Hayley is talking to her friends from Witchbloom to see if they had heard anything and Mel is talking to her friends from the local teen coven to see if they had heard any rumors."

I cracked a grateful smile. "I am impressed." Relieved, I said. "I only hope we find her in time."

"My mom has a church all set up to perform the bonding ceremony the instant we rescue Jenny." Serious, John said. "We are covering every angle we can think of including calling in a few favors."

"What sort of favors?" Curious, I asked.

"Even my youngest sister, Hannah has her contacts." Smiling, John said. "She has a dear friend on the other side of the rift whose family mirrors our own."

"How could they be of any help?" Curious, I asked.

John's smile vanished. "Her friend's grandfather is Devlin Moray, the head mad scientist. He can see through the eyes of every person on Earth at once with the use of a massive machine." Darkly, he replied. "No one, and I mean no one can hide from his gaze."

"Something tells me there would be a high price to this." Wincing, I said.

John nodded. "He demands the exclusive right to enter this world freely for this service." Serious, he said. "One of the conditions of the treaty ending the great war was that no one enters either side of the rift without permission."

"That is a rather high price." Shaking my head, I said.

"I agree." sighing, John replied. He shrugged. "However, he is only asking for himself to move freely and he guarantees he will find and rescue Jenny in less than an hour once given the go ahead."

"Any other options?" Sighing, I asked.

John nodded. "We could see a friendly rival of mine." Patiently, he said. "His name is Juan Smith, his power is equal to my own and his mother is the dean of Starmage."

I looked out at the city lights of New York, wondering what to do.
14331111211111122.title: John Harrison.

choices: Says Devlin has only one hour.
143311112111111221.content:
John led me into the hotel where we entered a luxury suite. It was just I would expect to see when a member of the royal family travels. We stop at a large mirror where John waves his hand. Instantly, it became like a window into the bedroom of John's youngest sister, Hannah. Inside, Hannah was playing with her dolls. "Hannah, I need you." Flatly, John said. "Come on through to New York."

Hannah grinned. "I'm not even allowed across the street yet and you want me to go to New York through a high tech teleport system?" Teasing, she asked.

"Now, Hannah." Irritated, John said.

Hannah sighed and walked through into the hotel suite. "What do you need, John?"

"I need you to call your friend, Matt Moray on the other side of the rift." Serious, John said. "We need the services of his grand father."

Hannah waved her hand at the mirror and the image changed to that of a boy's bedroom where they found a small boy with black hair and ocean blue eyes. He was no older than Hannah but very well built. Also, he had wolf like ears. He was a Neko-wolf.

"Hey, Matt!" Startling the boy, Hannah called. "What's up?"

"Hannah!" Happily, Matt called. "Welcome to my humble bedding quarters."

"I'm afraid this is a business call." Turning serious, Hannah said. "A good friend of mine really needs help from your family."

A serious look fell over Matt's face. "Details." Politely, he demanded.

"We need to find my girlfriend, Jenny Forth." Chiming in, I said.

Matt nodded and yelled out, "Grandpa!"

In a flash, a figure appeared in the room. He was a tall, dark elderly man. He sported an eighteenth century gentleman's suit with unusually long coat tails that moved about as if they had a mind of their own. He wore knee high riding boots, a top hat covering his raven black hair, and carried a silver tipped cane with a large diamond. His eyes hid behind round shining glasses while he held a toothy, almost sinister grin. It was Matt's grandfather, Devlin Moray. "Greetings, my hyperactive grandson." Courtly, he said. "What distresses you?"

"My dear friend, Ryan Carlson needs your help." Pointing to me, Matt said. "His friend has been kidnapped and an attempt was made on his life."

"We need to find her, sir." Politely, I said. "Can you please assist us?"

"I can but I would require one thing in return." Without hesitation, Devlin replied.

Of course there would be a catch. "What would that be, sir?" I asked.

"I can not search your world unless I am allowed free entry into it." Serious, Devlin said. "The treaty that ended the great war clearly dictates that no one shall enter the other world without permission."

I frowned. I was not certain if I had the authority to allow such a move. Only John touched my shoulder. "I will call Elvira Strange and see if this can be arranged."

"Do so." Serious, Devlin said. "I already have a full image of your girlfriend."

"You read my thoughts?" Annoyed, I asked.

"Your girlfriend is forefront on your mind." Calmly, Devlin said. "Her image and voice radiates from your thoughts; I did not have to peer into your brain."

I sighed while John spoke on the phone with his grandmother. Finally, he ended the call and turned to me with a serious look that was hard to read. "Ryan, Elvira..."
143311112111111221.title: We talk to Devlin Moray.

1433111121111112213.content:
-Ryan's POV-

I sighed while John spoke on the phone with his grandmother. Finally, he ended the call and turned to me with a serious look that was hard to read. "Ryan, Elvira says that Devlin Moray only has one hour." Flatly, he said. "She can't look the other way longer than that without causing friction within the witch council."

"Then that will have to suffice." Calmly, Devlin said.

With that, he vanished in a dull flash. An instant later, I found myself standing next to him in a strange room in a location unknown. I threw the man an accusing look to which he motioned to an odd machine. It looked like a comfortable throne with a virtual reality helmet attached to it via wires which were in turn attached to a series of machines on a rolling cart.

"This is called the clairvoyance enhancer." Firmly but kindly, he said. "It allows the user to see through the eyes of every person on Earth simultaneously."

"What does this have to do with finding Jenny?" Frowning, I asked.

"Someone had to have seen her." Grinning, Devlin countered. He then turned serious. "I am not permitted a foot hold into this world so you must be the one to conduct the search."

It sounded dangerous. To have that many images in ones mind at once would have to be maddening. However, this was Jenny we were talking about. I had to find her, regardless of the risks. "What do I have to do?" Finally, I asked.

"Sit here and wear the helmet." Instructing me, Devlin said. "The second you put it on, focus your mind only on what Jenny Forth looks like from the front, the back and the sides. The machine will do the rest and you will find your girlfriend."

Sighing, I sat down onto the throne and wore the helmet, focusing all of my mind on Jenny. In a flash, I saw her from all angles through the eyes of several different people! "I see her!" Trembling, I shouted.

"Keep focusing on her image!" Working some controls, Devlin said. "I am triangulating her position!"

I did as Devlin instructed but gasped as one of the images turned to a mirror. I saw the face of one of the kidnappers! Unfortunately, he seemed to sense my presence. "Someone is on to us!" Enraged, he screamed. "I thought I told you to keep that bitch in line! Her magic is tampering with the shields!"

I watched in rage and horror as someone viciously slapped Jenny in the face, sending a splat of blood from her lip. A second later, the image vanished and I ripped the helmet off in a rage. "Damn it!"

Don't worry, Jenny. The one who hit you will loose a lot more blood than you did! I took a breath to calm myself then turned to Devlin. "Please tell me you found her location."

Devlin frowned. "I narrowed it down to three points within New York." Disappointed he said. "Had I had another second, I would have found her exact location."

"Well, I saw one of the kidnappers." Gruffly, I said. "I know the bloke. His name is Zed Brawl, a former general among the mad scientist community."

Devlin nodded. "He tried to take over the collective council during the great war." Ice in his tone, he said. "I will not shed any tears over his spelt blood." He then summoned a map of New York City with the three points lit up. "I guarantee you will find Jenny in one of these places. The others, I guarantee will be traps."

Not much choice or time. "I can have Elvira and her rogue hunters hit two of the areas." Flatly, I said. "My team and I will hit the third."

"I wish you luck." Serious, Devlin said. "Your girlfriend, Jenny Forth has a cousin in my world named Lilith Mage. Does it sound familiar?"

I nodded but did not say anything as Devlin quickly continued. "She has a crush on my grandson, Matt. That makes us family. The point is, if you fall into a jam, just call my name."

Before I could respond, I found myself back in the hotel room with John Harrison and his sister, Hannah with the map in my hand. "Did he find her?" Hopeful, Hannah asked.

"He narrowed it down to three locations." Gruffly, I replied. "John, I need you to have Elvira and her team check out these two locations. My team and I will hit..."
1433111121111112213.title: An hour with a former enemy.

choices: Canti is there with members of the savage.
Zed and some known felons greet the team upon landing.
14331111211111122132.content:
Ryan's POV

The cruise ship made the most sense, they could get Jenny out of New York and get her hitched at the same time. Plus the ship could be a good place to defend themselves, and not to mention it was in local waters. So we couldn't risk an all out attack, people would see it and get scared. Sometimes I need to remind myself that not everyone knows that all the supernatural shit is all true, hell I didn't believe any of it till that rouge witch tried to attack my Mom.

"I'll need a helicopter, me and my crew will drop in and attack." I say to John.

"Got it, get your crew and head up to the rooftop. It'll be here within ten minutes." John says to me. With that I nod to both him and Hannah and leave the room, and I'm wasting no time in finding my friends. Who are in the room on the far left of this floor, I knock twice. And Chon answers.

But before he can say anything I say to him "Gather everyone, I don't care what everyone is doing. Get them all to the roof in ten minutes, we are getting Jenny back." Chon says nothing. But he gives me an understanding nod.

With that I make my way over to the stairs, only for Devlin to hand me a suitcase. "Get this on, think of it as a little parting gift Mr Carlson. This is my latest and greatest creation yet, the armour of Adam. Use it with care please."

I check the suitcase's contents, and the amour inside is like nothing I've ever seen. And I thought I had seen and was sick of everything related to magic and science.

http://news.toyark.com/wp-content/upload...

"It'll do, does this have anything I should know about?" I ask.

"It will grant you the power to complete your task, that is all you need to know." Devlin muttered to me in a somewhat dark tone. I didn't bother to reply, I merely nodded at him and John and prepared to set out to the rooftop.

I wasted no time in securing this armour that Devlin gave to me, if he was the head of science over in another world then this had to be good. It fit like a glove, like it was made for my body. Although my gut feeling said that this thing was a one size fits all, I felt a lot safer with it on.

Chon and the rest of the team show up, my blind friend is dressed in his hi tech Chinese battle armour. The same one he wore back when we broke into the witch council HQ in Edinburgh. Light meanwhile is just wearing a pair of blue jeans and sneakers, he's not one for fancy armour. Although given the fact that he can endure any injury he doesn't really need it.

Lunar's dressed in what she calls her "Lethal force" outfit. And I briefly don't recognise her, but I see that pink hair and know it's her.
http://www.sosgamers.com/wp-content/gall...

Charlie meanwhile is dressed in a leather trenchcoat, with blue jeans and a Kevlar vest. The kid also has a pair of bokkens, which are basically wooden katanas. I have been teaching him swordplay after all, he wanted to pitch in. He also had a sort of hidden power, we didn't know what it was. But something about the kid wasn't normal.

Chon's daughters are wearing identical suits of armour to what he wears, only smaller and for their size. Viva makes herself different by having a black cloth draped above her mouth. Amy is last with a Kevlar vest and knee length black skirt,, with black and white stockings under it. Looking like the proper goth about to wade into battle.

I take a moment to look over my friends, we look a bit ramshackle. Light even more so, certainly a far cry from the professional rouge witch hunters we hear so much about. But yet I trust no one more than the people I see in front of me. The helicopter lands and we all waste no time in getting in.

Once it's up and we're flying over the New York skyline night has fallen, and I've not had much sleep besides most of my flight where I found it boring and just dozed off. I then start to brief my friends with what I know.

"Okay here's the plan. Jenny has been believed to have been sighted on a cruise ship leaving New York. We have reason to believe that the enemy is attempting to sneak her out and have her get married somewhere else, we need to drop onto that ship. Jenny is the only thing that matters, everyone else on that ship is expendable. I don't care what you do with them, just make sure Jenny goes home with us." I said.

"Do we have any idea of the enemy?" Chon asked.

"Yeah some guy named Zed Brawl. Long story short he's a former high ranking member of the mad science community, don't know what he'd want with Jenny though. I suspect he's in cahoots with other people." I say.

"Whoever they are it doesn't matter, cause they won't survive when I get them." Light muttered while rubbing his knuckles.

"Attention the drop is clear, prepare for jumps." the pilot says to us.

"Okay people, here we make a stand. This is where we tell these motherfuckers that they can't take one of our own, I don't care why they want Jenny. All I care about is getting her back. We're gonna strangle them with their own guts and leave them in a pool of their own blood to drown in! Am I right people?!" I yell out.

Everybody gives me loud shouts of approval, to which I reply with "Damm right I am, now come on. Some bad guys need to get their nuts kicked in!" with that I leap out the helicopter with a parachute. My crew follows suit, and the next thing we know we're planning to land right on the cruise ship.
14331111211111122132.title: A luxury cruise ship.

choices: Battle: Zed Brawl vs Devlin Moray
Battle: Carlson and co. vs The Savage.
Jenny escapes, runs into my arms!
143311112111111221322.content:
-Ryan's POV-

Upon landing on the helipad of the cruise ship in the back of the vessel, we were greeted by Zed Brawl and his hoard of robot soldiers. Zed was tall and lean with slicked back black hair and yellow eyes, likely from self experimentation. He wore a suit of armor similar to my own but clearly an earlier model.

"Welcome, Carlson and company to your destruction!" Boldly, he announced. "Prepare yourselves for a one way ticket to oblivion!"

"Bad guys talk too much." Raising his swords, Charlie muttered.

I had to agree with the kid but now was not the time for it. Zed made the first move, throwing three small balls from his pockets at Charlie, Viva, and Vogue who were standing next to each other. The metallic balls flew around them, creating a type of force field. Charlie hit it with his sword with no effect. Zed gave an evil grin as he slowly closed his hand, causing the shield to get smaller. "Be crushed with your crushes, little ones!" Evilly, he taunted.

Chon was the first to act. He tried to rip the shield apart but to no avail. "Chon, step back!" Urgently, Charlie shouted. "We got this!"

Chon stepped back and was surprised when Charlie placed his hands on the V twin's right shoulder. His eyes glowed before Viva and Vogue cast a powerful spell. It was clearly beyond their level as it threw the shield off of them and onto one of the robot soldiers which was quickly crushed and destroyed by Zed's trap.

Chon raised a single eyebrow at Charlie. "We'll talk later."

Zed growled then motioned to his robots. "Destroy them!"

Without hesitation, the robots charged wielding swords and firing laser guns at us all. I drew my Asura, ready for battle when I was in for a surprise. The armor glowed and I felt a powerful essence within me. Before I could try to reason what it was, Asura spoke. "It is a possession armor; it allows spirit and body to become one! Allow me to guide your movements!"

There was no time to argue. I sighed, releasing my control and I found myself performing moves I have never heard of, turning the robot soldiers into piles of junk. Lasers were fired at me only to be reflected off by the sword as if they were nothing but pesky insects.

Charlie and the V-twins stayed close, casing powerful spells at the seemingly never ending army of robots and reducing them to rubble. Noticing this, I realized that Charlie was somehow boosting their power levels. Only that would have to wait.

Light and Lunar were performing what they had called the dance of death where they tear the robots apart in what seemed to be nothing more than a graceful dance. Of course, we were all getting our hits, a slash on the arm here, a laser burn there.

Chon and Amy worked together as a team. Amy had a knack for defensive magic so she served as a shield while Chon served as a sword, tearing the robots apart with ease.

"Zed is keeping us pinned! We don't have time for this!" Destroying another robot, I yelled to Asura. "We need to end this now!"

Before Asura could respond, two robot tentacles ripped onto the scene and slammed down onto two changing room where the robots were emerging. Zed screamed in a girlish manner. "My replicators!" Distraught, he yelled. "My beautiful replicators!"

The tentacles retracted and Devlin Moray casually walked onto the scene, his long coat tails moving in a threatening manner. "Leave this filth to me, children." Darkly, he ordered. "You have more pressing matters to attend to. I shall join you once Zed is neutralized."

I did not know what laws or treaties were broken with Devlin Moray entering the scene but at the moment, I did not care. Jenny was all that mattered...
143311112111111221322.title: Super science vs Supernatural.

choices: Ryan fights his way to Jenny.
Chon and the V twins battle Eva.
1433111121111112213223.content:
Ryan's POV

They say a man is at his strongest when he's got nothing to lose, and if that's true then I am more powerful than I've ever been. And also, there was the anger. I felt mad, furious. I wanted to kill those who dared to kidnap Jenny, to slice out their guts and shove them back down their throats. In fact I was grabbing one of Zed's robots and crushing it's head in my left hand, stabbing my blade through another one.

I look around, Chon is coming at the machines with just his bare hands. Even though he had a pair of Shaolin hook swords on his back, he preferred them citing how versatile they could be. The man was feared by rouge witches as a killer of their kind, to the point where it felt like near mythical levels. And Chon was showing he could handle Zed's little metal toys with ease, the mad science community had no idea how lucky they were to not have someone like him hunting their kind.

Speaking of barehanded Light is swinging his arms wildly, gleefully laughing his head off. The magical weapon had a great lust for violence, it had been instilled in him since he was born. As much as Light proclaimed to be a protector of people, the truth was Light loved fighting. In fact he grabbed hold of one robot, and was literally tearing into it's head. If it were a living person I think even I could have been taken aback by this, but I didn't care.

Everyone else was giving their all, we were fighting to save one of our own. I was fighting to save a part of myself, while Devlin was dealing with the master my crew was to move forward.

"Quickly! We must get deeper into the ship!" I yell out, making even more of an effort to cut through the large amounts of robot mooks that stood before us. My blade and arm were a flash, and each time I saw it machines were sliced clean through. I had barely noticed that it had started to rain, because soon me and my friends were inside the cruse ship.

http://www.blogcdn.com/slideshows/images...

It was a very classy place, Zed in all his arrogance must have thought that Jenny should only be wed with opulence surrounding her. But that's not going to happen, there's waves and waves of robots around the room. Only they move to give way to a woman walking towards us, and it's not Jenny.

"Eva Morgana....." I mutter, although I find it strange to think that Zed is working with a witch. Still evil minds can think alike, I don't know and I don't really care.

The rouge witch cracks a smirk and is looking at Chon "Well the blind vengeance.....you know that I see you and that I can't let you leave alive." she speaks gleefully. Chon is saying nothing, he merely takes his twin hookswords off his back. I recalled how rouge witches have a massive bounty placed on Chon, namely cause of the body count he has from them.

Eva's not done yet though, she looks at Viva and Vogue. Frowning and saying "Ah, if it isn't the former daughters of Helena Young. Traitors, only natural that you fall in with the enemy."

Clearly that hit the mark, the two girls were moving forward and were only held back because of Charlie. "Our Mother treated us like crap!" Viva said.

Vogue was following up with "Do not ever talk about her....."

Just as it looks like we're about to break into violence again however a loud voice from above yells my name, I know it all too well. Jenny is at the top floor, dressed in a large white wedding dress. I quickly turn to look at her, Eva shouts with "How did you escape? Where is Thomas?!"

So that was the plan, I heard that Eva had a son. No doubt he was just a patsy here, someone that the rouge witch would have no qualms in controlling to her own ends. Jenny must have broken free somehow, perhaps Eva's son got her out or something like that. I don't know, all I know is......

3.....
2.....
1.....

All hell broke loose, both sides charged and the battle commenced.
1433111121111112213223.title: Jenny escapes, runs into my arms!

choices: Carlson and Shomei get to Jenny.
Zed isn't finished, he has one more surpirse for the heroes.
14331111211111122132232.content:
Chon's POV

Suddenly the battle commenced, Ryan was of course going to make a beeline right for Jenny. That was why we were here, to save her. I am Carlson's Brother in arms, I'll walk to the depths of hell with him if that's needed. Light and Lunar quickly start charging into the battle, the magical weapon tearing into the hordes of robots with his robot partner backing him up.

Before I can start moving the ceiling shattered open, with a helicopter above it. Then ropes were coming down from it, with masked soldiers holding laser rifles in one hand began to quickly slide down the ropes. However I detected the chi energy of someone I know.

"Akatsuki-san!" I shout.

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/in-b...

Shomei Akatsuki, the man is ex Japanese self defence force. And is related to the sprit that is in the katana of Carlson, they come from a long line of Japanese demon hunters. This man has also brought backup with him, dressed in his old officer's outfit. He was a lot older than he looked, he looked like that back in the 50's from what I'm told.

"Chon-san! My men will take care of the henchmen of this wench alongside Light-san and Lunar-san. I will aid Carlson-sama in reaching Jenny-san, dispatch that rogue witch!" Shomei yells as he rushes to the stairs, roundhouse kicking a robot's head off. Yelling across the room to me, that SDF karate training really comes in handy.

"Gladly! Eva you are sashimi. Viva! Vogue! To me!" I yell, sprinting right at the rogue witch. My hookswords grinding against the marble flooring, Eva fires out a magic orb. But I've been fired upon in that manner before, dozens of times when I hunted her kind. I simply tilt my body to the right and it zips past harmlessly, and I adjust my grip on the blade in my left hand. One of the useful things about hookswords? You can connect them together at the top, and that's what I do.

Doing that easily extends my attacking range to 6 feet, and I hook the pair together and stand. Swiftly executing my spin, and the dagger blade at the bottom strikes Eva. Creating a nice and clean cut right into her gut, which she groans out and clenches her wound with one hand.

"Damn you Chink!" she spits out, I frown under my blindfold. So not only is she a magical Nazi, Eva's also racist it seems. Chink's a slur aimed at Asian people, namely the Chinese. But I take it in stride as my adopted children move in unison to take the fight to Eva, flipping and tumbling right at her.

But just because I've sliced Eva open doesn't mean she's beaten, the rogue witch fires an electric blast at Viva. She took it right in the chest, a good thing that they're using the same sort of armour that I use. It's designed to resist the powers of offensive magic, made using metal combined with strong chi energy. Still doesn't make me feel better about seeing her hit like that, Vogue goes flying too with a wind blast. The pair managed to recover fast though, using their ballet training to get their grounding back quickly.

By this time I've got my hookswords ready to keep fighting, and I rush forward again. Intent on making Eva bleed like a stuffed pig, if she knows one thing about me then it's that I've hunted and killed several of her kind. I use my chi energy to move at such a high speed, in such a short distance. That to the eye I'd appear to be teleporting, the ghost fade.

And then suddenly I've high into the air, ready to swing down my hookswords and dig them into Eva's shoulders. Only for the rogue witch to trigger a large circle of energy around her, and it blasted upwards. And I was smack dab in the middle of it, and suddenly I was near the shattered roof of the room. Thankfully my armour took the majority of the hit, I didn't have the durability of Light. But the armour did it's job and that was all that mattered, I had turned my body so that I was now looking down at the enemy. And I nosedive right at her, near suicide. But that was the point, I was rushing right down at her.

Then I flipped, my arms moving with the hookswords. I landed behind Eva, and smirked. Suddenly as she tried to move forward, suddenly her arms fell. I had sliced them off, and she didn't even know what her till it was too late. Viva and Vogue stood in surprise, then suddenly moved forward to apply healing magic. They stopped the blood flow, and I was inwardly impressed with how my adopted children coped. Granted they've seen blood, but still I just ripped Eva's limbs off there.

"We're not like our Mother, you won't die from this Ms Eva." Viva said.

"You'll live, so that you'll face further justice." Vogue said, giving Eva a kick in the head to silence her.

The battle was done, Eva had no chance. But there was no time to dwell on that, we needed to keep going.
14331111211111122132232.title: Chon and the V twins battle Eva.

143311112111111221322322.content:
Ryan's POV

Just as the battle was finished, a battle torn Zen appeared in the room. He was a gory sight; his body covered in blood from gashes and burns from his fight with Devlin Moray. His right hand was almost completely burned to the bone, likely from a powerful energy blast. His left hand was still intact and wielding an energy sphere the size of a large boulder. He laughed maniacally, madness clear in his eyes.

"With my last breath, I will become immortalized in Mad science history!" Boasting, he declared. "Jenny Forth's marriage shall unite the two realities with mad science reigning supreme!"

I took an offensive stance with Asura at the ready. This man was obviously sick and twisted. How he believed any kind of marriage would do this was beyond me. It didn't matter though, I was not going to let it happen, no fucking way! Then, a familiar voice rang out, bringing a slight smirk to my face.

"Do you ever shut up!?"

It was Devlin Moray! I was shocked to find that there was not a scratch on him minus a deep scratch across his left eye. The head mad scientist slapped the energy sphere with his bare hand, instantly engulfing Zed into it! The crazed man screamed in agony before Devlin laughed madly as he summoned a nine iron golf club to his hand. "Fore!!"

He hit the sphere with the club, sending it flying into the sky at near super sonic speeds! There was then an explosion that lit the night sky, making it appear near noon before the night fell dark again. Devlin breathed a sigh then turned, madness still clear in his eyes. "Who's next?" Grinning, he asked.

He then laughed out hysterically as thunder crashed everywhere outside... In the next breath, I found myself back in my dorm with Jenny sitting only a few feet away. She ran into my arms, crying. I held her tightly, tears falling as I had nearly lost her forever.

All of my friends were in the room as well, looking slightly confused. "Mr. Moray must have teleported us all back home." Shaken, Charlie said. "But why?"

"Who cares?" Bluntly, Chon countered. "We have obtained our objective and returned home safely. That is all that matters."

I continued to hold Jenny tightly, vowing never to allow her out of my sight again.

It was not until the following day when I get a strange phone call.
143311112111111221322322.title: Zed isn't finished, he has one more surpirs...

choices: What have the Ren twins been doing during the crew's absence?
1433111121111112213223222.content:
Ryan's POV

I spent the night with Jenny, I didn't let go. That was after we checked everyone for any injuries, Chon took a few dents and scrapes but nothing more than what he's used to. All in all a total success, we saved the day and my girl. I got my armour off and Jenny got that stupid dress off, we climbed into bed and out like lights. After everything that we had gone through that was no surprise, I didn't dream. I was too tired from it all.

I awaken to the sounds of chirping birds, Jenny's sleeping next to me. She looks out like a light, clinging to me as she did. I glided a finger down her side, the covers are over us. Jenny must have done that. I feel the need to use the bathroom, and so I make to leave the bed. Jenny doesn't try to stop me, namely due to how tired she must be. I can't imagine what she went through, brainwashing and being forced to pose in her dress or something like that. I don't care.

The bathroom is near me, I look in the mirror. And note that I have small bags around my eyes, and there's stubble around my face. In my quest to find Jenny I didn't take care of how I looked, all I cared about was finding her. My only regret is I didn't kill Zed, I wanted to stab him, slash him into bits and cut his head off. But I block those thoughts, not healthy thinking.

Everyone else is starting to wake up, I make to get back into my room and wake up Jenny. But I'm cut off by a phone ringing in the hallway, who could that be?

Looking from side to side to see if anyone else will get it I realise I'm closest, so of course I'm to answer. I answer the phone and put it to my ear. "Who is this?" I state.

"Carlson is that you, Elvira Strange here I.."

I don't why but I just feel compelled to hang up the phone, and that's exactly what I do. I hang it up, and it rings right away. I sigh and answer it, whatever it is best to just get it over with.

"Carlson did you just hang up?" Elvira asks with a hint of annoyance.

"No I didn't, think it's just cause your in US and I'm in the UK. What's needed?" I state, fuck sake it's not even breakfast.

"Carlson it's come to my attention that you've uncovered your hidden lineage, your Mother explained it to you correct?"

"Yeah pretty much, why?" I say trying to will myself to wake up more.

"You need to come back to the US, there's much to be done in terms of our government and your new potential place in it."
