Elvira frowned and said "Can you trust them enough?"

Ryan looked at the door that led out of the dorm. He saw Jenny waving at him with a beaming smile.
"C'mon Ryan it's time for maths!" she said.

The 17 year old nodded and then said to Elvira "I've trusted them with my life before. They won't let you or me down."

Elvira smiled and said "Good. I'll be waiting."
1552.title: I will need to see his profile.

15521.content:
Ryan caught up with Jenny and the rest of his team at the lockers and briefly told them of his assignment. "This guy likes to open duels by showing off his technology." finishing his explanation, he said. "I have to show him this school is right for him, even though I'm not sure its right for me."

"You mean we gotta babysit some kid who loves to fire first?" Chon said with a rub of his bilndfold.

"What a pain." Amy sighed as she was painting her fingernails.

"Want me to keep an eye on him?" light killer aka John Doe said.

"How hard can this be?" Charlie said when he drew a picture of what Juan looked like with a box of crayons.

"Well I'll stand by you Ryan." Jenny said with a smile.

"Tough break, man." said a familiar voice behind him. "It sounds like this guy is a loose cannon on deck."

Ryan turned then smiled. "Alexander, how did you..." happy but confused, Ryan began.

"The witch council called me in to watch over one Christina Smith." serious, Alexander replied. "Apparently someone is after witches who have a male twin." frowning, he added, "This is serious, Ryan. Witch twins are very powerful. I know it first hand."

"John Harrison, AKA, the pseudo witch, is a fine example from witch twins." serious, Jenny said.

"Oh great. What's next?" wincing, Ryan asked.

"I suggest you simply observe this guy for a day and see how he holds himself before you do anything." calmly, John Doe said. "It's always best to know a person better before passing any judgement. I think I should know that better than anyone."

Ryan nodded, knowing John was right then paused, seeing Juan Smith walking towards us in the hall. Ryan recognized his face from the picture in his file. He was dressed in all black with a long white lab coat that reached down to his heavy black boots that made an odd echo sound with each step he took, as if the crowded hall were empty. As Juan walked passed, the entire group took in his attire and noticed he had dark goggle like glasses that hid his eyes from view and a carried a light limp which Ryan noticed.

"He was hurt before coming here." mussed Alexander. "Only, judging from what you told me, he's hiding it to save face."

"The question is, who hurt him and why?" wincing, Jenny said. "Could he have mouthed off to the wrong witch?"

Ryan shook his head. "No, I think he was protecting someone." almost whispering, he said. "Had he mouthed off, he'd be smiling, knowing he had got the better of a witch." he shook his head. "He's looking serious, too serious."

"His sister." his eyes narrowing, Alexander said.

He then vanished from sight, leaving Ryan and his team wondering.

Elvira waved her hands and a large red hovercraft appeared in front of him. Ryan was taken aback and took a few steps away from it.
"He was flying around the UK not too long after I joined the school. The prefects of this academy saw him on this and viewed him as an intruder. He was shot down and this was taken from him. Once I gave him a good telling off I enlisted him into this academy for reasons you already know." she said.

The birds chirped outside, I could tell how far they were. I didn't need to see, I heard them and deduced the location. They then fluttered away, and I didn't want to bother myself with trying to find out where they were.

I flung my bed covers off, and with practised movements got out of the bed and to my bathroom. Everything was always at the same place, they say blind people know their houses better than people who see. I can agree with that as I grabbed my toothpaste and brush.

After getting myself washed and dressed I stepped out, taking a seat at the breakfast table and taking a seat there. I munch on some toast with my adopted daughters sitting down near me, I can hear them smile. They talk about what they'd like for Christmas, and if we are doing martial arts lessons today.

I smile and say me and Santa will give them want they desire as long as they behave, and martial art lessons will be later this evening. It's a half day after all, they've taken to my lessons with gusto. And in the first time in I don't know how long, I feel great. I can finally say I've moved on, and it looks like it's shown. Considering how chirpy and upbeat everyone is, hell even Ryan's grinning.

The nightmares still happen, but not as much as it used to. Although the battlefield nightmare, where the people I've killed stand on one side and me on the other is the most common. To be honest I don't think I'll be able to let that go, but I'll do what I can. I've sworn to turn around, and not to be consumed by the hate and darkness. Despite pitch blackness being one of the things I see.

Soon enough we're up, our study gear ready in bags. Light and Ryan give Lunar the brief, and most likely telling her to behave herself. I heard about what happened between that girl and the Ren bitches, bet they just about pissed themselves. To be honest I'm still not sure about her, but if Ryan and Light can get her to act normal then it's good enough for me.

I brought a blind man's cane with me, granted I didn't really need it. But it had it's uses at least, in more ways than one. A short walk later Charlie parted ways with my girls, they really took a shine to him. I remember joking with Ryan one time, about how they could be his cheerleaders. No doubt using the martial art moves I taught them.

"Okay class let's take our seats." the teacher was an aging woman, mid 50's or so I think. Her name was Kylie Sanders, the lesson was history. General history and that of the global supernatural society. My grades were all right normally, considering I was focused on my martial arts and revenge. Now though it would be different, now I would apply my mental training to my studies.

I took my seat, far away from the window. So that my other senses wouldn't be affected by the outside world. My friends sitting near me as usual.

"Class this is our new student, her name is Clara Roche. Introduce yourself darling." the teacher said sitting at her desk in front of the class. I sensed the new girl, her chi telling me of her location. I could make out her features, about Jenny's age. Blond hair in curls, steely blue eyes. Starmage uniform. But I wasn't concerned about that.

It was the light red chi that set me off, it warned me of evil intent. It wasn't the same colour that the Ren bitches had, they were in some prison for the time being. I'm also curious about new things in general." I was getting ticked off.

Something about this chick just wasn't right, red chi and a sickly sweet voice. But I wasn't going to do a thing, she wasn't giving me no reason to. But me and my team, we had built in bullshit detectors. Clara was then going on about how she spent a few months in witchbloom, that school across the pond from where we live.

Once she was done I heard the teacher saying "Now Clara take a seat anywhere you like." I could tell the girl was making a smile. She then....

Granted I've pulled no punches with it but they are accustomed to taking the bruises that comes with my regime, and they have become very good in martial arts now. Enough to overpower Charlie's older Sisters, 4 years their senior and taller.

The training for today goes well enough, I hide the fact that something's bothering me. That woman in today's class just irked me, perhaps it's just my natural distrust towards witches. I have certain exceptions of course such as with Jenny and Amy, but still I doubt I'll ever get rid of it. Better that way.

Hours pass and it's time for dinner, Viva and Vogue have gone off to the library to study with their boyfriend Charlie. I'll admit I find it perplexing that one boy has managed to get both of them, regardless I know he'd treat them well. I'm dressed out of my uniform with a black tracksuit jacket and blue jeans with brown sneakers as I head to the dining room in our dorm.

Instantly though I pick up on something, and it seems everyone else has caught it too.

"Where's Charlie and the girls?" I say.

Carlson has a worried expression and says "We don't know, Charlie isn't returning my calls. We're gonna go and look for them before we eat."

I'm smelling bullshit here, someone's up to no good. I doubt Charlie's doing dirty with my girls, they're all 12 for fuck's sake. "It was that girl. She's done something." I say promptly.

"We don't know for certain, but anyway let's go. We'll each take a floor, I'll check the library. Everyone else fan out, now." Carlson said, that's something I like about him. He doesn't beat around the bush, he does stuff.

It's starting to rain now, hopefully they're not outside. Lunar takes to the skies and Light goes to the forest, they know those areas the best after all. It's strange though, I don't feel their chi. But I should be able to from a mile off, this isn't good. If we can't find them we'll need to tell the dean, and the blame will be on me.

I decide to run to the roof, I'm the fastest on foot after all. Carlson is behind me but cuts into the nearby library, he gasps loudly and I stop in my tracks.

"Charlie!" Carlson shouts, I double back to where they are. The library is empty, aside from Charlie's beaten form and books scattered everywhere. The kid clings to Ryan.

"R-Ryan! Viva and Vogue t-they were taken! I tried to stop her, but she blindsided me and struck them both down!" he shouts, tears in his eyes.

"Who did this?...." Carlson mutters, no doubt pissed that someone hurt Charlie.

"The girl you told me about, the one in your class! She said she was going to toss Viva and Vogue from their higher than thou perch. What's that meaning?"

I instantly connect the dots, and I used my chi energy to run faster. Up the stairs like a spectre, to the roof. I barrelled through the door and instantly I pick up on three chi signatures.

"Viva! Vogue!" I shout, I take a step towards them. But the evil chi steps in front, waving a magic filled hand at me.

"Not another step you bastard, otherwise these girls will be turned into boys....and then thrown off the roof." the evil chi mutters. It's the same from before no doubt, I can tell from her tone of voice that she's not joking.

"Why do this?" I say, I can't risk getting in close. The woman's poised her other hand at my girls, the hair on the back of my neck is on end. But I show no signs of being cowed.

The girl responds by saying "Because you took something from me, and I'll never have it back. Today I'll do the same to you, and you will watch the only two girls you care for die in front of you."

"Don't listen to her Chon! She's a bitch!" Viva says, Vogue spits at her in open defiance. The girl slaps both of them, I make a step but she quickly focuses back on me.

"Who are you really? I don't believe your name that you gave me......" I ask, I need to keep her stalled. I ran too fast ahead of everyone else, c'mon Lunar show up. Carlson please......

She pauses, and then changes her hair and says "My name.....is Cassie Bane........and you killed my Mother......" in an icy tone.

Bane? Yes I remember her, she was the second rogue witch I killed. One of those who killed my Brother so long ago.......

"So......you've come for revenge then?" I say.

Cassie nods, not even trying to hide her negative emotions. "You killed her! Impaled her through the chest with your bare hands and left her to bleed out! I was orphaned with my little Sister!"

"You mean your older Brother." I knew about that, she and her Mother planned to turn him permanently into a girl. They succeeded it turned out, not that I care.

"He's dead! I only have a Sister!" Cassie snaps back at me.

I need to be careful, if she gets too agitated she might just do it. I just need to keep stalling, still I'll admit this isn't pretty. I was only caring about my revenge, everything else was just secondary. I gave little thought to the loved ones of my targets, save for how to use them. I had actually considered kidnapping Cassie and using her as bait, it was just her Mother didn't know I was coming and made it too easy.

"Don't kill them." I say. "What if I were to offer my life instead? I'm clearly just scum aren't I?"

Cassie pauses, she's considering it. Good, though I'm lying through my teeth. No way am I sacrificing myself like this. "I'd prefer you just watch." she says. She's shaking though, she doesn't have the guts to go through with actually taking a life like I have.

I kneel on both legs, with my arms outstretched. The rain pouring down on my hair, I state "Take this chance, if you go through with your current plan then it'd only fuel my hate even further. And make me much more determined to rid the world of an evil magic user such as you, who are an example that it's a blight on the world. If you kill me here I will be no danger to you later, and you will have your revenge much sooner."

That was it, I said the magic words. Cassie looks at me, before giving an evil smile. She steps towards me, as she does I remove a sai from my pocket and slide it along the ground. "Stab me. In the heart, end it." I mutter.

Cassie seems to revel in this, she picks it up and eagerly strides towards me. Good, she's away from the girls. Now then...........

Ryan was walking back to starmage, making sure to sling his shirt over his chest so he wasn't told off for public indecency.

Just then he saw Jenny chatting with someone, a young guy a year or two younger than her.
They were laughing and seeming to have a really good time. The 17 year old lowered his eyebrows and looked at Juan.
"Keep your distance Ryan, let's just see what happens." Juan muttered.

Ryan begrudgingly nodded and the pair hid behind a large tree on the grounds.
"Any idea who the kid is?" Ryan muttered.

"His name is Mark Packs, from Eligere Sententia. He keeps to himself for the most part." Juan said, he watched Ryan as he could be apprehensive about this.

Mr Carlson wasn't looking at Jenny and Mark, rather he had his ear aimed at them to listen in.
"You know this has been quite an enjoyable meeting." Jenny said as she smiled.

Ryan looked like he'd just been kicked in the nuts, he was biting his lower lip.
"Stay calm Ryan...." Juan muttered as he looked at him.

"Yes indeed." said Mark, he went on with "It's been interesting to meet someone with altered DNA such as me."

Jenny smiled again, Ryan was looking like he was going to blow up here.
She went on with "It is rare to meet people akin to me, I can relate to them quite well."

Mark smiled and said "So Jenny.....Is there a time where we could hang out together soon? You know before the whole school games start?" The tone in which he said made it look like he was attempting to ask her out.

That was the line for Ryan, he was about to stand up when Juan stopped him "No Ryan! You start this and you could end up causing a bitter war between everyone!" he muttered out.

Fortunately Jenny had caught onto Mark's tone and sighed, she then said "There's someone in my life that's important to me, it's a guy."

"Ah....I see....Is it...?" Mark said.

Jenny nodded, Mark sighed and said "Okay, but regardless I wish to maintain contact with you. As half animal half humans are rare I wish to have someone who I can confide in. Is that okay?"

"It sure is Mark." Jenny said with a smile.

Mark smiled back and said "I should get going or the teacher will flip. See you Jenny."
With that he ran off while waving at her, Jenny smiled and then turned around.

"Come on out Ryan, my cat senses tell me your there." she said doing a small meow.

Ryan came out with his hands in his pockets, looking right at her.
"I heard...." he said.

"And I knew, Mark's nice but dammit Ryan. You were there first, yes you may not be half human. But you were there when my Mother couldn't be, even when I had to leave you still loved me. So I'm not gonna run off on you just because there's someone more similar to my DNA type."

"Thanks Jenny, I'd like to go home now." Ryan said.

Jenny smiled and took his arm into hers, the two left with Juan walking the other way.

Ryan's POV

Calm, that was how I felt. In contrast to how those around me currently felt, the power of a roughneck had been long forgotten. Until recently, and I'm sure there were witches around here who would be shocked that a guy was beating the arguable best witch in their school.

"If I was using my real sword you'd be dead by now." I stated simply to Hayley, with my eyes narrowed and the grip on my wooden katana tightening.

"Well good thing I'm holding back, I don't think Jenny would take too kindly if you were burned to an utter crisp." Hayley retorted, I could hear Jenny shouting in the background.

"Bitch!" Jenny screamed out, I merely shook my head. A second later I charged forth, ready to attack. Hayley had shot forth a small fireball towards me, but I remained calm and performed a move to get around it. I slid under the fireball by adjusting my body so that it went past my upper torso and head.

And sure enough I was perfectly placed to strike, and Hayley had realised it as her eyes went wide. She quickly shot out an uppercut to my jaw, I wasn't expecting such a counter from her so I took a step back and winced. Holding my jaw with one hand.

"Little trick my Brother showed me." she said with a grin.

I spat at the ground near her feet and said "You call that a punch? Chon's fist is like a comet in comparison." I then took the fight to her in an odd fashion, I toss my bokken high into the air. Hayley’s gaze looked to it on reflex, which allowed me to quickly fire out both of my palms as I drove them into her belly.

Hayley yelped out loudly as she was sent skidding back, I caught my bokken as it came back down and moved forward as I was intent on continuing my offense. Hayley had recovered, but I was on her. The pace of the fight was going to be dictated by me, by using my swordplay skills.

Just then I noticed that Hayley had flung a punch out at me, only this time it was covered with a flame. I quickly tilted my body and performed a back flip and re-entered into my stance. “Just cause I’m a witch doesn’t mean I’m weak up close.” Hayley said.

I smirked and said “Omoshiroi, so you can coat your punches with flames eh? Well let’s see how long you can keep that up. You should know that I am the more experienced in hand to hand combat, although I had expected you to just spam your magic from a distance. Let’s see who gives the next surprise.”

With that I gripped my blade once again, Chon had taught me on how to channel my chi energy. And also considering the recent lessons I had taken in being a roughneck from the good Doctor Moriarty. Perhaps I could fire off a high powered attack or projectile at Hayley, I pondered for only a second before…..

info.brief_description: An interactive story about a magic school in Scotland. 1000 GP's for adds! RWBY crossover!
info.description:
Starmage academy is in an unknown forest in Scotland. You don't find it, it finds you.
After being forced to battle an evil witch after just discovering about his Mother's magic, young Ryan Carlson attends Starmage academy for witches and hunters. In the midst of all this Ryan must accept his new way of life, but in any school anything can happen.
Will Ryan and co enjoy thier year of learning? Or will some horrid fate befall them? You decide!


Below are the people.

Ryan Carlson.
The 17 year old hero of our tale. Before he attended starmage he had to spend a year in Asia. His Mother wanted to give him extra training in combat. The reason for this is so he could stand a higher chance of overcoming the road ahead of him called 'Being a witch hunter.'

So he went around Asia learning different martial arts. He learned Kenpo from monks in Tibet. Ninjustu from ninjas hidden in Mt. Fuji. And Tae-Kwon-Doe in Korea. He is also well trained in the way of the katana.

His appearance is short dark brown hair, narrow bright blue eyes and an often stoic face.
He wears a leather jacket with Japanese symbols on it. He wears old nikes with blue jeans.
But for the most part he wears the school uniform which is a red jumper.
In terms of personalty he is a bit of a loner. However under that lies a man with strong will and morals.

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_2-3cwObg7-8/TOzS0B_pi3I/AAAAAAAAB94/VBNbELgZ070/s400/A...

Jenny Forth
A 16 year old girl who is attending starmage academy. Before that though she was at Ryan's old high school where the two of them dated in secret. Her leaveing left a gap in Ryan's heart but soon will that be healed?

She was already given basic training by her Mother, she uses this to hide her secret cat ears from everyone. For she is one of the few "Neko girls" in the world.She also learned healing magic so she could look after Ryan if he was ever wounded. All her magic is used via an old book her Granmother gave to her on her 10th birthday.

She has brown hair in a ponytail. Her eyes are a light green and her face has a kind look on it often.
She will wear a wide amount of coats, like a puma hoodie (Which she gave to Ryan as a gift before she left)
or a purple raincoat.
Her personalty is that of kindness. She will often have a kind word for all and is the moral rock for Ryan when things get hard for him.

http://img-cache.cdn.gaiaonline.com/ca08bbe8985147928b51df638c0b690e/http://i213...

And here is part 2 "A tale of witches and hunters" 

Okay I need to put a few rules here.

1. No TG or shrinking, or body swap. The reason for this is becasue all people in the UK were born with immunity to these magic types. You can use hypnotisim however but don't make them mentally think they are the other gender. You can make them act younger than they are, but only if it's for humour and they can go back to normal in the next couple of chapters.

2. I encourage sex (They are teens after all.) but focus on the person's feelings at that point. You can do anything sex related, oral or anal etc.

3. Fights should be long and cool, I want to feel the action when I read it okay?

4. Oh and you can have any of them killed, but If Ryan bites it then the tale ends and you need to put an option before the death so you can avert it.

5. Also becasue The Witch people are special guests they can't be killed, you can make it very close however. And I would like to thank Mr Runner and scifiwizard for allowing me to use a crossover.
If you wish to read thier work then click this link. "The Witch" 

Also Ryan and co make a guest appearance in scifiwizard's interactive. I recommend it to those who like my interactive "Mad Science and Sorcery (Please Add!)" 

6. And if I enjoy new adds then I shall e-mail you some gift points as a token of thanks.

7. Also the story has to take over the course of a year. Feel free to show what happens after the year is over. Please keep all adds focused on the story.

8. First person writing is encouraged, please state the POV of who is speaking. But I will also allow third person.
